[\[22b.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug ni sgron ma'o/_/blo'o/_/shes pa'o/_/shes rab bo/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug ni skyabs so/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug ni mgon no/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug ni ma'o/_/pha rol du 
[\[22b.5\]]phyin pa drug ni pha'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_
[\[22b.6\]]bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[22b.7\]]rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snang ba'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o/_/blo'o/_/shes pa'o/_/shes rab bo/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 
[\[23a.2\]]nyid ni dpung gnyen no/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pha'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad 
[\[23a.3\]]spong bar byed pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/_'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[23a.4\]]de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang 
[\[23a.5\]]yum du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to/_/
[\[23a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/_rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[23a.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa ste/_rab 'byor ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas/_'di skad du 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang /_ma dang pha dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_skyabs dang /_
[\[23b.2\]]mgon yin no/_zhes brjod do/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[23b.3\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi 
[\[23b.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[23b.5\]]rol du phyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni med pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos 
[\[23b.6\]]thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa de nyid kyi chos thams cad 
[\[23b.7\]]yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/_chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]nyid dang /_dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad yod do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben 
[\[24a.2\]]la/_chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/_stong pa 
[\[24a.3\]]nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/_dben pa dang /_stong pa nyid ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/_dben pas ni stong pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs/_dben pas ni stong pa nyid 
[\[24a.4\]]la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu mi dmigs na/_bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sems can rnams yun ring 
[\[24a.5\]]po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la spyod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags so bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/_sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[24a.6\]]du sems/_'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya ba dben zhing stong ngam/_/gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das dben no/_/bde bar gshegs pa stong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya bas sems 
[\[24a.7\]]can rnams kun du rgyug cing /_kun du 'khor bar gyur tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_bdag dang bdag gir bgyi bas sems can rnams kun du rgyug cing kun du 'khor bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/_gang la bdag tu bya ba med pa dang /_bdag gir bya ba med pa de la 'dzin pa med/_gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la sems can kun du rgyug cing /_kun du 'khor ba med 
[\[24b.2\]]de/_de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang med pas/_rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[24b.3\]]dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/_skye mched dang /_khams la mi spyod/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi spyod/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[24b.4\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod/_nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi spyod/_yang dag par spong 
[\[24b.5\]]ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam 
[\[24b.6\]]par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so 
[\[24b.7\]]yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mi spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang /_gang gis spyod pa dang /_gang la spyod par 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi thub pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod 
[\[25a.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis non par mi nus so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis mi non pa la gnas pas/_
[\[25a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis mi non pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[25a.4\]]dang nye bar gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[25a.5\]]par sangs rgyas par gyur la/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/_bkur bstir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[25a.6\]]byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[25a.7\]]pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par 
[\[25b.2\]]mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/_bkur bstir byas/_bsti stang du 
[\[25b.3\]]byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[25b.4\]]'das mang ngo /_bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_/
[\[25b.5\]]'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu gling gi sems can 
[\[25b.6\]]gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[25b.7\]]par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[26a.2\]]'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog 
[\[26a.3\]]pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu ston na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 
[\[26a.4\]]snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[26a.5\]]pa lnga dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[26a.6\]]de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/
[\[26a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par 'byed pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[26b.2\]]sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang 
[\[26b.3\]]la yang med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub ste/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad gsad par 'gyur 
[\[26b.4\]]ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/_de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo/_/de dag rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pas/_dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang /_mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/_de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par bsgrub bo/_/de dag mtshan ma de dang lhan cig tu 
[\[26b.5\]]mi gnas te/_de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[26b.6\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang /_sems can 
[\[26b.7\]]thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go_/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir su'i gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang /_sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod 
[\[27a.2\]]snyoms la yongs su spyad par 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /_snang ba chen po dbyung bar 'dod pa dang /_khams gsum gyi btson ra na gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[27a.3\]]bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gnas par bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar 
[\[27a.4\]]rnam par spyod na yang /_des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go mi dbye ste/_des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sngon chad nor bu rin po 
[\[27a.5\]]che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la/_des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/_des nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /_yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/_des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/_de'i rgyus 
[\[27a.6\]]sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes/_nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[27a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang mi bya ste/_de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang /_yid bde ba 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams 
[\[27b.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/_bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs/_yid la bgyi ba mi dmigs/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal 
[\[27b.3\]]te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/_chos rnams kyi 
[\[27b.4\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no/_/zhes bya bar shes na/_byang chub 
[\[27b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de la 'phel ba med do/_/
[\[27b.6\]]yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[27b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa med de/_de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/yang dag 
[\[28a.2\]]pa'i mtha' la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/_gnyis kyang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 
[\[28a.3\]]'jum mi 'gong mi 'jigs mi sngang /_skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/zhes bya bar rtogs 
[\[28a.4\]]par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_/
[\[28a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[28a.6\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci 
[\[28a.7\]]lags/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_stong pa nyid las gud na stong pa nyid spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[28b.2\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[28b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_/
[\[28b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[28b.5\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[28b.6\]]phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[28b.7\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[29a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid 
[\[29a.3\]]dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[29a.4\]]rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_
[\[29a.5\]]rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_
[\[29a.6\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad 
[\[29a.7\]]dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[29b.2\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de 
[\[29b.3\]]bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[29b.4\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa lags/_bcom 
[\[29b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[29b.6\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[29b.7\]]de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang dmigs su med pa de skye ba 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod 
[\[30a.2\]]pa ste/_rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_rab 'byor de ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[30a.3\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/_lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod/_de ltar rtsol/_de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[30a.4\]]rgyas kyi ye shes/_ye shes chen po/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/_
[\[30a.5\]]de'i chos de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang 
[\[30a.6\]]lags pa de las/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci 
[\[30a.7\]]lags/_skye ba yang ma lags/_mi skye ba yang ma lags pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba yang ma lags/_mi skye ba yang ma lags pa las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[30b.2\]]ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis 
[\[30b.3\]]yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[30b.4\]]'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[30b.5\]]rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/'di ni mngon par 
[\[30b.6\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med pa'i phyir te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[30b.7\]]rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o/_/blta dka' ba'o/_/rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/brtag tu ma mchis pa'o/_/brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i zhi ba phra ba zhi ba 
[\[31a.2\]]ba'o/_/mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing /_bla na med pa yang 
[\[31a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/
[\[31a.4\]]de de bzhin te/_sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[31a.5\]]kyi bar du/_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan 
[\[31a.6\]]par gyur/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/_
[\[31a.7\]]klog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/_bzung zhing bcangs te/_blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/_kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de nas dge slong gcig cig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dge ba 
[\[31b.2\]]bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab 
[\[31b.3\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[31b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dge ba 
[\[31b.5\]]bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam 
[\[31b.6\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bzung zhing bcangs te/_
[\[31b.7\]]blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis non par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[32a.2\]]dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba 
[\[32a.3\]]dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs 
[\[32a.5\]]mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/_de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[32a.6\]]dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub 
[\[32a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes 
[\[32b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin 
[\[32b.3\]]du spyod pa de dag ni/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa dang 'thun 
[\[32b.4\]]par spyod pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed do/_/de ltar zhugs 
[\[32b.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang 'phrad par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o/_/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[32b.6\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/_nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/_/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar 
[\[32b.7\]]bya bar sems te/_nye bar 'dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o/_/kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig_/skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig_/lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas blang bar bya ba ste/_'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to/_/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub 
[\[33a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dong bar sems so/_/de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i 
[\[33a.3\]]rgyal po rab 'tshe ma yang /_'tshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang /_dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang /_'phrul dga'i lha'i 
[\[33a.4\]]bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po yang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/
[\[33a.5\]]kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/_/dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[33a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i 
[\[33a.7\]]lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang /_thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/_dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/_'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/_mig gi nad dam/_rna ba'i nad dam/_sna'i nad dam/_lce'i nad dam/_lus kyi nad dam/_snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang /_lus la mi 
[\[33b.2\]]'byung mi 'bab ste 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs 
[\[33b.3\]]pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang /_legs pa brjod dam/_'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems 
[\[33b.4\]]kyis yongs su shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o/_/
[\[33b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon 
[\[33b.6\]]tan dang legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[33b.7\]]phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu byas te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/_'on te ma yin 
[\[34a.2\]]gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/_dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa 
[\[34a.3\]]de'i tshe/_bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di 
[\[34a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pas/_sems gcig tsam 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /_zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34a.5\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo byang 
[\[34a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' 
[\[34a.7\]]bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can dag gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo /_/dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/_'on te ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo /_/dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[34b.2\]]dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/_des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so/_/ma thos pas mi shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan 
[\[34b.3\]]mi byed de/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/_dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par byed na/_dga' bo byang chub sems 
[\[34b.4\]]dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dam pa'i 
[\[34b.5\]]chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/_gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas bdag gi grogs su rnyed pa ste/_de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di lta ste/_/
[\[34b.6\]]nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni/_de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan 
[\[34b.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/_khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/_bsgoms pa dang gzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/_ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud 
[\[35a.2\]]sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa skyed cing /_nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/nga ni tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[35a.3\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[35a.4\]]la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/_dga' bo de'i tshe/_bdud sdig to 
[\[35a.5\]]can dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /_nyams bde ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]brjod pa 'am/_
[\[35a.6\]]rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/_de ming brjod pa 'am/_rus brjod pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing /_bdag bstod/_gzhan smod la/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[35a.7\]]po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_tshul dang mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rnam pa dang tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing /_bdag bstod/_gzhan smod de/_'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ngo zhes/_de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par rjod cing smod na/_de la bdud sdig 
[\[35b.2\]]to can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi gnas ni stongs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes/_ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 
[\[35b.3\]]'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/_de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang /_yid ches par bya bar sems te/_de la de dag gis thos sam/_mthong na/_'thun par spyod par 'gyur te/_de dag gis thos 
[\[35b.4\]]sam/_mthong nas 'thun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/_de dag de bzhin du slob cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/_nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/_de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las gang dang gang 
[\[35b.5\]]brtsams pa de dag thams cad mi 'dod pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul yang rab tu 
[\[35b.6\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/_bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/_dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/_bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /_tshim pa dang /_yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[35b.7\]]theg pa pa/_gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/_khyod ni ma yin no/_zhes zer na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa thams 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'thab mo dang 'khrug pa dang /_rtsod pa dang mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/_de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/_/de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/_/de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam 
[\[36a.2\]]mo/_/de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /_gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/_'khrugs cing mtshang 'dru na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di 
[\[36a.3\]]snyam du sems te/_'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o/_/'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni/_
[\[36a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas/_dga' zhing spro ba dang /_tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[36a.5\]]dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing /_'thab cing rtsod la/_'khrugs cing mtshang 'dru na/_gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na/_ji tsam du sdig 
[\[36a.6\]]pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /_'thab cing rtsod pa dang /_'khrugs cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/_'on te ma lags 
[\[36a.7\]]kyis/_bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]te/_dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /_'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang /_'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod pa byas na/_phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin cing khon du bzung ste 
[\[36b.2\]]gnas na dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra te/_gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na/_gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba 
[\[36b.3\]]dang /_mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la/_phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing /_bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bstsal dgos na/_de ltar bdag smra ba la phyir smra ba dang /_
[\[36b.4\]]bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur pa bya dgos na/_de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir zlogs pa ni mi tshul gyis/_bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i/_bdag gis ni glen pa dang lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o/_/bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug 
[\[36b.5\]]pa med par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na/_de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang /_de dag nyid la 
[\[36b.6\]]bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/_bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o/_/bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/_de la ni bdud sdig to 
[\[36b.7\]]can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o/_/de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o/_/'dug par mi bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su mi bya/_'khrugs par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang /_'khrug par bya ba de dag ni bdag la mi tshul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 
[\[37a.2\]]dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_
[\[37a.3\]]bam po lnga bcu lnga pa/_dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo 'di lta ste/_
[\[37a.4\]]dper na/_ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/_/'dis ni ji ltar bslab par 
[\[37a.5\]]bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/_/'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab 
[\[37a.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[37a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_'di ni yang dag par 
[\[37b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste/_gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/_de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[37b.3\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/_de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa 
[\[37b.4\]]las/_le'u bzhi bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub 
[\[37b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[37b.6\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/
[\[37b.7\]]gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis stong /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[38a.2\]]pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong /_de bzhin 
[\[38a.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/_rab 
[\[38a.4\]]'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[38a.5\]]ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags 
[\[38a.6\]]sam/_gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[38a.7\]]shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bas par bgyi ba 
[\[38b.2\]]dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang /_'gag par bgyi ba dang /_mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[38b.3\]]sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med 
[\[38b.4\]]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bas par bgyi ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang 
[\[38b.5\]]'gag par bgyi ba dang /_mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang /_'gag par bgyi ba dang /_mi skye bar bgyi ba'i 
[\[38b.6\]]slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang 'di skad du/_gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[38b.7\]]nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam par shes pa 'dod chags 
[\[39a.2\]]dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[39a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zad par bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_'gag par bya ba dang /_mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_
[\[39a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar 
[\[39a.5\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[39a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad zad par bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_'gag par bya ba dang /_mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zad par bya ba 
[\[39a.7\]]dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_'gag par bya ba dang /_mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_stong pa 
[\[39b.2\]]nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[39b.3\]]rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi 
[\[39b.4\]]sgo'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 
[\[39b.5\]]de zad pa 'am/_spong ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[39b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/_de bzhin nyid ni zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba med de/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin 
[\[39b.7\]]nyid la slob pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/_stong pa nyid thams cad la slob pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob pa 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]yin/_yang dag par spong pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob pa yin/_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[40a.2\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob pa yin/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting 
[\[40a.3\]]nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la slob pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa 
[\[40a.4\]]yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par 
[\[40a.5\]]mi nus pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa 
[\[40a.6\]]yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/_rab 
[\[40a.7\]]'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[40b.2\]]smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo 
[\[40b.3\]]dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin te/_rab 'byor sems can dman pas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[40b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas dang /_
[\[40b.5\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o/_/yul mtha' 'khob dang /_yul gcong rong can du mi skye'o/_/phyag dar pa dang /_gdol pa'i rigs su mi skye'o/_/zhar bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sgur por mi 'gyur ro/_/zha bor mi 'gyur ro/_/yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'on 
[\[40b.6\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te/_dbang po yongs su tshang zhing /_dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_
[\[40b.7\]]phra ma can dang /_zhe gcod pa smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa can dang /_chags sems can dang /_gnod sems can dang /_log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]ngan pa can du mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha tshe rings po'i nang du mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas gang gis 
[\[41a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/_thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[41a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug_/tshad med pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[41a.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi 
[\[41a.5\]]stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos gang gis yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[41a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[41a.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems zhum pa med cing 'gong pa med pa de ni/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas/_sems can de dag gi don du byang chub 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_
[\[41b.2\]]nang stong pa nyid la spyod/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[41b.3\]]yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[41b.4\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la spyod/_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[41b.5\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod de/_rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[41b.6\]]sar mi ltung ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa dang g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po'i phyogs gang na 'dzam bu na 
[\[41b.7\]]da'i gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste/_sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/_sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i 
[\[42a.2\]]las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste/_sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta 
[\[42a.3\]]bu ni de bas ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag bas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa 
[\[42a.4\]]de lta bu ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing /_
[\[42a.5\]]the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag bas ni/_gang phyir ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'dod pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sar 
[\[42a.6\]]chud par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/tshul khrims ngan 
[\[42a.7\]]pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/shes rab 'chal ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/skye 
[\[42b.2\]]mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[42b.3\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang 
[\[42b.4\]]ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_de ci'i 
[\[42b.5\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang yang dmigs pa med de/_ma dmigs pas chos gang la yang sems bskyed pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[42b.6\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su 'dus par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang 'thun par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[42b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig tshogs su lta bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/_rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'gags pas dbang po thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de 
[\[43a.2\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te/_rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod 
[\[43a.3\]]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba la slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de 
[\[43a.4\]]ji snyam du sems/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can 
[\[43a.5\]]rnams kyang mang ba lags na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de 
[\[43a.6\]]dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la yang sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[43a.7\]]dpa' chen pos rgyun ma chad par na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang po'i bsnyen bkur byas na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]lam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub 
[\[43b.2\]]par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar don chen por 'gyur ba 
[\[43b.3\]]ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_
