[\[130b.4\]]de dag gis kyang lam gyi bya ba bya dgos te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi 'tshal na/_'o na ni des yang 
[\[130b.5\]]dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon du bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas la/_sems can yongs su smin par ma byas par/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yang dag 
[\[130b.6\]]pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam la gnas te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyi 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[130b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam ma lags pa la gnas te 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na lam yang lags la/_lam ma lags pa la yang gnas te 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]gsol pa/_'o na lam yang ma lags la/_lam ma lags pa yang ma lags pa la gnas te 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[131a.2\]]pos yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_khyod lam la gnas pas nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[131a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam ma yin pa la gnas te 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam yang yin la/_lam ma yin pa la yang gnas te 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[131a.4\]]'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam yang ma yin la/_lam ma yin pa yang ma yin pa la gnas te/_len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[131a.5\]]ldan 'das bdag gi sems ni gang la yang gnas pas/_nye bar len pa ma mchis par zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems ni gang la yang mi gnas pas rnam par grol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[131a.6\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci la yang mi gnas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni/_rnam pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad 
[\[131a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste/_'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang rnam pa gang dang /_tshul gang dang /_mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams brjod par bya ba'i rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas/_de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba/_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[131b.2\]]pa nyid 'di gsum las nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i rnam pa 'dis ni lhag ma ma lus par spangs so/_/'dis ni lhag ma ma lus par ma spangs so/_/zhes bgyi ba'i bye brag mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nyon mongs pa spangs pa la 
[\[131b.3\]]ni bye brag med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa mnga'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags 
[\[131b.4\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis 'dus ma bgyis ma thob par nyon mongs pa spangs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'dus ma bgyis pa la bye brag dmigs su mchis sam/_
[\[131b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dmigs su ma mchis na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du 'di la ni/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa mnga'o/_/'di la ni bag chags 
[\[131b.6\]]kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa med do/_/zhes bka' stsal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[131b.7\]]gti mug gi lus kyi rnam pa dang /_ngag gi rnam pa yod de/_de dag gi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo kun dang thun mong du gnod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]la thams cad du thams cad/_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi mnga' zhing mi dmigs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te lam yang ma mchis la/_mya ngan las 
[\[132a.2\]]'das pa yang ma mchis na/_'o na ci'i slad du/_'di skad du/_'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/_/
[\[132a.3\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bshad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[132a.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'dus ma bgyis te/_
[\[132a.5\]]'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[132a.6\]]sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar rab tu 'byed pa mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni rab tu 'byed pa med mod kyi/_'on kyang tshig tshad mar byas shing brjod de/_don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[132a.7\]]de la tshig gi lam gyi gdags pa med de/_'on kyang gang dang gang gis mtha' ma chod pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mthar gdags pa yin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/_sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang dmigs par 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]'gyur ba lta ga la yod de gnas med do/_/rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes pas/_de dag la 'di skad du/_'di ni sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya'o/_/'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' zhes bya'o/_/zhes bstan te/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis 
[\[132b.2\]]stong pa'i chos thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la spyad na/_
[\[132b.3\]]nang ngam phyi'i chos sam/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_chos kyi chos gang la yang mngon par chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 
[\[132b.4\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[132b.5\]]pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin te/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dis/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_
[\[132b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad/_chos thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin par gyur/_pha rol du phyin par 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[132b.7\]]du phyin pa 'dis/_chos thams cad kyi mchog gi tshul phyed de/_chos de dag kun la yang 'khor ba ma dmigs pas de'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir/_de bzhin nyid kyang chud yang 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]dag pa'i mtha' yang chud/_chos kyi dbyings kyang chud de/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang ldan pa 'am mi ldan pa 'am/_bstan du yod pa 'am/_
[\[133a.2\]]bstan du med pa 'am/_thogs pa dang bcas pa 'am/_thogs pa med pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[133a.3\]]yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi spobs pa thams cad dang /_snang ba thams cad skyed pa ste/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/_gang zag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[133a.4\]]pa pa nas/_mu stegs can gzhan gyi bar dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po rnams kyis mi phyed mi 'phrogs pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gcad par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa 
[\[133a.5\]]nyid kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[133a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don la spyod pas/_mi rtag pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi don la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag med pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/kun 'byung ba shes pa'i don 
[\[133a.7\]]dang /_'gog pa shes pa'i don dang /_lam shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/zad pa shes pa'i don dang /_mi skye ba shes pa'i don dang /_chos shes pa'i don dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa'i don dang /_kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang /_yongs su rtog pa shes pa'i don dang /_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la don dang don ma lags pa mi 
[\[133b.2\]]dmigs na/_'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don la spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 
[\[133b.3\]]don zab mo 'di la spyod pas/_'di ltar spyad par bya ste/_'dod chags bdag gi don ce 'am/_don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/zhe sdang bdag gi don ce 'am/_don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/gti mug bdag gi don ce 'am/_don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/'dod 
[\[133b.4\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bdag gi don ce 'am/_don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/log par lta ba bdag gi don ce 'am/_don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/lta bar gyur pa thams cad bdag gi don ce 'am/_don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[133b.5\]]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang don du mi byed/_don ma yin par mi byed do/_/lta ba'i rnam pa dag gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang don du mi byed/_don ma yin par mi byed do/_/gzugs bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/_/gzugs bdag 
[\[133b.6\]]gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi don ces spyad par mi 
[\[133b.7\]]bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_
[\[134a.2\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_
[\[134a.3\]]mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 
[\[134a.4\]]bar du bdag gi don zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla 
[\[134a.5\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos gang don du bya ba 'am/_don med par bya ba de lta bu gang yang ma dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[134a.6\]]ma skyes kyang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid ni gnas pa/_chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ste/_de ni gang la yang don kyang mi byed/_don ma yin pa 'ang mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don dang don ma yin 
[\[134a.7\]]pa spangs te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang la yang don kyang mi bgyid/_don ma lags pa 'ang mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid gang yang mi byed de/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang la yang don du byed pa yang ma yin no/_/don ma yin par byed pa yang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na 'dus 
[\[134b.2\]]ma bgyis/_sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don kyang yin te/_phan pa 'am/_gnod par 
[\[134b.3\]]nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang phan pa 'am/_gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang chos gang la yang phan pa 
[\[134b.4\]]'am/_gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma bgyis kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi bgyid dam/_bcom ldan 
[\[134b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/_/gsol 
[\[134b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos thob par bgyid dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na gnyis kyi chos shig gnyis kyi chos thob par bgyid pa lags sam/_
[\[134b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam gnyis kyi chos sam/_gnyis su med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs pa ni/_thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi dmigs 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]pa ni thob pa ste/_de ni dmigs pas kyang thob par mi 'gyur/_mi dmigs pas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[135a.2\]]'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yang dka' ba 
[\[135a.3\]]bgyid pa lags te/_sems can zhes bgyi 'am/_sems can du gdags pa ni gang yang mi dmigs na/_de dag ni sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la 
[\[135a.4\]]la zhig nam mkha' gzhi ma mchis pa la/_ljang bu bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi slad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[135a.5\]]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can 
[\[135a.6\]]rnams sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ni/_dka' ba byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu la la zhig ljang bu bskyed par 'dod la/_skyes bu des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba ma dmigs/_yal ga dang sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu ma 
[\[135a.7\]]dmigs par ljang bu de'i sdong bu bskyed de/_dus dus su chus bran cing /_de'i sdong bu de rim gyis yal ga phun sum tshogs par gyur/_lo ma phun sum tshogs par gyur/_me tog phun sum tshogs par gyur/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /_de ljang bu de'i 'dab ma 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]la spyod pa dang /_me tog la spyod pa dang /_'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_sems can rnams kyi phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/_de dag rim gyis pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[135b.2\]]drug la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_de dag la lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de la lo ma ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing /_sems can 
[\[135b.3\]]rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'grol ba'o/_/me tog ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi 
[\[135b.4\]]lhar skye ba dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_
[\[135b.5\]]chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang 
[\[135b.6\]{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o/_/'bras bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /_lan cig 
[\[135b.7\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid la brten cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]thob nas/_de dag kyang sems can thams cad 'bras bu la nye bar 'tsho ba bzhin nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_de la gang gis yon phul ba de dag gis kyang rim gyis/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 
[\[136a.2\]]'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang /_de la sems can du yang mi 'dogs/_sems can du gdags pa yang med par sems can de dag kyang 
[\[136a.3\]]sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod kyang /_gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i sems can nam/_sems can du 
[\[136a.4\]]gdags pa gang yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[136a.5\]]po la brten na/_sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa dang /_ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur 
[\[136a.6\]]ro/_/lam gyi rgyud dma' ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[136a.7\]]rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med na/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[136b.2\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_gzugs kyi khams thams cad dang /_gzugs 
[\[136b.3\]]med pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na gang 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[136b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad du gdags pa dang /_
[\[136b.5\]]de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched dang /_khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis pha 
[\[136b.6\]]rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[136b.7\]]pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gdags pa dang /_
[\[137a.2\]]de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa de dag thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te/_de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid de la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[137a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub 
[\[137a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob bo/_/chos 
[\[137a.5\]]thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslabs shing /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byed do/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin 
[\[137a.6\]]nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byas shing /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do/_/dbang po la mkhas par byas shing /_dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do/_/dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa 'thob par byas shing /_sems 
[\[137a.7\]]can rnams kyi las rang gi byas pa shes par byed do/_/sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes par byas shing /_smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do/_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing /_rnam 
[\[137b.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing /_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod 
[\[137b.3\]]nas/_phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang /_legs pa thams cad mthong nas/_bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[137b.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 
[\[137b.5\]]ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/_lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[137b.6\]]du phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa/_sems can 
[\[137b.7\]]thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/_nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na/_sems can de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar 
[\[138a.2\]]gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis so/_/bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/_/
[\[138a.3\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i bsod nams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams las byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs de la ni/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[138a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_
[\[138a.5\]]bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs dang cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni gang zag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[138a.6\]]pa rnams te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/
[\[138a.7\]]gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams te/_nyan thos dang /_
[\[138b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa 
[\[138b.3\]]lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gis bsod nams des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye 
[\[138b.4\]]bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/_
[\[138b.5\]]dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[138b.6\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag 
[\[138b.7\]]khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rigs kyi sa la gnas pa rnams te/_rigs kyi sa las byung ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas par 
[\[139a.2\]]gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi 
[\[139a.3\]]bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni brgyad pa'i sa rnams te/_brgyad pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas 
[\[139a.4\]]par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/
[\[139a.5\]]stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni mthong ba'i sa rnams te/_mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems 
[\[139a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bsrabs 
[\[139a.7\]]pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni bsrabs pa'i sa rnams te/_bsrabs pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can 
[\[139b.2\]]de dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[139b.3\]]sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las 
[\[139b.4\]]byung ba ni/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las byung ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[139b.5\]]ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i 
[\[139b.6\]]char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams 
[\[139b.7\]]te/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las byung ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya 
[\[140a.2\]]phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/_rang sangs rgyas rnams te/_rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[140a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub 
[\[140a.4\]]sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' rang byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang 
[\[140a.5\]]nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems 
[\[140a.6\]]can de dag thams cad byang chub tu zhugs par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag 
[\[140a.7\]]khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs su yang mi bzod/_char yang mi bzod/_bgrang bar yang mi bzod/_dper yang mi bzod/_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]sems dang po bskyed pas ci yid la bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ji lta bu zhig mchis dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig mchis 
[\[140b.2\]]dbang sgyur ba ji lta bu zhig mchis/_rnam pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/_mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni/_dngos po med pa mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_byed pa med 
[\[140b.3\]]pa/_skye ba med pa/_'byung ba med pa ste/_rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig yod ces zer ba ni/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmigs pa med pa ste/_dran pas dbang bsgyur ba dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa mtshan 
[\[140b.4\]]nyid med pa yin te/_rab 'byor 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'o/_/'di ni dbang bsgyur ba'o/_/'di ni rnam pa'o/_/'di ni mtshan nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ba' zhig dngos po ma mchis pa 
[\[140b.5\]]lags sam/_ma lags kyi/_gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_pha rol du phyin 
[\[140b.6\]]pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar 
[\[140b.7\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos 
[\[141a.2\]]po ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/_/gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yang dngos po med pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 
[\[141a.3\]]'byung ba yang dngos po med pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dngos po med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[141a.4\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[141a.5\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po yang dngos po med pa'o/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams 
[\[141a.6\]]kyang dngos po med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med de/_rab 'byor gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma 
[\[141a.7\]]mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do/_/chos 
[\[141b.2\]]thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[141b.3\]]dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[141b.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_
[\[141b.5\]]bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[141b.6\]]dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[141b.7\]]dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[142a.2\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[142a.3\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[142a.4\]]snying rje chen po dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 
[\[142a.5\]]nyid du yongs su 'dris par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang /_sems can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[142a.6\]]chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[142a.7\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs 
[\[142b.2\]]su 'dris par byed do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[142b.3\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/
[\[142b.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/byang chub kyi lam de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu shes te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_nam de bzhin 
[\[142b.5\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa 
[\[142b.6\]]de'i bar du/_byang chub kyi lam de la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/_lam de la gnas shing /_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_skad cig gcig 
[\[142b.7\]]dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mi skye bar spang bas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/_de sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]rten gyi khams la rnam par lta na/_dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na/_dngos po yod par lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_
[\[143a.2\]]de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /_mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/len pa la yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gtong ba la yang mi 
[\[143a.3\]]rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_/dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med par yid la mi byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang mi dmigs te/_mtshan mar mi byed yul du mi byed par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims 
[\[143a.4\]]srung /_bzod pa sgom/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_bsam gtan la goms par byed/_shes rab sgom ste/_de ltar shes rab sgom yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gang shes rab de la sgom pa de yang /_
[\[143a.5\]]mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/sems can gang gi don du shes rab de la sgom pa de dag la yang mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[143a.6\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[143a.7\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_
[\[143b.2\]]dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[143b.3\]]rgya bar bya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de la yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_de dag sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[143b.4\]]kyis kyang ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang ma byas te/_chos thams cad ni byed pa po med pa/_byed pa po dang bral ba'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/_chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/_
[\[143b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos rnams ni chos rnams nyid dang bral ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags na/_ji ltar chos kyis chos la dngos po mchis 
[\[143b.6\]]zhes bgyi ba 'am/_dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar mi rung ste/_dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal 
[\[143b.7\]]bar mi rung ngo /_/dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung ngo /_/dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung ngo /_/de ltar chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal bar ma mchis pas/_byang chub 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta dngos po mchis pa 'am/_dngos po ma mchis par sems par yang ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[144a.2\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung bas/_dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/_dngos po med ces bya bar ston te/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la/_don dam pa yang gzhan zhig 
[\[144a.3\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la/_don dam pa yang gzhan zhig yin zhes bya ba yang med de/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin yang /_de la 
[\[144a.4\]]sems can de dag phyin ci log tu gyur pas de bzhin nyid de mi shes mi mthong ste/_de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/_dngos po med ces bya bar brjod do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang /_
[\[144a.5\]]sems can gang ji snyed cig phung po lnga la dngos po yod pa'i 'du shes su gyur te/_dngos po med par mi shes pa de dag gi don du chos rnams rab tu dbye ba nye bar bzung ste/_dngos po med par yang ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhes te/_de skad du brjod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[144a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u lnga bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 
[\[144a.7\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/_de skad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de/_gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/_de byang chub kyi don du spyod pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[144b.2\]]la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang 
[\[144b.3\]]blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[144b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar 
[\[144b.5\]]spyod/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye 
[\[144b.6\]]mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags 
[\[144b.7\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[145a.2\]]par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_spobs pa dang /_
[\[145a.3\]]yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_yi ge la 'jug pa dang /_yi ge med pa la 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis 
[\[145a.4\]]su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug cu gnyis pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub tu spyod pa yin te/_de'i phyir 
[\[145a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi na/_sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba de/_gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_
[\[145a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor yang 'di ltar des yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i don rab tu rtogs pas/_de'i 
[\[145a.7\]]phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar des chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub byang chub ces bgyi na/_byang chub ces bgyi 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'di ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[145b.2\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar byang chub ces bya ba de ni/_de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/_rnam pa 
[\[145b.3\]]gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming dang mtshan ma tsam ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don to/_/rab 'byor yang 
[\[145b.4\]]'di ltar de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar dbyer med pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don to/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/_de'i 
[\[145b.5\]]phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 
[\[145b.6\]]'di la spyod pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[145b.7\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib pa 'am/_'god pa 'am/_'phel ba 
[\[146a.2\]]'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa 
[\[146a.3\]]dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[146a.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs 
[\[146a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de la/_chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib pa 'am/_'god pa 'am/_'phel ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam 
[\[146a.6\]]par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib par bya ba 'am/_'god par bya ba 'am/_'phel bar bya 
[\[146a.7\]]ba 'am/_skye bar bya ba 'am/_'gag par bya ba 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba 'am/_rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni/_chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib par bgyi ba 'am/_'god par bgyi ba 'am/_'phel bar bgyi ba 'am/_skye bar bgyi ba 'am/_'gag par bgyi ba 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs par bgyi ba 'am 
[\[146b.2\]]rnam par byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dzin 
[\[146b.3\]]par 'gyur/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid 
[\[146b.4\]]la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[146b.5\]]yan lag brgyad pa la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[146b.6\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la 
[\[146b.7\]]spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni gnyis su spyod pa'i blo med de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis kyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol du 
[\[147a.2\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[147a.3\]]pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis 'phags 
[\[147a.4\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[147a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi 
[\[147a.6\]]spyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[147a.7\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[147b.2\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod na/_'o na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 
[\[147b.3\]]'phel bar 'gyur bas/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems slad ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor su gang gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 
[\[147b.4\]]'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni gnyis la rten pa ste/_de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par mi 'phel lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis la mi spyod de/_de ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas 
[\[147b.5\]]nye bar bzung ste/_sems phyi ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel te/_de ni lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyams smad pas/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am/_mi 
[\[147b.6\]]dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis yongs su 'phrogs par gyur cing /_de dag gis yongs su phrogs pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[147b.7\]]'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[148a.2\]]ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa 
[\[148a.3\]]dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[148a.4\]]chos ma 'dres pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba de ltar nyams smad par mi nus te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 
[\[148a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par bgyi 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[148a.6\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir/_yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[148a.7\]]'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]'das ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang /_dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 
[\[148b.2\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mdo dang 
[\[148b.3\]]dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin du rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa gang ci gsungs kyang de dag 
[\[148b.4\]]thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/_/yongs su bzung nas kyang tshig gis yongs su 'dris pa dang /_yid kyis shin du brtags pa dang /_lta bas rab tu khong du chud par byas shing /_gzungs rab tu thob par byed do/_/gzungs rab tu thob nas/_so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu skyed do/_/
[\[148b.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa skyes pas/_de tshe rnam par 'phos kyang /_chos de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing /_dge 
[\[148b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su bzung na/_nam yang ngan song dang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin te/_lus de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par 
[\[148b.7\]]byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su bzung bas kyang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i legs pa ston pa dag dang nam du yang 'bral 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes 
[\[149a.2\]]gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga bcu lnga pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[149a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur mi bgyid/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongs su rdzogs par mi bgyid la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma bzung bar gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[149a.4\]]chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang 
[\[149a.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par ma byas la/_dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur yang byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongs su rdzogs 
[\[149a.6\]]par byas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bsten pa byas kyang /_da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 
[\[149a.7\]]ma bsten pa rnams/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ming bden pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i gshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i 
[\[149b.2\]]slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bgyis kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[149b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te/_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de dag thob par ma gyur pa'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu yang ma bskyed/_gang de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bu dag 
[\[149b.4\]]la yang ma bsten pas de ltar thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[149b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[149b.6\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos dang /_mi dang mi ma yin par gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dang ldan pas/_sbyin pa la yang sbyin pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/_len pa la yang len pa'i 'du shes 
[\[149b.7\]]su mi 'gyur/_gtong ba la yang gtong ba'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad med pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong zhing /_chos rnams 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]kyis mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang /_chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o/_/zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[150a.2\]]la spyod de/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[150a.3\]]du phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u lnga bcu drug pa'o//_//rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[150a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims srung ste/_de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 
[\[150a.5\]]'gyur/_zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur/_gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur/_bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/_kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur te/_mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_ser sna 'am/_tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/_'khrug 
[\[150a.6\]]pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam/_brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam/_shes rab 'chal ba'i sems sam nga rgyal lam/_brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i nga rgyal lam/_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems 
[\[150a.7\]]dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad med pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang /_chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o/_/zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_de tshul 
[\[150b.2\]]khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du 
[\[150b.3\]]phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed 
[\[150b.4\]]pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa sgom ste/_de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur/_/zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur/_gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 
[\[150b.5\]]'gyur te/_mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gang byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba/_'di lta ste ser sna 'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am 'khrug pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam/_brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam/_shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 
[\[150b.6\]]sam nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am/_che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i nga rgyal lam/_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_
[\[150b.7\]]chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang /_chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o/_/zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_de bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[151a.2\]]dag par byed kyang /_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par bzod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa
