[\[151a.3\]]med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de la 'dod chags 
[\[151a.4\]]kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur/_bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/_kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/_mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste ser sna 'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/_'khrug 
[\[151a.5\]]pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam/_brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam/_shes rab 'chal ba'i sems sam/_nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam/_nga'i nga rgyal lam nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang /_
[\[151a.6\]]sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug 
[\[151a.7\]]na yang /_chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o/_/zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma 
[\[151b.2\]]gtogs par/_brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung 
[\[151b.3\]]ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/_de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur/_bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/_kun 
[\[151b.4\]]nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur te/_mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_ser sna 'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/_'khrug pa'i sems sam le lo'i sems sam brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam/_shes rab 
[\[151b.5\]]'chal ba'i sems sam/_nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i nga rgyal lam/_nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par 
[\[151b.6\]]shes shing /_chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang /_chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o/_/zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[151b.7\]]kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_de bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]yongs su dag par byed kyang /_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/_bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par 
[\[152a.2\]]bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 
[\[152a.3\]]shes rab sgom ste/_de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur/_bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/_kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur te/_mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 
[\[152a.4\]]'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_ser sna 'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am 'khrug pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam shes rab 'chal ba'i sems sam/_nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i 
[\[152a.5\]]nga rgyal lam nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang yongs su ma rdzogs 
[\[152a.6\]]pa dang mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang /_chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o/_/zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam 
[\[152a.7\]]par 'phel bar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/_shes rab kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u lnga bcu bdun pa'o//_//
[\[152b.2\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[152b.3\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/_thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med 
[\[152b.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so/_/chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed 
[\[152b.5\]]pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang /_bsgom pas spang ba'i lam la spyod kyang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed rang byang chub thob par mi byed 
[\[152b.6\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes/_chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par shes te/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[152b.7\]]sa las yongs su 'da' ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]'jug_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub 
[\[153a.2\]]thob par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so/_/chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung bar shes so/_/chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so/_/chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so/_/
[\[153a.3\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dris par byed/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yongs 
[\[153a.4\]]su 'dris par byed/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed kyang /_nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par ma gyur gyi bar du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[153a.5\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod kyang /_rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni/_blo dam pa dang 
[\[153a.6\]]ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod cing /_rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni blo dam pa dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[153a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid gang las mi g.yo ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa las mi g.yo ba yin te/_rab 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'byor gang yang 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las mi g.yo zhes zer ba ni/_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/
[\[153b.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/nang stong pa nyid 
[\[153b.3\]]dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_
[\[153b.4\]]yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[153b.5\]]smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[153b.6\]]par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po med pa ste/_rab 'byor dngos po 
[\[153b.7\]]med pas ni dngos po med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na dngos po ma mchis pas/_dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na dngos 
[\[154a.2\]]po mchis pas/_dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na dngos po ma mchis pas/_dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[154a.3\]]bgyi bar nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na gal te de ltar dngos po mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur/_dngos po ma mchis pas kyang /_dngos po mchis pa 
[\[154a.4\]]mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur/_dngos po mchis pas kyang dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur/_dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thob pa ma mchis shing /_mngon par rtogs 
[\[154a.5\]]pa ma mchis pa 'am gcig tu mi 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mngon par rtogs pa ni yod med pa ma yin te/_bzhi pos mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bus ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig 
[\[154a.6\]]mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la dngos po yang med dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs pa ste/_de la spros pa de dag med pas/_spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[154a.7\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_
[\[154b.2\]]rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du 
[\[154b.3\]]shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 
[\[154b.4\]]'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[154b.5\]]chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag ces bya 
[\[154b.6\]]ba dang mi rtag ces bya ba dang bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[154b.7\]]chen po'i spros pa'o/_/sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[155a.2\]]spros pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_
[\[155a.3\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[155a.4\]]'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo bsgom par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[155a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa dang /_mthong bas bltas te/_de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra 
[\[155a.6\]]bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub shes pa dang /_mthong bas bltas te/_de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[155a.7\]]spros pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]chen po'i spros pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_sangs 
[\[155b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon 
[\[155b.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rtag pa dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/bde ba dang 
[\[155b.4\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi ba dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro 
[\[155b.5\]]ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi ba dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes pa ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 
[\[155b.6\]]'byung ba rtag pa dang /_mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /_zhi ba dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[155b.7\]]thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag pa dang /_mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /_zhi ba dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[156a.2\]]pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[156a.3\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub shes pa dang /_mthong bas bltas te/_de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[156a.4\]]skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[156a.5\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o/_/
[\[156a.6\]]zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid 'phro bar mi byed/_dngos po med pa yang dngos po med pa 'phro bar mi byed/_ngo bo nyid dang dngos 
[\[156a.7\]]po med pa ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang 'phro bar byed pa 'am/_gang la 'phro bar bya ba de lta bu gang yang med de/_rab 'byor de lta bas na/_gzugs ni spror med pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]ba ni spror med pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni spror med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_
[\[156b.2\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni spror med pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[156b.3\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni spror med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni spror med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 
[\[156b.4\]]dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni spror med pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med 
[\[156b.5\]]pa'o/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba ni spror med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spror med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do/_/tshor 
[\[156b.6\]]ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid med do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la ngo bo nyid med do/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[156b.7\]]bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]nyid med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rang byang chub la ngo bo nyid med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/_/
[\[157a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ngo bo nyid med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba la ngo bo nyid med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[157a.3\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/_/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni spror med pa ste/_rab 'byor de'i phyir na/_gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 
[\[157a.4\]]'brel par 'byung ba ni spror med pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni spror med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[157a.5\]]thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo ni spror med pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[157a.6\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni spror med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni spror med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can yongs 
[\[157a.7\]]su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni spror med pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad gang la yang ngo bo nyid dmigs su ma mchis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi shul tam/_
[\[157b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi shul tam/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul tam/_chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi 
[\[157b.3\]]lam gyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug_/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug 
[\[157b.4\]]gi_/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam thams cad la bslabs shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/'di lta ste dper na/_brgyad pa ni chos thams cad la bslabs shing /_yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug ste nam 'bras bu'i lam 
[\[157b.5\]]ma grub kyi bar du 'bras bu thob par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lam thams cad la bsgrubs shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/_nam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[157b.6\]]pa nyid thob par mi byed do/_/des ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su 
[\[157b.7\]]rdzogs par bgyis te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brgyad pa'i shul kyang gzhan/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shul kyang 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]gzhan/_phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan/_dgra bcom par zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/_dgra bcom pa'i shul kyang gzhan/_rang sangs rgyas su zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/_rang sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[158a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan te/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shul de dag gzhan dang gzhan na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 
[\[158a.3\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag brgyad pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /_brgyad par mi 'gyur tam/_mthong ba'i shul bsgrubs shing /_rgyun du 
[\[158a.4\]]zhugs par mi 'gyur tam/_bsgom pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /_lan cig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur tam/_phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa 'am/_phyir mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur tam/_dgra bcom par zhugs pa 'am/_dgra bcom par mi 'gyur tam/_
[\[158a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi shul bsgrubs shing /_rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur tam/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brgyad par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/_de ni gnas ma lags 
[\[158a.6\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang 
[\[158a.7\]]byang chub thob nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bag chags kyi 
[\[158b.2\]]mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad par 'gyur te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[158b.3\]]'bras bu thob pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa 'am/_rang byang chub thob par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs med de/_de ni gnas 
[\[158b.4\]]ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[158b.5\]]drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes pa dang mthong bas sa brgyad las yongs su 'da' ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs 
[\[158b.6\]]pa'i sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/_sa bstan pa brgyad pa 'di dag las shes pa dang mthong ba las 'das nas/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[158b.7\]]pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/rab 'byor de la brgyad pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes dang /_spong ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de yang byang chub 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang spong ba gang yin pa de yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[159a.2\]]dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/_dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa chen po ste/_de lta bas na 
[\[159a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[159a.4\]]pa nyid kyis/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[159a.5\]]shing 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug bcu gsum pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang nyan thos kyi shul dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi shul dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[159a.6\]]kyi shul de dag las/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi shul gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya ste/_de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag 
[\[159a.7\]]pa ni rnam pa gang dang gang /_tshul gang dang gang /_mtshan ma gang dang gang gis lam du brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ci nas kyang gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gdul ba'i don du gzhan la brjod pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_gdags pa dang /_rnam par dgod pa ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra brnyan lta bur shes par bya ba'i don du/_sgra skad dang 
[\[159b.2\]]brdar bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra skad dang brda thams cad brjod par bya/_yongs su gzung bar bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[159b.3\]]par bya'o/_/lam thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rig par bya ste/_sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba ba'i lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/
[\[159b.4\]]des kyang sems can dmyal ba ba'i lam bzlog par bya ste/_rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o 'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/
[\[159b.5\]]des kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam bzlog par bya ste/_rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/
[\[159b.6\]]des kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi dang /_lha dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/
[\[159b.7\]]'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang /_mi che ba'i lha rnams dang /_mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang /_shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams dang /_gya nom snang ba'i 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched 
[\[160a.2\]]kyi lha rnams dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang 
[\[160a.3\]]po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes par bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs 
[\[160a.4\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[160a.5\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po shes par bya'o/_/lam de dag gis kyang sems can gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 
[\[160a.6\]]bya ba de dag ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god/_gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god/_gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/_dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/_gang rang byang chub la dgod par 
[\[160a.7\]]bya ba de dag ni/_rang byang chub la 'god/_gang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni byang chub la 'god do/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/de dag la bslabs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug go_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la zhugs nas/_de bzhin du chos ston to/_/des chos bstan pa de yang 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des gzhan gyi dbang po shin du shes par byas pa'i phyir te/_de ni 
[\[160b.2\]]sems can rnams kyi lam dang /_lam ma yin pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba 'ang rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs gang la/_
[\[160b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba 'am/_nyan thos kyis bslab par bya ba 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad gang yang ma 'dus pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang lags 
[\[160b.4\]]pa dang /_byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ldan pa yang ma lags mi ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/_thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig na/_ji ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams 
[\[160b.5\]]byang chub sgrub par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags la/_gzugs ma mchis shing /_bstan du ma mchis/_thogs pa ma mchis/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ni chos gang la yang sgrub pa 'am/_
[\[160b.6\]]'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni chos gang la yang sgrub pa 'am 'jig par mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni/_chos gang la yang sgrub pa 'am/_'jig par bgyid pa ma 
[\[160b.7\]]mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni chos gang la yang sgrub pa 'am 'jig par byed pa med do/_/rab 'byor sems can gang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]gi don du 'di skad du/_'di dag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub thob par byed pa'o zhes bshad kyi/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_skye mched dang /_
[\[161a.2\]]khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[161a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_
[\[161a.4\]]bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa gang yin pa dang /_byams pa gang yin pa dang /_snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas 
[\[161a.5\]]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[161a.6\]]dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_
[\[161a.7\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni chos dang 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig kyang /_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sems 
[\[161b.2\]]can rnams gzung bar bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis de skad du brjod de/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang /_mthong bas bslab par bya ste/_ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /_mthong bas bslabs nas/_
[\[161b.3\]]chos la la ni mngon du bya'o/_/la la ni mngon du mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang ni shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs te mngon du bya'i/_chos gang ni mngon du mi bya zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs te/_
[\[161b.4\]]mngon du mi bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon du bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'phags pa'i chos dang /_'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[161b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos dang /_'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos dang /_'dul ba zhes bgyi ba de ji tsam gyis na/_'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_
[\[161b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/_'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_zhe sdang dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_gti mug dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_
[\[161b.7\]]bral ba yang ma yin/_'jig tshogs su lta ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_the tsom dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs snyoms pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems dang /_
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_ma rig pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_nga rgyal dang rgod pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang 
[\[162a.2\]]ma yin/_bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_bsam gtan gsum pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang ldan pa yang 
[\[162a.3\]]ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_byams pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_snying rje dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_dga' ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_btang snyoms dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_nam mkha' 
[\[162a.4\]]mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan 
[\[162a.5\]]pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_'phags pa'i 
[\[162a.6\]]bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting 
[\[162a.7\]]nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin/_'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang /_ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin pas/_de'i phyir de dag ni 'phags pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni de dag gi chos dang 'dul ba yin pas/_de'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos 
[\[162b.2\]]'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_de dag ni gzugs med pa dang gzugs med par ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba 
[\[162b.3\]]yang ma yin no/_/bstan du med pa dang /_bstan du med par ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/thogs pa med pa dang /_thogs pa med par ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no/_/mtshan nyid med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med par ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba 
[\[162b.4\]]yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa/_mtshan nyid med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[162b.5\]]des de la bslabs na/_chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 
[\[162b.6\]]'am/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[162b.7\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_bsam 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_snying rje chen 
[\[163a.2\]]po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 
[\[163a.3\]]'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_
[\[163a.4\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[163a.5\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi mtshan nyid la 
[\[163a.6\]]bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden 
[\[163a.7\]]pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang /_'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs te/_
[\[163b.2\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs na/_ji ltar rnam 
[\[163b.3\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/_ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/_chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor na/_ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen pos sems can 
[\[163b.4\]]rnams 'khor ba las dgrol bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan nyid yod na ni/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na/_chos thams cad la 
[\[163b.5\]]mtshan nyid med cing gzugs med/_bstan du med thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la yang bslab par mi bya/_mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par mi 
[\[163b.6\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon chad mtshan nyid med par gyur pa 'am/_phyis mtshan nyid yod par gyur pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor chos 'di dag ni sngon chad kyang mtshan nyid med la/_da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[163b.7\]]mtshan nyid la yang bslab par mi bya/_mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings 'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing /_mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma lags/_mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma lags na/_de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom 
[\[164a.2\]]pa mchis par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar mi nus so/_/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das 
[\[164a.3\]]par ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus so/_/
[\[164a.4\]]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[164a.5\]]su dag pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus so/_/chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams 
[\[164a.6\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so/_/rang byang chub la dgod par mi nus so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 
[\[164a.7\]]dgod par mi nus so/_/sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so/_/tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so/_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin/_mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na 
[\[164b.2\]]ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsgom pa ni/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin/_mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma yin 
[\[164b.3\]]te/_rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa bsgom pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/gsol pa/_de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[164b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[164b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/mig rnam par bsgom pa 
[\[164b.6\]]bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /_yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[164b.7\]]sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang /_chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab 
[\[165a.2\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/mig gi 'dus 
[\[165a.3\]]te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 
[\[165a.4\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/chu'i 
[\[165a.5\]]khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi 
[\[165a.6\]]pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang /_
[\[165a.7\]]skye ba dang rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/byams 
[\[165b.2\]]pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 
[\[165b.3\]]'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[165b.4\]]par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[165b.5\]]rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom 
[\[165b.6\]]pa'o/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_sems 
[\[165b.7\]]can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed can gyi 'du shes dang /_shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/bde 
[\[166a.2\]]ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/yang dag par 
[\[166a.3\]]spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa 
[\[166a.4\]]ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[166a.5\]]rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i 
[\[166a.6\]]bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa 
[\[166a.7\]]rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /_kun rdzob 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]shes pa dang /_'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/tshul khrims 
[\[166b.2\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/nang 
[\[166b.3\]]stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa drug 
[\[166b.4\]]rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi 
[\[166b.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom 
[\[166b.6\]]pa'o/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[166b.7\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[167a.2\]]phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa 
[\[167a.3\]]bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na blang ba dang /_dor ba rnam par bsgom pa 
[\[167a.4\]]bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam 
[\[167a.5\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par 
[\[167a.6\]]bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba 
[\[167a.7\]]rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'du 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes 
[\[167b.2\]]dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed can gyi 'du shes dang /_shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[167b.3\]]bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par 
[\[167b.4\]]bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom 
[\[167b.5\]]pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[167b.6\]]phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_
[\[167b.7\]]'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[168a.2\]]cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom 
[\[168a.3\]]pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /_
[\[168a.4\]]ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[168a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar 
[\[168a.6\]]mi bsgom mo/_/blang ba dang dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam 
[\[168a.7\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes 
[\[168b.2\]]su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_dngos po med 
[\[168b.3\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed can gyi 'du shes dang /_shed bdag 
[\[168b.4\]]gi 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 
[\[168b.5\]]'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms

[\[168b.7\]]bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang kun 'byung ba shes pa dang 'gog pa shes pa dang lam shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/mngon par shes pa drug 
[\[169a.2\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying 
[\[169a.3\]]rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /_bag chags 
[\[169a.4\]]kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa med do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[169a.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa med do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bar du 
[\[169a.6\]]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag go_/zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags te/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor 
[\[169a.7\]]ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bar la/_'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas/_gang mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pa de la ni thar pa med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la ni sbyin pa 'ang med/_
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]tshul khrims kyang med/_bzod pa 'ang med/_brtson 'grus kyang med/_bsam gtan yang med/_shes rab kyang med/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i bar du yang /_yongs su shes pa med na/_de thar par 
[\[169b.2\]]'gyur ba lta ga las yod/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po mchis/_zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/_dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o/_/
[\[169b.3\]]mi gnyis pa ni dngos po med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i 'du 
[\[169b.4\]]shes ni gnyis so/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/blang ba dang dor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa 
[\[169b.5\]]dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du 
[\[169b.6\]]shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa 
[\[169b.7\]]dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 
[\[170a.2\]]'du shes dang /_shed can gyi 'du shes dang /_shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba'i 
[\[170a.3\]]'du shes dang /_sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[170a.4\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes ni gnyis 
[\[170a.5\]]so/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_

[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ni gnyis 
[\[170b.2\]]so/_/'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/rab 'byor de ltar de snyed du 'du shes dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_de snyed du 'du shes med pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis te/_ji tsam du gnyis pa de 
[\[170b.3\]]tsam du dngos po'o/_/ji tsam du dngos po yod pa de tsam du 'khor ba'o/_/ji tsam du 'khor ba de tsam du sems can rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug 
[\[170b.4\]]pa las yongs su mi 'grol lo/_/'du shes thams cad yid la mi byed pa ni gnyis su med pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes can la sbyin pa med pa dang /_tshul khrims med pa dang /_bzod pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus med pa 
[\[170b.5\]]dang /_bsam gtan med pa dang /_shes rab med pa dang /_lam med pa dang /_thob pa med pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa med par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gnyis kyi 'du shes can la ni chung ngu na 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang med na/_gzugs yongs su shes

[\[171a.1\]]'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su shes par

[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun
