[\[171b.4\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 
[\[171b.5\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_gang la lam bsgom pa med pa de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang ga la 
[\[171b.6\]]yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ga la yod/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa lta yang ga 
[\[171b.7\]]la yod/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga bcu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dngos po'i 'du 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]shes can la/_'thun pa'i bzod pa yang ma mchis pas/_thob pa lta ga la mchis te ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa lta yang ga la mchis te ma mchis na ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes can la/_'thun pa'i 
[\[172a.2\]]bzod pa 'am/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa 'am/_rigs kyi sa'am/_brgyad pa'i sa 'am/_mthong ba'i sa 'am/_bsrabs pa'i sa 'am/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa 'am/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/_
[\[172a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/_lam bsgom pa gang la brten cing /_nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgribs pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob 
[\[172a.4\]]par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spongs pa'i sgrib pa/_nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam mchis sam/_
[\[172a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te chos skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang skye ba ma mchis na/_ji ltar chos de dag ma bskyed par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes 
[\[172a.6\]]can la 'thun pa'i bzod pa med do/_/mngon par rtogs pa'i sa med do/_/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med do/_/rigs kyi sa med do/_/brgyad pa'i sa med do/_/mthong ba'i sa med do/_/bsrabs pa'i sa med do/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med 
[\[172a.7\]]do/_/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/_/lam bsgom pa gang la brten cing nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgribs pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spongs pa'i sgrib pa/_nyan thos 
[\[172b.2\]]dang ldan pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po mchis par 'du 
[\[172b.3\]]shes pa dang dngos po ma mchis par 'du shes pa mchis sam/_gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched dang khams su 'du shes pa dang /_'dod chags su 'du shes pa dang /_'dod chags 
[\[172b.4\]]spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang /_zhe sdang spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_gti mug tu 'du shes pa dang /_gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_ma rig par 'du shes pa dang /_ma rig pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_'du byed du 'du shes pa dang /_'du byed spang 
[\[172b.5\]]bar 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched drug du 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched drug spang bar 'du shes pa 
[\[172b.6\]]dang /_reg par 'du shes pa dang /_reg pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /_tshor ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_sred par 'du shes pa dang /_sred pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_len par 'du shes pa dang /_len pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[172b.7\]]srid par 'du shes pa dang /_srid pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_skye bar 'du shes pa dang /_skye ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_rga shir 'du shes pa dang /_rga shi spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun shes par bya bar 'du shes pa dang /_kun 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_'gog par 'du shes pa dang /_'gog pa mngon 
[\[173a.2\]]du bya bar 'du shes pa dang /_lam du 'du shes pa dang /_lam bsgom par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes pa 'am/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis sam/_bcom ldan 
[\[173a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang la yang dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa med do/_/
[\[173a.4\]]gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'thun pa'i bzod pa'o/_/gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni lam 
[\[173a.5\]]bsgom pa'o/_/gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po med par 'du shes med pa de nyid ni 'bras bu'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa ste/_mngon par rtogs pa yang dngos po med pa'o/_/
[\[173a.6\]]rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs des kyang /_'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin 
[\[173a.7\]]gshegs pas chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/_de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba'i yul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa 
[\[173b.2\]]dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/_'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang /_bsam 
[\[173b.3\]]gtan gyi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/_bsam gtan de dag gis bsnyems par ma gyur/_bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar ma gyur/_bsam gtan du dmigs par ma gyur te/_de ltar na ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par 
[\[173b.4\]]gzhag go_/de ltar ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smin par byas nas/_lha'i mig shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/_sems gzhol bar bya/_lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/_sems gzhol bar bya/_pha rol gyi sems shes 
[\[173b.5\]]pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/_sems gzhol bar bya/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/_sems gzhol bar bya/_lha'i mig gi shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/_sems gzhol bar bya/_'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya 
[\[173b.6\]]ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/_mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur/_ro myong bar ma gyur/_dmigs par ma gyur te/_mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas mnyam par gzhag ste/_de ltar ngas 
[\[173b.7\]]skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo/_/zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur te/_de ltar nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[174a.2\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan par gyur nas/_sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[174a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur/_ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa 
[\[174a.4\]]chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bskyed par gyur/_sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te 'dod 
[\[174a.5\]]pa rnams dang /_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/_ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/_gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sdig to mi dge 
[\[174a.6\]]ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/_bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang /_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid med pa/_gzhan gyis dngos po med 
[\[174a.7\]]pa ste/_gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/_rab 'byor de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/_/rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yod de ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/_gzhan gyi dngos 
[\[174b.2\]]po zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po 
[\[174b.3\]]med de/_ngo bo nyid med pa/_gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/_gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs 
[\[174b.4\]]su chud de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_
[\[174b.5\]]bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[174b.6\]]chen po mthar gyis spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis slob pa dang /_mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis slob pa dang /_mthar 
[\[174b.7\]]gyis nan tan du bgyi ba mchis par gyur//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug cu bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dpa' chen pos thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa dag dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[175a.2\]]ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dag las/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_dgra 
[\[175a.3\]]bcom pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'phags pa thams cad dngos po med 
[\[175a.4\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid chung ngu na/_skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas tsam yang med do zhes bya bar thos na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ji ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[175a.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[175a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung /_gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa nyid yin gyis/_ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[175a.7\]]rgyas par bya ste/_sems can dngos po'i 'du shes can la spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/_mthar gyis spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bslabs shing /_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[175b.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba rtsom mo/_/de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[175b.3\]]du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod do/_/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/
[\[175b.4\]]pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu 'jog go_/sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par gyur te/_skyon 
[\[175b.5\]]dang ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin par bya ba dang /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed de/_zas 'dod pa la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos/_spos 'dod pa la ni spos/_phreng ba 'dod 
[\[175b.6\]]pa la ni phreng ba/_byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/_mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me gtong ba nas/_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba dag kyang de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/_sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul 
[\[175b.7\]]khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lha'i che ba nyid dang /_mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[176a.2\]]shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 
[\[176a.3\]]mthong ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin 
[\[176a.4\]]par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /_'khor ba las yongs su 
[\[176a.5\]]grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[176a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/
[\[176a.7\]]gzhan tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de tshul khrims des lha'i che ba nyid dang /_mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/_/de nor med pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 
[\[176b.2\]]mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems 
[\[176b.3\]]dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_
[\[176b.4\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod 
[\[176b.5\]]pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod 
[\[176b.6\]]do/_/gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/gzhan bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de bzod pa'i pha rol du 
[\[176b.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/_/tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung 
[\[177a.2\]]po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_
[\[177a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_
[\[177a.4\]]sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /_'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[177a.5\]]zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag 
[\[177a.6\]]par bskul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/_/gzhan brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su 
[\[177a.7\]]tshim par byed do/_/tshul khrims las rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam 
[\[177b.2\]]par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[177b.3\]]smin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /_'khor ba las yongs su grol 
[\[177b.4\]]bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[177b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la gzhog go_/gzhan yang tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[177b.6\]]'jug pa la rab tu 'god do/_/tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod do/_/gzhan tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag pa de 
[\[177b.7\]]dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing /_sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/_/tshul khrims la rab tu 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par 
[\[178a.2\]]grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_
[\[178a.3\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_rnam pa 
[\[178a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /_'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/
[\[178a.5\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[178a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/_/tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam 
[\[178a.7\]]par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgrub bo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go_/shes rab 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]sgom mo/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab la rab tu gzhog go_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[178b.2\]]legs pa rjod do/_/gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_shes rab bsgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 
[\[178b.3\]]'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de dang /_
[\[178b.4\]]thabs mkhas pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[178b.5\]]smin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /_'khor ba las 
[\[178b.6\]]yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthar gyis spyod pa rtsom ste/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[178b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis 'jug pa la slob ste/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed de/_de sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/_/chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa bsgom 
[\[179a.2\]]mo/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid 
[\[179a.3\]]la mi byed/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes par yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do/_/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la ngo 
[\[179a.4\]]bo nyid med do/_/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[179a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la mi byed/_sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la mi byed/_'od 'dom gang bas yid la mi byed/_
[\[179a.6\]]dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa 
[\[179a.7\]]ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la mi byed/_ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung por yid la mi byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos 
[\[179b.2\]]po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin 
[\[179b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la mi byed/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[179b.4\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yid la mi byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la bya 
[\[179b.5\]]ba med pa ni/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 
[\[179b.6\]]yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/_sangs rgyas 
[\[179b.7\]]rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar na mthar gyis spyad pa dang /_mthar 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_de mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing /_mthar gyis slob pa dang /_mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_pha rol du phyin 
[\[180a.2\]]pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[180a.3\]]pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[180a.4\]]med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[180a.5\]]bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po 
[\[180a.6\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor 
[\[180a.7\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de chos rjes su dran pa sgom na/_dge ba'i 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]chos yid la mi byed/_mi dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed/_'jig rten pa'i chos dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang /_zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos dang /_zang zing med pa'i chos dang /_'phags pa'i chos dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang /_zag 
[\[180b.2\]]pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos dang /_'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang /_gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang /_'dus byas kyi chos dang /_'dus ma byas 
[\[180b.3\]]kyi chos yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la 
[\[180b.4\]]bya ba med pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni 
[\[180b.5\]]chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig 
[\[180b.6\]]smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom ste/_
[\[180b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang /_skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po med pa'i 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med do/_/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran 
[\[181a.2\]]pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[181a.3\]]du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 
[\[181a.4\]]'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[181a.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom zhing /_ma ral ba ma zhig pa ma 'dres pa/_skyon med pa/_ma nyams pa/_mthu dang ldan pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_shin du rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su grub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te/_de 
[\[181a.6\]]tshul khrims de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di 
[\[181a.7\]]ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul 
[\[181b.2\]]tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gtong ba rjes su dran par 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[181b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom zhing /_gang zang zing gtong ba dang /_chos gtong ba yid la mi byed de/_de yan lag dang /_nying lag kyang yongs su gtong na/_dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig 
[\[181b.4\]]smos/_de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /_'di ltar bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o/_/dngos po 'di gtong ba'o/_/'di la gtong bar bya'o/_/snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_
[\[181b.5\]]gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[181b.6\]]chen po gtong ba rjes su dran pa la bslabs shing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la 
[\[181b.7\]]dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_de la dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha rjes su dran pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom ste/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_
[\[182a.2\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa'i lha dag dang /_gzugs na spyod pa dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[182a.3\]]de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni lha rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 
[\[182a.4\]]'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[182a.5\]]bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[182a.6\]]dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mthar gyis spyad pa dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[182a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/_/dran pa nye 
[\[182b.2\]]bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam la bslab par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[182b.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[182b.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[182b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la slob pa'i mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin/_mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin/_mthar gyis 
[\[182b.6\]]'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[182b.7\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yang 
[\[183a.2\]]med na/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_skye mched rnams sam/_khams rnams sam/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams sam/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dam/_
[\[183a.3\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[183a.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[183a.5\]]rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod par 'gyur ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 
[\[183a.6\]]yod par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/_de ni gnas med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo 
[\[183a.7\]]nyid lags na/_'o na ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/_skye mched rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang ma mchis/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ma mchis/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[183b.2\]]rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[183b.3\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar yang ma mchis/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun yang 
[\[183b.4\]]ma mchis/_lam yang ma mchis/_'bras bu yang ma mchis/_nyon mongs pa yang ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba yang ma mchis/_'thob pa yang ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis/_chos thams cad kyang ma mchis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 
[\[183b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la yod pa 'am med pa zhig dmigs su yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_chos thams cad dngos po 
[\[183b.6\]]ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la mchis pa 'am ma mchis pa mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na ci'i phyir khyod de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_gzugs kyang med/_tshor ba dang 'du shes 
[\[183b.7\]]dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang med/_skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang med/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang med/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[184a.2\]]'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang med/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[184a.3\]]pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar yang med/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge 'dun yang med/_lam yang med/_'bras bu yang med nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par byang ba yang med/_'thob pa yang med/_mngon par rtogs pa yang med/_chos thams cad kyang med do/_/
[\[184a.4\]]zhes bya bar sems par gyur/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'di dag la nem nur yang ma mchis/_the tshom yang ma mchis te/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/_dge slong nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[184a.5\]]rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag 'di skad du gal te/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la su zhig_/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhes mchi zhing /_
[\[184a.6\]]de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang bar ma 'tshal bas/_tshul khrims log par 'gyur/_lta ba log par 'gyur/_spyod pa log par 'gyur/_'tsho ba log par 'gyur te/_tshul khrims log par gyur pa dang /_lta ba log par gyur pa dang /_
[\[184a.7\]]spyod pa log par gyur pa dang /_'tsho ba log par gyur pa de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song gsum las gcig tu mchi bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma byung ba'i 'jigs 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]pa de dag mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de zhus pa lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'di dag la nem nur ram/_the tshom ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[184b.2\]]rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u lnga bcu dgu pa'o//_//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[184b.3\]]la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_don ci zhig mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[184b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[184b.5\]]'jug ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dmigs pa ni rgya chung ba ste/_dmigs pa'i 'du shes can thob pa med do/_/mngon par rtogs pa med do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs 
[\[184b.6\]]pa ma mchis pa la thob pa 'am/_mngon par rtogs pa 'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/_mi dmigs pa nyid 
[\[184b.7\]]thob pa'o/_/mi dmigs pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/mi dmigs pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/gang mi dmigs pa la 'thob pa 'am/_mngon par rtogs pa 'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]pa de ni/_chos kyi dbyings la rnam par dkrug par 'dod du zad do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dmigs pa ma mchis pa la yang 'thob pa ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[185a.2\]]pa'i byang chub ma mchis la/_mi dmigs pa nyid 'thob pa/_mi dmigs pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa/_mi dmigs pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po yang 
[\[185a.3\]]ga la mchis/_sa gnyis pa yang ga la mchis/_sa gsum pa yang ga la mchis/_sa bcu pa'i bar du yang ga la mchis/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam 
[\[185a.4\]]par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 
[\[185a.5\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ga la mchis te/_rnam par smin pa'i chos de dag la gnas shing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhal 
[\[185a.6\]]zas dang /_btung ba dang /_na bza' dang /_gzims cha dang /_pho brang dang /_yo byad dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mar me dang /_
[\[185a.7\]]lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gis rim gro bgyid cing /_de la de dag rgyun mi chad par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du sku gdung dang /_nyan thos dag la rnam par smin par gyur kyang bas par mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par bgyid par mi 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir mi dmigs pa de nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 
[\[185b.2\]]dbyings rnam par 'khrug par mi byed de/_de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bcu pa nyid kyi bar du'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o/_/de nyid 
[\[185b.3\]]kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab bo/_/de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las 
[\[185b.4\]]byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[185b.5\]]su dag par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_na bza' dang /_gzims cha dang /_pho brang dang /_yo byad dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[185b.6\]]chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mar me dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gis rim gro byed cing /_de la de dag rgyun mi chad par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sku gdung dang /_nyan 
[\[185b.7\]]thos dag la rnam par smin par gyur kyang /_zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]pa rnams la bye brag ni ci zhig mchis/_tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mi dmigs pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[186a.2\]]dang /_shes rab dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la tha dad du bya ba gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor gos pa med pa'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_gos pa med pa'i mngon par shes 
[\[186a.3\]]pa dag la ni tha dad du bya bar bstan to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gos pa ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams ji ltar tha dad du 
[\[186a.4\]]bgyi bar bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa mi dmigs/_gtong ba mi dmigs/_gtong ba po mi dmigs/_len pa po mi 
[\[186a.5\]]dmigs par sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims mi dmigs par tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa mi dmigs par bzod pa sgrub bo/_/brtson 'grus mi dmigs par brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs par snyoms par 'jug go_/shes 
[\[186a.6\]]rab mi dmigs par shes rab sgom mo/_/mngon par shes pa mi dmigs par mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[186a.7\]]pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam mi dmigs par lam la spyod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs par gzugs med pa'i 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs par/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[186b.2\]]smon pa med pa mi dmigs par/_smon pa med pa la spyod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[186b.3\]]rig pa rnams mi dmigs par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod do/_/sems can rnams mi 
[\[186b.4\]]dmigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[186b.5\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_de la bdud sdig to can rnams 
[\[186b.6\]]sam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[186b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rnam par 
[\[187a.2\]]thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa 
[\[187a.3\]]nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa 
[\[187a.4\]]chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[187a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa gang gtang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/tshul khrims gang srung ba dang /_bzod pa gang sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms 
[\[187a.6\]]par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_dran pa 
[\[187a.7\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gang sgom pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gang sgom pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la gang sgom pa de/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[187b.2\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gang sgom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po 
[\[187b.3\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/mtshan rnams dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 
[\[187b.4\]]yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bsam gtan rnams 
[\[187b.5\]]dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams 
[\[187b.6\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[187b.7\]]par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mi chen po'i mtshan rnams dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs

[\[188b.1\]]bzod pa gang sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/nang stong 
[\[188b.2\]]pa nyid gang sgom pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[188b.3\]]rol du phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[188b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_

[\[188b.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar na sbyin pa gtong ba dang /_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab sgom pa dang /_de la gnyis kyi 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa dang /_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_

[\[189a.4\]]rnams sgom pa dang /_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mngon par sgrub pa dang /_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[189a.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa der pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing 
[\[189a.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[189a.7\]]par byed de/_de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa der/_pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]su rdzogs par byed de/_de byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos der pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gang gi tshe/_shes 
[\[189b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa gtong ba de'i tshe/_zag pa med pa'i sems la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de zag pa med pa'i sems de la gnas pa'i mtshan ma dang /_gang sbyin pa dang /_gang la sbyin pa dang /_gang gis sbyin 
[\[189b.3\]]pa dang /_gang yongs su gtong ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems zag pa med cing ser sna dang bral ba/_chags sems med pa des sbyin pa gtong ste/_de sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ji ltar sems 
[\[189b.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar sbyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_
[\[189b.5\]]mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/_tshul khrims de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_

[\[189b.7\]]cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus de yang 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_mtshan ma dang bral 
[\[190a.2\]]ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[190a.3\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/_shes rab de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[190a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi

[\[190a.6\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_

[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /_dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[190b.2\]]mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[190b.3\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 
[\[190b.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[190b.5\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_

[\[190b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong ba yin te/_
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_gnas dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang sa le 
[\[191a.2\]]sbram dang dngul dang mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag dang chung ma dang bu dang bu mo 'am/_phyi dang nang ngam yan lag dang nying lag dang /_rgyal srid kyang rung rgyan gyis brgyan cing /_slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ste/_gal te de'i drung du la la zhig 'ongs shing /_
[\[191a.3\]]'di skad du khyod kyi sbyin pa de lta bur/_de ltar phan pa med pa/_mi brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du bdag la sems can 'di dag 
[\[191a.4\]]khyod kyi sbyin pa de ltar phan pa med pa/_mi brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis sbyin pa yongs su btang bar bya'i/_bdag gis sbyin pa mi sbyin par mi bya'o snyam nas/_de sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun 
[\[191a.5\]]mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_ci nas kyang yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_gang sbyin pa dang /_gang la sbyin pa dang /_gang gis sbyin pa dang /_su yongs su gtong ba dang /_ci yongs su gtong ba dang /_su ci yongs su 
[\[191a.6\]]gtong ba dang /_ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang la yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_su yongs su bsngo ba dang /_ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan ma yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar yongs su bsngo 
[\[191a.7\]]ste/_de gang gtong ba dang /_gang gi phyir btang ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu'i dngos po de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo /_/des de ltar chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/_ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/_gang la yongs 
[\[191b.2\]]su bsngo bar 'gyur/_gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te/_de'i bsngo ba de lta bu ni bsngo ba'i dam pa yin/_dug med pa'i bsngo ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi bsngo ba yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes 
[\[191b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[191b.4\]]yongs su 'dzin to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[191b.5\]]rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa 
[\[191b.6\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang 
[\[191b.7\]]dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin te/_'on kyang de'i 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]yo byad bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub bo/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[192a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo /_/de yo byad de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang bsnyen bkur byed lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byas so/_/des sems can de dag 
[\[192a.3\]]gi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des yang dag par bsdus te/_thabs mkhas pas theg pa gsum la rab tu 'jog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed 
[\[192a.4\]]pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[192a.5\]]chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[192a.6\]]par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[192a.7\]]med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de la 'phags pa'i tshul khrims zag pa med pa lam gyi khongs su chud pa chos nyid kyis thob pa rab 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]tu 'thob ste/_de'i tshul khrims de ni ma zhig pa yin/_ma god pa yin/_ma 'dres pa yin/_rnyog pa med pa yin/_ma nyams pa yin/_rang dbang yod pa yin/_shin tu rdzogs pa yin/_mkhas pas bstod pa yin te/_tshul khrims des gzugs sam/_
[\[192b.2\]]tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar ram/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/_khyim bdag 
[\[192b.3\]]che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_
[\[192b.4\]]tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_'du shes med pa'i lha rnams sam/_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya 
[\[192b.5\]]nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/_rgyun du 
[\[192b.6\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang /_tshul khrims 'dis thob par bya'o/_/zhes chos gang la yang snyems 
[\[192b.7\]]pa med do/_/gzhan du na tshul khrims de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mtshan ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_gnyis su med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ste/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]snyad du'i don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dang /_thabs mkhas pas ro myong ba med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo/_/de lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/_lha'i mig rnam par smin 
[\[193a.2\]]pa las byung ba des/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[193a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i mig rnam par smin pa las byung ba des/_lho dang nub dang byang dang /_byang shar dang shar lho dang /_lho nub dang nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 
[\[193a.4\]]phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[193a.5\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa'i sgra thos te/_de'i thos pa de yang ji srid du thob pa des bdag 
[\[193a.6\]]dang /_gzhan gyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems kyi rnam pa shes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes te/_des sems kyi rnam pa shes pa de yang ji srid du sems kyi rnam pa shes pa des sems 
[\[193a.7\]]can thams cad kyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas/_sems can de dag gi 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shes shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sems can de dag la 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par bsal lo/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/de dag de ltar yang dag par bstan pa dang /_yang dag par dga' ba'i bar du byas pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/zag pa 
[\[193b.2\]]zad pa'i shes pas kyang sems can rnams/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go_/rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go_/byang chub 
[\[193b.3\]]la rab tu gzhog go_/de bzhin du sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la mthu yod pa de dang de la rab tu gzhog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[193b.4\]]byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[193b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[193b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[193b.7\]]med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/_'di lta ste/_gnod pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gnyis sgom ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i gnod pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod pa ni/_de'i drung du sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs te/_gshe zhing mi snyan par brjod de/_rdo ba dang /_dbyig pas brdegs shing /_mtshon gyis btab kyang de la byang chub
