[\[194a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_de la gang spyo ba dang /_mi snyan par smra bar bya ba dang /_gang bcing brdeg par bya ba gang yang med/_gang la 
[\[194a.3\]]gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_brdeg pa dang /_'debs pa de yang med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[194a.4\]]thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog na/_chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_chos rnams kyi rang bzhin dmigs pa lta ga la yod de/_des de ltar chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/ci'i phyir bzod pa 
[\[194a.5\]]zhes bya zhe na/_nyon mongs pa mi skye ba dang /_ye shes mi chod pa'i phyir bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o/_/de bzod pa de gnyis la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[194a.6\]]bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang 
[\[194a.7\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[194b.2\]]mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas te/_lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[194b.3\]]gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[194b.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar rgyun mi 'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag thams cad la gnas te/_'phags pa'i chos mngon 
[\[194b.5\]]par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas te/_lha'i mig gis lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_
[\[194b.6\]]lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/_tshad med/_dpag tu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[194b.7\]]ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad do/_/de lha'i rna ba mi las 'das pas/_
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa thos te/_thos nas kyang 'dzin te/_bzung nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed do/_/de bzhin nyid du nan tan byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de sems kyi 
[\[195a.2\]]rnam grangs shes pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes so/_/'phags pa thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang rab tu shes so/_/de sems can 
[\[195a.3\]]thams cad kyi sems/_sems kyis yongs su shes par byas shing /_de bzhin nyid du chos ston to/_/de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pas/_sems can de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su shes par byas shing /_yang sems can de dag la 
[\[195a.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par bskul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/de zag pa zad pa shes te/_zag pa zad pa shes pa des/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[195a.5\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/_mtshan ma 
[\[195a.6\]]dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/
[\[195a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams 
[\[195b.2\]]theg pa gsum gyis 'khor ba las yongs su 'grel to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung 
[\[195b.3\]]ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 
[\[195b.4\]]dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[195b.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang 
[\[195b.6\]]po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/_de lus kyi brtson 'grus la gnas nas/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_
[\[195b.7\]]bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/_/nyi ma dang zla ba'i bar du lag pas byugs shing /_tshangs pa'i 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyi dbang bsgyur te/_de lus kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa des/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med/_grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[196a.2\]]ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag tu song zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/_na bza' 
[\[196a.3\]]dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang po de dag kyang /_nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du zad par mi 'gyur te/_byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[196a.4\]]sangs rgyas nas kyang gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bde bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod 
[\[196a.5\]]pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du song zhing chos nyan te/_ji skad du thos pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar 
[\[196a.6\]]du nam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[196a.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa med 
[\[196b.2\]]pa/_lam gyi yan lag gi khongs su chud pa dang ldan pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan 
[\[196b.3\]]ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/_
[\[196b.4\]]lus kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed/_ngag gi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed/_yid kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do/_/rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba 'am/_bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_bdag 
[\[196b.5\]]ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba 'am/_zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_dge zhes bya ba 'am/_mi dge zhes bya ba 'am/_'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/_'jig rten las 'das zhes bya ba 'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 
[\[196b.6\]]'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/_kha na ma tho ba med ces bya ba 'am/_zag pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/_zag pa med ces bya ba 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes 
[\[196b.7\]]bya ba 'am/_'dus byas zhes bya ba 'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar sems pa med do/_/'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams sam/_zag pa med pa'i khams sam/_
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bsam gtan dang po 'am/_bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/_bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/_bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/_byams pa 'am/_snying rje 'am/_dga' ba 'am/_btang snyoms sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam 
[\[197a.2\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dam/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[197a.3\]]du phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[197a.4\]]rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs 
[\[197a.5\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma med pa 'am/_smon pa med pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin tam/_gzungs 
[\[197a.6\]]kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yang /_rtag ces bya ba 'am/_
[\[197a.7\]]mi rtag ces bya ba 'am/_bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag med ces bya ba 'am/_zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_dge zhes bya ba 'am/_mi dge zhes bya ba 'am/_'jig rten zhes bya ba 'am/_'jig rten 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]las 'das zhes bya ba 'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/_kha na ma tho ba med ces bya ba 'am/_zag pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/_zag pa med ces bya ba 'am/_kun nas 
[\[197b.2\]]nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba 'am/_'dus byas zhes bya ba 'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya bar bsnyems pa med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur bsnyems pa med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[197b.3\]]bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyid dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyems pa med do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[197b.4\]]dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya bar bsnyems pa med do/_/sems can 'di dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis brjod pa 'di dag ni bsrabs pa'i sas brjod pa/_'di dag ni dam pa 
[\[197b.5\]]ma yin pa'i cha can gyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni bla ma'i cha can gyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis brjod pa zhes bya bar yang bsnyems 
[\[197b.6\]]pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid gang gis brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid de/_sems las byung ba'i brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas mngon du gyur kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/brtson 
[\[197b.7\]]'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi dmigs so/_/de sems kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin kyang de la chags pa med de/_de chags pa med pa rnams kyi 
[\[198a.2\]]don byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/_rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang dang gang gis rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul de dang des rnam par 'phrul te/_
[\[198a.3\]]me tog gi char dbab pa 'am/_spos kyi ngad dgye ba 'am/_'brug gi sgra bsgrag pa 'am/_glu dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra bsgrag pa dang /_sa bskyod pa dang /_snang ba bstan pa 'am/_rin po che sna bdun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bstan pas rnam par 'phrul te/_gang 
[\[198a.4\]]dang gang du gang dang gang sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdag gi lus las 'gyed de/_sems can rnams kyi don du bar 'ga' ba dag 'gyed do/_/bar 'ga' dri zhim po 'gyed do/_/bar 'ga' srog gcod pa med pa'i mchod sbyin chen po byed do/_/
[\[198a.5\]]bar 'ga' sems can mtha' yas pa lam ma yin pa nas 'don te/_srog gcod pa las zlog go_/ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_phra ma smra ba dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_chags 
[\[198a.6\]]sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba las yongs su 'grel to/_/la la la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs/_la la la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs/_la la'i don du yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don du ni bu dang /_chung ma 
[\[198a.7\]]yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don du ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don du ni bdag yongs su gtong ste/_de ltar thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/_
[\[198b.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung 
[\[198b.3\]]ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[198b.4\]]byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[198b.5\]]ma gtogs par/_ting nge 'dzin gzhan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la 
[\[198b.6\]]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_
[\[198b.7\]]btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas so/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa de la gnas shing /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs 
[\[199a.2\]]dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar 
[\[199a.3\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la 
[\[199a.4\]]gnas nas/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud par byas shing /_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o/_/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas/_rigs kyi sa dang /_
[\[199a.5\]]brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/
[\[199a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/des de dag la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma thob kyi bar du 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par mi byed de/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la 
[\[199a.7\]]gnas shing /_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/sangs 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed de/_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[199b.2\]]su 'gro zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/de la sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su bsdud do/_/la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdud do/_/la la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bsdud do/_/la la ni shes rab kyis yongs su bsdud do/_/
[\[199b.3\]]la la ni rnam par grol bas yongs su bsdud do/_/la la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su bsdud do/_/la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go_/la la ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[199b.4\]]bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go_/la la ni rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go_/la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go_/de de ltar dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang 
[\[199b.5\]]de la sbyor te/_de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par sgrub bo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob bo/_/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob pa yin te/_
[\[199b.6\]]de nam yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nam yang 'dod pa la sten par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa yang gang yang med do/_/skye ba'i nyes pas kyang 
[\[199b.7\]]yongs su gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad rab tu mthong /_/rab tu rig rab tu rtogs pas na/_de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par byas shing /_sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/_/
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rab tu rig pas/_sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skye ste/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin na/_bdag gis 'di 
[\[200a.2\]]dag nam zhig na sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po skye ste/_de la yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa dmigs su med de des chos thams cad ma dmigs nas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/_
[\[200a.3\]]dmigs su med pa de nyid la sems can rnams 'god de/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[200a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam du yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[200a.5\]]nyid mngon par sgrub ste/_de la gnas nas/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spangs nas bdag gi don kyang byed gzhan gyi don kyang byed de/_des bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas/_lha dang mi dang lha 
[\[200a.6\]]ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rim gro'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med 
[\[200a.7\]]pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 
[\[200b.2\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems dang po bskyed pa 
[\[200b.3\]]nas nye bar bzung ste/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag pa 'am yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do/_/gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_
[\[200b.4\]]'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yang 
[\[200b.5\]]dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_gzugs kyi skye ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des gzugs kyi 
[\[200b.6\]]skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye 
[\[200b.7\]]ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_gzugs kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]mthong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_gsob nyid dang /_gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi yang 
[\[201a.2\]]dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[201a.3\]]mthong ngo /_/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes 
[\[201a.4\]]su ma mthong bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_gsob nyid dang /_gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes 
[\[201a.5\]]dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs 
[\[201a.6\]]par byed de/_/de de ltar rtogs par byed cing /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am 
[\[201a.7\]]'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_skye mched dam khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'am/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid rnams sam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_'phags pa'i 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[201b.2\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams sam/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[201b.3\]]pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ram/_chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/de dngos po med pa'i 
[\[201b.4\]]ngo bo nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[201b.5\]]rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa 
[\[201b.6\]]dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs 
[\[201b.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin to/_/de byang chub kyi lam rnam par smin pa'i chos can la gnas pas/_pha rol du phyin pa drug 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas/_sems 
[\[202a.2\]]can de gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang /_tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang 
[\[202a.3\]]bzod pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la shes 
[\[202a.4\]]rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de 
[\[202a.5\]]dag la yang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so/_/gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod do/_/gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[202a.6\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod do/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas rnam par 
[\[202a.7\]]'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/_/de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las 'dod pa'i rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par bsgrubs te/_de sems can 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/_des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/_'di ltar dper na gzhan 'phrul 
[\[202b.2\]]dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang /_skyid pa de lta bu dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan btsal ba dang /_bral ba dag dang /_longs spyod dang skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag der 'byung ste/_de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[202b.3\]]rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung 
[\[202b.4\]]ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /_chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob ste/_gal te 
[\[202b.5\]]ji tsam du gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /_skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba 
[\[202b.6\]]dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa de bzhin du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[202b.7\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing der longs spyod dang /_skyid pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bzung ba med pa 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]ste/_chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba med pa'i phyir yang sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams 
[\[203a.2\]]cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[203a.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la pha rol du phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[203a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u drug cu pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[203a.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing /_mtshan ma ma mchis la/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/_ji ltar na pha rol du phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[203a.6\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_zag pa dang bcas 
[\[203a.7\]]pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang /_ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' ba lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du 'dus pa lags/_
[\[203b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la/_'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pa de dag rnam par ji lta bur gdags par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[203b.3\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul 
[\[203b.4\]]khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_
[\[203b.5\]]dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/de 'di 
[\[203b.6\]]ltar rtog ste/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_
[\[203b.7\]]dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rmi lam la rang bzhin gang yang med do/_/sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang mig yor dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]khyer dang /_sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang med do/_/gang la rang bzhin med pa de la mtshan nyid med de/_gang mtshan nyid med pa de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/zhes bya bar rtogs par byed de/_rab 'byor 
[\[204a.2\]]rnam grangs des na/_khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_sbyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/gtong ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/len pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/_gang de ltar shes nas sbyin pa gtong ba de ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[204a.3\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[204a.4\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go_/de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas shing /_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[204a.5\]]'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[204a.6\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[204a.7\]]smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa thun 
[\[204b.2\]]mong ma yin pa/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song 
[\[204b.3\]]zhing /_na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/_longs spyod dang skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs 
[\[204b.4\]]su bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do/_/gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang bsam gtan gyis yongs su 
[\[204b.5\]]bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do/_/gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud 
[\[204b.6\]]do/_/de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /_dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/_'khor ba nye bar len kyang /_
[\[204b.7\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te/_de sems can rnams kyi don du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/_phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis/_sems can rnams yongs su sdud do/_/de chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]shes pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so/_/rang byang chub shes kyang 
[\[205a.2\]]de la mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par byas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[205a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas/_pha rol du phyin pa drug mtshan nyid med par shes so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtshan nyid med par shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[205a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_
[\[205a.5\]]gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[205a.6\]]de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam lta bur shes/_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes 
[\[205a.7\]]nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa/_ma zhig pa/_ma ral ba/_skyon med pa/_rnyog pa med pa/_nyams pa med pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_shin tu rdzogs pa/_'phags par gyur pa/_zag pa 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]med pa/_lam gyi khongs su chud pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa/_yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la gnas shing /_yang dag par blang ba'i brda dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /_chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[205b.2\]]dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang /_spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang /_mi spyod pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo /_/de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang /_'dis bdag rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 
[\[205b.3\]]dang /_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/_rgyal phran nam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/_
[\[205b.4\]]sum cu rtsa gsum 'am/_mtshe ma 'am/_dga' ldan nam/_'phrul dga' 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[205b.5\]]bu 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_byang chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des snyems pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/_'di ltar dngos po med 
[\[205b.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig pas na mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo /_/mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo /_/mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am mtshan nyid med pa'i 
[\[205b.7\]]chos kyis kyang /_mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i tshe/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob ste/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[206a.2\]]rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed 
[\[206a.3\]]cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang /_'khor ba'i las rnam par 
[\[206a.4\]]smin pas gos par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar dper na sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/_sdod pa 'am/_'dug pa 'am nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba 'am/_'ong ba 'am/_sdod pa 'am/_'dug pa 'am/_nyal ba 'ang mi dmigs te/_de sems can 
[\[206a.5\]]rnams kyi don kyang byed do/_/sems can dang sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug cu drug pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de 
[\[206a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin du zhi ba zhes bya ba/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can tshad med pa 
[\[206a.7\]]theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas/_des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas/_sprul pa sprul pa 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]mdzad de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[206b.2\]]byang chub tu lung bstan te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am 'du shes sam 'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_dngos po gang yang dmigs su med do/_/
[\[206b.3\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs la sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[206b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad khongs su chud par shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[206b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 
[\[206b.6\]]la gnas te/_mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[206b.7\]]rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang /_chos khongs su chud pa'i 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bzod pa'o/_/de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang 
[\[207a.2\]]dang yang 'ongs shing /_gshe ba 'am/_mi snyan par brjod cing /_ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer bar gyur tam/_rdo dbyig dang /_mtshon chas brdegs sam/_btab kyang /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[207a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/_sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa 'am/_gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par mi bya ste/_phyir sems can de dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/_'di dag 
[\[207a.4\]]la bdag gis sdig to'i sems mi bskyed kyi 'di ni bdag nyid kyis phung po dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i len to zhes de dag lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o/_/byams pa dang ldan te/_snying rje bar gyur nas/_rnam pa de ltar rtog pa 'di ni nyams su 
[\[207a.5\]]len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos khongs su chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/_sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmigs su med na/_bdag la gshe ba 'am/_mi snyan par brjod pa 'am/_ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba 'am/_rdo dbyig 
[\[207a.6\]]gis rdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de/_'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu/_gsob/_gsog_/rag las pa/_nam mkha' lta bu/_bdag dang sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can 
[\[207a.7\]]dang /_shed bdag dang bral ba ste/_rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/_bdag la gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba dang /_rdo dbyig gis rdeg cing mtshon gyis 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/_/bdag gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/_de ltar rnam par brtag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/_de de ltar yongs su rtog cing /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[207b.2\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/_de spangs pa ni ci 
[\[207b.3\]]mchis/_ye shes ni ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'o/_/de gang gis shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ba ste/_shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/gsol pa/_
[\[207b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag tu bgyi ba ci 
[\[207b.5\]]mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa 
[\[207b.6\]]dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i 
[\[207b.7\]]shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/_
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/_nyan thos dang /_
[\[208a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te/_de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yongs su rdzogs 
[\[208a.3\]]pas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/_de mngon par shes pa lnga dang mi 'bral ba yin/_de mngon par shes pa rnams dang 
[\[208a.4\]]mi 'bral bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/_de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_skad cig gcig dang 
[\[208a.5\]]ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs 
[\[208a.6\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_
[\[208a.7\]]sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs te/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems 
[\[208b.2\]]can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[208b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa med pa lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa lam gyi khongs su chud pas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar 
[\[208b.4\]]gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_bsam 
[\[208b.5\]]gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[208b.6\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su 'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[208b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yongs su rdzogs pas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar 'gyur ro/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu snang bar thob par byas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba 
[\[209a.2\]]dang /_rab tu g.yo ba dang /_kun nas g.yo ba dang /_'gul ba dang /_rab tu 'gul ba dang /_kun nas 'gul ba dang /_ldeg pa dang /_rab tu ldeg pa dang /_kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang 
[\[209a.3\]]ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung zhing dbyangs grag par gyur pa'i sgra de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/_sems can gang ji snyed kyi 
[\[209a.4\]]thos pa/_de thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[209a.5\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[209a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[209a.7\]]gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched 
[\[209b.2\]]dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/yang dag 
[\[209b.3\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par/_nyan thos dang /_thun mong ba 'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang /_gzhan yang ting 
[\[209b.4\]]nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing /_nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang /_ting nge 'dzin de dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro yang myong bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di 
[\[209b.5\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin de dag gi_/mtshan nyid med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/_dngos po med 
[\[209b.6\]]pa'i chos kyang /_dngos po med pa'i chos kyis ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur te/_de ro myong bar byed pa med pas/_ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang gis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[209b.7\]]zhe na/_'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang mi dmigs/_gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gang gis snyoms par 'jug par yang mi dmigs so/_/de mi dmigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis pha rol du phyin pa des/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[210a.2\]]chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[210a.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir te/_stong pa nyid 'di dag la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am 
[\[210a.4\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub 'am/_gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de 
[\[210a.5\]]yang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/_stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go_/gsol pa bcom 
[\[210a.6\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/_skyon ma mchis pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[210a.7\]]po'i skyon no/_/mi dmigs pa thams cad ni skyon med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang lags/_mi dmigs pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/mig dang gzugs ni byang chub sems 
[\[210b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/rna ba dang sgra dang /_sna dang dri dang /_lce dang ro dang /_lus dang reg bya dang /_yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_
[\[210b.3\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o/_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni 
[\[210b.4\]]dmigs pa'o/_/sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmigs pa'o/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang 
[\[210b.5\]]gzugs dang skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang /_srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi ni dmigs pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /_
[\[210b.6\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa 
[\[210b.7\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni dmigs pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dmigs pa ste skyon no/_/rab 'byor skyon med pa ni gang la 
[\[211a.2\]]gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 
[\[211a.3\]]dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[211a.4\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams 
[\[211a.5\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /_chos de dag gi brjod pa yang dmigs su med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs la rang bzhin 
[\[211a.6\]]med de gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rang bzhin 
[\[211a.7\]]med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa 
[\[211b.2\]]dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[211b.3\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[211b.4\]]kyi bar la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon med par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[211b.5\]]snyoms par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de ni/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye na/_'dod chags sam/_zhe sdang ngam/_gti mug gis skye bar 'gyur zhing de la gnas te/_de'i las mngon par 'du byed 
[\[211b.6\]]pa dang /_las de mngon par 'du byed pas/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/gzhan du na sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad kyi don byed de/_sems can nam sgyu mar 
[\[211b.7\]]yang dmigs pa med do/_/de sems can dang sgyu ma mi dmigs pas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du ste/_mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo 
[\[212a.2\]]skor ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_
[\[212a.3\]]smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs 
[\[212a.4\]]su 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[212a.5\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam mi mthong ngo /_/rmi lam mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sgra brnyan mi thos so/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa mi mthong ngo /_/mig yor mi mthong ngo /_/mig 
[\[212a.6\]]yor mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mi mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mi mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 
[\[212a.7\]]kyi rmi lam ni phyin ci log go_/sgra brnyan ni phyin ci log go_/mig yor ni phyin ci log go_/sgyu ma ni phyin ci log go_/smig rgyu ni phyin ci log go_/sprul pa ni phyin ci log go_/dgra bcom pa ni rmi lam mi mthong ngo /_/rmi lam mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sgra brnyan 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]mi thos so/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa mi mthong ngo /_/mig yor mi mthong ngo /_/mig yor mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mi mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mi mthong ngo /_/sprul 
[\[212b.2\]]pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rmi lam mi gzigs so/_/rmi lam mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/sgra brnyan mi gsan 
[\[212b.3\]]to/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa mi gzigs so/_/mig yor mi gzigs so/_/mig yor mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/sgyu ma mi gzigs so/_/sgyu ma mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/smig rgyu mi gzigs so/_/smig rgyu mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/sprul pa mi 
[\[212b.4\]]gzigs so/_/sprul pa mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar yang dag pa ma yin pas/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos 
[\[212b.5\]]thams cad yongs su grub pa med na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po'i 'du shes sam/_yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes sam/_yang dag pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba lta ga la 
[\[212b.6\]]yod de/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te chos la la zhig gi ngo bo nyid dam/_yongs su grub pa 'am/_yang dag par gyur pa zhig dmigs na ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[212b.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_gzugs la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/_/khams dang skye mched dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la chags pa med do/_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]'dod pa'i khams la chags pa med do/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams la chags pa med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la chags pa med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[213a.2\]]du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chags pa med do/_/nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la chags pa med do/_/
[\[213a.3\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la chags pa med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar 
[\[213a.4\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do/_/de bzhin 
[\[213a.5\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[213a.6\]]nyid kyi bar la chags pa med do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/_de la 
[\[213a.7\]]'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_sa dgu pa dang /_
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes 
[\[213b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang mi dmigs so/_/de mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der chos thams cad kyang 'dus par mthong ste/_chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[213b.3\]]de ni 'di ltar chos de dag dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de/_gnyis su byar med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag ni tha dad du bya ba gang yang med de/_chos kyi dbyings su bstan pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du bstan pa dang 
[\[213b.4\]]yang dag pa'i mthar bstan pas/_chos thams cad dbyer med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/_ji ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar 'jig rten pa dang /_
[\[213b.5\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bstan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[213b.6\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_
[\[213b.7\]]dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' gang yang brjod du yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs des na/_'di 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]ltar chos thams cad dbyer med pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/_
[\[214a.2\]]tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/_'du byed ces bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'am/_pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_
[\[214a.3\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba 'am/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba 'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_
[\[214a.4\]]'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_thun mong dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_lan cig 
[\[214a.5\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba chos gang gi rang bzhin yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub 
[\[214a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[214a.7\]]thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]yongs su 'dzin to/_/de la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams ci nas kyang dul bar gyur nas/_srid pa gsum na mi snang ba de ltar rnam par btul lo/_/rab 'byor 
[\[214b.2\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang 
[\[214b.3\]]ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dngos po ma mchis pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la/_'di dag ni dge ba'i 
[\[214b.4\]]chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus 
[\[214b.5\]]byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras 
[\[214b.6\]]bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta 
[\[214b.7\]]bu/_mig yor lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_sprul pa lta bu/_dngos po ma mchis pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la/_'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma 
[\[215a.2\]]byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni 
[\[215a.3\]]rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byis pa thos pa 
[\[215a.4\]]dang mi ldan pa so so'i skye bo ni rmi lam yang dmigs la/_rmi lam mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/sgra brnyan yang dmigs la/_sgra brnyan nyan pa yang dmigs so/_/mig yor yang dmigs la/_mig yor mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/sgyu ma yang 
[\[215a.5\]]dmigs la/_sgyu ma mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/smig rgyu yang dmigs la/_smig rgyu mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/sprul pa yang dmigs la/_sprul pa mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/des rmi lam yang dmigs/_rmi lam mthong ba yang dmigs/_
[\[215a.6\]]sprul pa'i bar yang dmigs/_sprul pa mthong ba yang dmigs nas/_lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis mi dge ba'i 'dus bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang 
[\[215a.7\]]yid kyis bsod nams dang /_bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid gnyis la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_khams gsum 'di ni stong pa ste/_'di la gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_skye mched 
[\[215b.2\]]rnams sam/_khams rnams med do/_/'di ni rmi lam/_'di ni sgra brnyan/_'di ni mig yor/_'di ni sgyu ma/_'di ni smig rgyu/_'di ni sprul pa ste/_'di la phung po rnams sam/_skye mched rnams sam/_khams rnams med do/_/'di la rmi lam med do/_/rmi lam 
[\[215b.3\]]mthong ba med do/_/sgra brnyan med do/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa med do/_/mig yor med do/_/mig yor mthong ba med do/_/sgyu ma med do/_/sgyu ma byed pa med do/_/smig rgyu med do/_/smig rgyu mthong ba med do/_/sprul pa med do/_/sprul pa byed pa med do/_/chos 'di dag thams 
[\[215b.4\]]cad ni dngos po med pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_'on kyang khyed ni phung po med pa la phung por 'du shes pa/_skye mched med pa la skye mched du 'du shes pa/_khams med pa la khams su 'du shes pa dag ste/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 
[\[215b.5\]]'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa/_las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su bzung ba yin na/_khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po med pa la/_dngos po'i 'du shes su byed ces te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[215b.6\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can ser sna can dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor te/_sbyin pa yongs su btang ba de yang de dag la longs spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/des de dag de las bskyod nas tshul 
[\[215b.7\]]khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor te/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de yang de dag la mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/des de dag de las bskyod nas/_ting nge 'dzin la sbyor te/_ting nge 'dzin de yang de dag la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]ro/_/des de dag de las bskyod nas bsam gtan dang po la sbyor te/_bsam gtan dang po las bsam gtan gnyis pa/_bsam gtan gnyis pa las bsam gtan gsum pa bsam gtan gsum pa las bsam gtan bzhi pa/_bsam
