[\[216a.2\]]gtan bzhi pa las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[216a.3\]]par 'jug pa las/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/_/des sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 
[\[216a.4\]]'bras bu dma' ba de las rnams grangs du mas bskyod de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su dbugs 'byin to/_/gzhog go_/rab tu 'god do/_/des tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod 
[\[216a.5\]]de phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go_/des ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[216a.6\]]bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med 
[\[216a.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/
[\[216b.2\]]yang dag par gzeng bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go_/rab tu 'god do/_/de zag pa med pa'i chos gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_de dag gis gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag 
[\[216b.3\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[216b.4\]]gang dgra bcom pa nyid don du gnyer ba de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/_/gang rang byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do/_/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag la byang chub kyi lam rjod cing ston to/_/yang dag 
[\[216b.5\]]par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go_/rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_
[\[216b.6\]]sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la rnam par dgod par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[216b.7\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_chos thams cad mtha' las 'das 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i 
[\[217a.2\]]chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur 
[\[217a.3\]]ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur 
[\[217a.4\]]ba'o/_/zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par bgyid pa ni/_ngo mtshar de rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de ltar byang chub 
[\[217a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/
[\[217a.6\]]'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag 
[\[217a.7\]]ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes bya bar rnam par dgod par byed pa de ni ngo mtshar te rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/
[\[217b.2\]]rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos de shes kyang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la slar phan gdags par bya ba sla ba ma yin te/_khyed cag 
[\[217b.3\]]thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de zil gyis [(]mnon [,]gnon[)]par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[217b.4\]]dpa' chen po la mchis pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de'i phyir shin du legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[217b.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rnam 
[\[217b.6\]]par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[217b.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas shing /_phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song zhing /_sems can gang 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyis phan gdags par 
[\[218a.2\]]bya ba de dag la ni shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_bsam gtan 
[\[218a.3\]]bzhi pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du 
[\[218a.4\]]shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la byams pas phan gdags par 
[\[218a.5\]]bya ba de dag la ni/_byams pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_btang snyoms kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[218a.6\]]bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[218a.7\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_snying rje chen pos phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_snying rje chen pos phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[218b.2\]]gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[218b.3\]]tshe/_sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zas 'dod pa rnams la 
[\[218b.4\]]zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams 
[\[218b.5\]]la mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas dang mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul zhing yongs su gtong ba dang /_ji ltar 
[\[218b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_yang dag par song ba rnams dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yongs su gtong ba de 
[\[218b.7\]]bzhin du mir gyur pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la yang tha dad du bya ba med pa'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ni tha dad du bya ba med pa ste/_des tha dad du bya ba med pa'i sbyin pa byin pas/_tha dad du bya ba med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gal te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[219a.2\]]sems dpa' chen pos/_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sbyin pa'i gnas ma byin pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs 
[\[219a.3\]]pa ma yin no/_/snyam na/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag la ni/_sbyin pas 
[\[219a.4\]]phan gdags par bya'o/_/'di dag la ni sbyin pas phan gdags par mi bya'o/_/zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/_yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin te/_de dag sbyin pas phan btags nas/_rgyal rigs 
[\[219a.5\]]che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_sbyin pa de nyid kyis phan btags pa de dag_/theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan 
[\[219a.6\]]las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis/_gsad par gsol ba btab na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[219a.7\]]sems dpa' chen pos/_sbyin no snyam 'am/_mi sbyin no snyam pa'i sems gzhan bskyed par mi bya'i/_'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis/_skye bo'i tshogs de dag la sbyin par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi don du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/_yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir/_gal te rnam par rtog na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[219b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_slob pa rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i/_'jig rten gyis smad par 'gyur te/_
[\[219b.3\]]de la thog mar sems can thams cad kyi mgon gyis shig_/ce 'am/_gnas dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen gyis shig_/ces sus gsol ba gdab ces smad par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang /_gal 
[\[219b.4\]]te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_drung du mir gyur pa 'am/_mi ma yin par gyur pa dag 'ongs zhes/_bdag ni slongs mo ba'o/_/zhes yan lag dang /_nying lag gcad par gsol ba btab na/_de'i tshe 
[\[219b.5\]]des sbyin nam/_mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_sems can rnams kyi don du ched du bsams te/_lus 
[\[219b.6\]]'dis bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o/_/zhes lus yongs su bzung bas na/_de 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi don du/_lus yongs su bzung bzung bas de dag bslang mi dgos par khyer zhing deng shig_/
[\[219b.7\]]ces sems bskyed par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slongs mo 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]ba mthong na/_'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med na/_'di la su zhig ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong /_su la ni sbyin par bya/_ci zhig sbyin par bya/_zhes sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[220a.2\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag ni/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid la ni gang la yang yongs su gtong ba 'am/_gang las kyang phrogs pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[220a.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/_/de stong pa nyid la gnas shing sbyin pa gtong na/_de'i sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[220a.4\]]rol du phyin pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/_phyi nang gi chos la bcad cing gtubs kyang /_bdag la su yang gtub pa 'am/_gcod snyam pa'i sems 
[\[220a.5\]]mi 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams 
[\[220a.6\]]te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul 
[\[220a.7\]]gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[220b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/_rnam par langs nas lha dang mi dag dang /_skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_
[\[220b.3\]]rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_
[\[220b.4\]]nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen 
[\[220b.5\]]po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[220b.6\]]kyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po 
[\[220b.7\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 
[\[221a.2\]]'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen 
[\[221a.3\]]bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma 
[\[221a.4\]]gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dang bas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[221a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud mi gson to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang /_
[\[221a.6\]]lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub 
[\[221a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus pas 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]shin tu dang bar bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[221b.2\]]par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud mi gzon to//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug cu bdun pa/_/rab 'byor nga sa yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/_
[\[221b.3\]]'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba 
[\[221b.4\]]byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems 
[\[221b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des/_byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha 
[\[221b.6\]]dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das las chos thos te/_de 
[\[221b.7\]]bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 
[\[222a.2\]]'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang 
[\[222a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs 
[\[222a.4\]]bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa 
[\[222a.5\]]dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des/_byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas/_lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs 
[\[222a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 
[\[222a.7\]]'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su rim gyis mya ngan las yongs su 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_
[\[222b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[222b.3\]]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 
[\[222b.4\]]lha'i 'jig rten dang /_mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor 
[\[222b.5\]]ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems 
[\[222b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na/_sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa 
[\[222b.7\]]de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]'jig rten dang /_mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[223a.2\]]rab 'byor nga sa yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la 
[\[223a.3\]]chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las/_lha'i bu de dag gis 
[\[223a.4\]]chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas 
[\[223a.5\]]shas cher myos pa de dag la/_gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag_/'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad 
[\[223a.6\]]ni bdag med pa/_'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas 
[\[223a.7\]]yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/_lho dang nub dang byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[223b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 
[\[223b.3\]]'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/_gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag_/'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_'du byed 
[\[223b.4\]]thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/_'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta 
[\[223b.5\]]su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems 
[\[223b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang /_tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang /_gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba 
[\[223b.7\]]skyed/_ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang nub dang byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang 
[\[224a.2\]]lho nub dang /_nub byang dang 'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/_sems can gang dag tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye 
[\[224a.3\]]grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang /_gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces/_lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[224a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di 
[\[224a.5\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_
[\[224a.6\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang don 'thun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang nub dang byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang 
[\[224a.7\]]lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dang tshig snyan pa dang don spyad pa dang don 'thun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis 
[\[224b.2\]]sems can rnams sdud de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[224b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gser ram dngul lam nor bu 'am mu tig gam bai DUr+ya 'am dung ngam man shel lam byi ru'am sa le sbram 'am zas sam skom 'am gdugs sam gos sam spos sam phreng 
[\[224b.4\]]ba 'am byug pa 'am mal cha'am stan nam 'tsho ba 'am bud med dam skyes pa 'am rta 'am glang po che 'am bdag po yongs su gtong na 'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur sheg bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang mi dgos par khyer cig_/long la deng shig 
[\[224b.5\]]ces brjod de/_sbyin pa des sbyin pa byin nas/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/chos la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do/_/la la ni yan lag brgyad dang 
[\[224b.6\]]ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do/_/la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do/_/la la ni bsam gtan dang po la/_la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la/_la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la/_la la ni bsam 
[\[224b.7\]]gtan bzhi pa la 'god do/_/la la ni byams pa la/_la la ni snying rje la/_la la ni dga' ba la/_la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do/_/la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/_la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/_la la ni cung 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]zad med pa'i skye mched la/_la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do/_/la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni 
[\[225a.2\]]tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni lus la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag pa la/_la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang 
[\[225a.3\]]dag par skul lo/_/la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la/_la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la/_la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la/_la la ni dbang po lnga la/_la la ni stobs lnga la/_la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/_
[\[225a.4\]]la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la/_la la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la/_la la ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[225a.5\]]par 'jug pa dgu la/_la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la/_la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la/_la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni byams pa chen po la/_la la ni snying rje chen po la/_
[\[225a.6\]]la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par 
[\[225a.7\]]skul lo/_/la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/_la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/_la la ni rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo/_/la 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]la ni byang chub la/_la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la/_la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems 
[\[225b.2\]]can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na 
[\[225b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/
[\[225b.4\]]rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_ma nor bar bstan pa ste/_'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang /_
[\[225b.5\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/_rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[225b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/_rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de la skyod do/_/de las bskyod nas thabs mkhas pas/_'phags pa'i chos rnams dang /_'phags 
[\[225b.7\]]pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do/_/de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo/_/'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid de/_rab 'byor

[\[226a.3\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa shes pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes pa'o/_/nang stong 
[\[226a.4\]]pa nyid shes pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun shes pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_
[\[226a.5\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[226a.6\]]rnams shes pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[226a.7\]]brgyad shes pa'o/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa med pa'i chos rnams dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so/_/byang chub 
[\[226b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o/_/
[\[226b.3\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[226b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[226b.5\]]sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag tu ci zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bye brag yod do/_/
[\[226b.6\]]gsol pa/_bye brag ci lta bu zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa 
[\[226b.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa thob pa la/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/_de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de 
[\[227a.2\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing /_thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[227a.3\]]nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[227a.4\]]pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[227a.5\]]gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_smon gnas shes 
[\[227a.6\]]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_shin du yongs su dag pa bzhi dang /_dbang bcu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_bsrung ba med pa gsum 
[\[227a.7\]]dang /_dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]dang /_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/_'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la 
[\[227b.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang gi lus dang /_phyi'i lus dang /_phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/_shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_
[\[227b.3\]]yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /_rnam par spyod do/_/lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing /_rnam par spyod do/_/lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/lus la kun 'byung ba dang /_zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod 
[\[227b.4\]]do/_/lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/_/nang gi tshor ba dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dang /_phyi nang gi tshor ba dang /_nang gi sems dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_phyi nang gi sems dang /_nang gi 
[\[227b.5\]]chos dang /_phyi'i chos dang /_phyi nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can/_shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la kun 'byung ba'i 
[\[227b.6\]]rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/_/rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma 
[\[227b.7\]]skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang /_bskyed pa rnams spong ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin du rgyas par bya ba dang /_bsgom 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o/_/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/_mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems dang brtson 'grus dang 
[\[228a.2\]]dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/_/rab 'byor dbang po lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang 
[\[228a.3\]]po ste/_de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor stobs lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs te/_de dag ni stobs lnga zhes 
[\[228a.4\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' 
[\[228a.5\]]ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes 
[\[228a.6\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag 
[\[228a.7\]]pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[228b.2\]]zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_
[\[228b.3\]]de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams 
[\[228b.4\]]mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched 
[\[228b.5\]]la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam 
[\[228b.6\]]par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te/_gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/_
[\[228b.7\]]'di la la la 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam par rtog 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa de nye bar zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar 
[\[229a.2\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes 
[\[229a.3\]]brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa'i 
[\[229a.4\]]btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 
[\[229a.5\]]'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par 
[\[229a.6\]]shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar 
[\[229a.7\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/_mtha' dag sa dang 
[\[229b.2\]]mtha' dag chu dang mtha' dag me dang mtha' dag rlung dang /_mtha' dag sngon po dang mtha' dag ser po dang mtha' dag dmar po dang /_mtha' dag dkar po dang /_mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang /_mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/_de dag 
[\[229b.3\]]ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/_/de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/_nang gzugs su 'du shes shing /_phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang /_kha dog sdug gu dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de 
[\[229b.4\]]dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/_/nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi 
[\[229b.5\]]sdug pa mthong yang /_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo 
[\[229b.6\]]dang /_kha dog sdug gu dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang /_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du 
[\[229b.7\]]shes shing /_phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang /_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/_kha dog sngon po sngon por snang ba/_mdog sngon po 'di lta ste dper na me tog o ma ka lta bu 'am/_yul bA rA 
[\[230a.2\]]Na sIr byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/_kha dog sngo ba sngo bar snang ba/_mdog sngo bar mthong yang /_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/_/
[\[230a.3\]]nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing /_phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/_kha dog ser po/_ser por snang ba/_mdog ser po 'di lta ste dper na/_shing kar shi ka ra'i me tog lta bu 'am/_yul bA rA Na sIr byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/_
[\[230a.4\]]kha dog ser ba/_ser bar snang ba/_mdog ser bar mthong yang /_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/_/nang gzugs med 
[\[230a.5\]]par 'du shes shing /_phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/_kha dog dmar po/_dmar por snang ba/_mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/_dper na ban du dzi ba ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/_yul bA rA Na sIr byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/_kha dog dmar 
[\[230a.6\]]ba/_dmar bar snang ba mdog dmar bar mthong yang /_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing 
[\[230a.7\]]phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/_kha dog dkar po/_dkar por snang ba/_mdog dkar po/_'di lta ste dper na/_skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/_yul bA rA Na sIr byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/_kha dog dkar ba/_dkar bar snang ba/_
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan la gnas nas/_
[\[230b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa/_ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/smon lam gyi shes 
[\[230b.3\]]pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan la gnas te/_'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa 'am/_shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/_de ting nge 'dzin de las 
[\[230b.4\]]langs nas/_de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing /_shes bya de yang shes pa de ni/_smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i mig gi mngon par 
[\[230b.5\]]shes pa dang /_lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/_drug po de dag go_/de 
[\[230b.6\]]la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go_/de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/_tshe la dbang ba 
[\[230b.7\]]dang /_sems la dbang ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba dang /_las la dbang ba dang /_skye ba la dbang ba dang /_mos pa la dbang ba dang /_smon lam la dbang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_ye shes la dbang ba dang /_chos la dbang 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]ba ste/_bcu po de dag go/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gnas ma yin pa la 
[\[231a.2\]]yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dang /_las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang /_rgyu'i rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[231a.3\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/khams sna tshogs can dang /_khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang /_mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[231a.4\]]mkhyen to/_/sems can gzhan dang /_gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/kun du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang 
[\[231a.5\]]chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rnam pa du 
[\[231a.6\]]mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/_tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/_tshe rabs brgya dang /_tshe rabs stong dang /_tshe rabs brgya stong dang /_tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs so/_/bskal pa 
[\[231a.7\]]gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/_bskal pa brgya'i bar dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]te/_bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go_/ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/zas ni 'di za za'o/_/yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so/_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam 
[\[231b.2\]]zhig tu gyur te/_bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/_che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du/_rnam pa dang bcas/_sa mal dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar 
[\[231b.3\]]sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so/_/lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/_sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dag kyang gzigs so/_/kha dog sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bde 'gro na 
[\[231b.4\]]'khod pa dang /_ngan song na 'khod pa dang /_las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang 
[\[231b.5\]]ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta ba dag ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/_ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[231b.6\]]ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dag ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du 
[\[231b.7\]]skye'o/_/zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/_/zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir/_sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba dang zag pa med pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]pa'i stobs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_'di la chos 'dis mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar 
[\[232a.2\]]bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa 'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_
[\[232a.3\]]rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/_bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go_/tshangs 
[\[232a.4\]]pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/_bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/_
[\[232a.5\]]de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/_/zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur 
[\[232a.6\]]ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i 
[\[232a.7\]]gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar ma nus pa 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa 'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs 
[\[232b.2\]]gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag la bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa 
[\[232b.3\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pas rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/_
[\[232b.4\]]gzhan sus kyang rung ste chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis yang dag par bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan 
[\[232b.5\]]pa de dag la nan tan byas na/_sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 
[\[232b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pas rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog 
[\[232b.7\]]rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[233a.2\]]chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/_de dag kyang gang zhe na/_don la dmigs pa dang /_chos la dmigs pa dang /_nges pa'i tshigs la dmigs 
[\[233a.3\]]pa dang /_spobs pa la dmigs pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag 
[\[233a.4\]]pa mi mnga' bas/_la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin 
[\[233a.5\]]gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/_la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs 
[\[233a.6\]]kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/_la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung 
[\[233a.7\]]ba med pa gsum pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/_la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing /_bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang /_chos 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan tu byed na yang /_des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/_yid bde bar mi 'gyur/_thugs yeng yeng por yang mi 'gyur te/_'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o/_/la la rna ba btud te rim gror nyan cing 
[\[233b.2\]]bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang /_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na/_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/_mi bzod par mi 'gyur thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni dgongs pa nye bar 
[\[233b.3\]]gzhag pa gnyis pa'o/_/la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/_la la rna ba btud de rim gror mi nyan cing /_bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med 
[\[233b.4\]]de/_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang /_des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/_thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/_thams cad du dgongs pa dang /_ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar 
[\[233b.5\]]gzhag pa gsum pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/_gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste/_de ni nyams 
[\[233b.6\]]pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang /_lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de 
[\[233b.7\]]lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi brda nye bar 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bzung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir/_dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/_dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can 
[\[234a.2\]]mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/_de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/_/
[\[234a.3\]]ca co mi mnga'o/_/dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/_/thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o/_/ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/_/mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi 
[\[234a.4\]]mnga'o/_/dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams 
[\[234a.5\]]pa mi mnga'o/_/sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba 
[\[234a.6\]]ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go_/da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs 
[\[234a.7\]]pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/_gang la dmigs pa med pa/_dran pas dbang bsgyur ba/_zhi ba'i rnam pa 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug cu brgyad pa/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu 
[\[234b.2\]]rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /_bdun shin du mtho ba dang /_sor mo ring ba dang /_rting 
[\[234b.3\]]pa yangs pa dang /_sku che zhing drang ba dang /_zhabs legs par mtho ba dang /_yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang /_phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang /_gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang /_gser 
[\[234b.4\]]gyi kha dog dang /_mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang /_spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang /_seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /_phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang /_phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba'i 
[\[234b.5\]]mchog dang /_shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang /_ljags shin du yangs pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang /_tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /_tshems shin tu mnyam pa dang /_tshems 
[\[234b.6\]]thags bzang ba dang /_tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang /_spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/_rnam 
[\[234b.7\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/_rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas/_phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/_/zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]shin tu gnas pa'o/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/_phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa'o/_/shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin du 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/_/
[\[235a.2\]]phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin du mtho bas bdun shin du mtho ba'o/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o/_/rting pa ring pas rting pa yangs pa'o/_/sku lag pa bdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o/_/pus mo'i 
[\[235a.3\]]lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o/_/spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i byin pa dang /_smig ma dang /_ldum bu ngar ba ltar drang zhing mnyams la/_rim 
[\[235a.4\]]gyis gzhol bar grub cing /_byin pa zlum pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o/_/brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/_/glang po dang rta cang shes ltar 
[\[235a.5\]]gsang ba'i gnas shin du mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/_gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/_/shin du sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/_/gser dang dngul shin du sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i 
[\[235a.6\]]mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul gyis mi gos pas mdog shin du 'jam pa'o/_/shin du rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su med pas/_spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o/_/me tog kun da dang /_zla ba dang /_'o ma dang /_
[\[235a.7\]]ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/_nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin du brgyan pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o/_/ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do/_/mgur dang rgyud legs par 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'brel cing /_lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/_/gser gyi gtan pa shin du phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin du rgyas pa'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyis ma nyams shing /_rnam par 
[\[235b.2\]]shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go_/sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o/_/spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pas dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas 
[\[235b.3\]]dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/_/me tog ud pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin du yangs pas ljags shin du yangs shing srab pa'o/_/tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so/_/'gram pa 
[\[235b.4\]]me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/_yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/_/me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin du dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin du dkar ba'o/_/tshems la mtho 
[\[235b.5\]]dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o/_/tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba'o/_/bla 'og gye gu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o/_/dkar gnag gi cha ma 'dres la shin du rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma 
[\[235b.6\]]yog pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/_/rdzi ma bla 'og shin du legs par gnas la ma 'dzing bas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/_/de la bla ma la bsu bskyal dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_mchod rten la sogs pa la bsti stang 
[\[235b.7\]]byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/_de ni 'khor shin du mang ba'i snga ltas so/_/yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin du gnas pa ste/_de ni mi g.yo zhing shin du brtan pa'i snga ltas so/_/sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang /_don spyod 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa dang /_don 'thun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas/_phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ste/_de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so/_/bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/_phyag dang 
[\[236a.2\]]zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /_bdun shin du mtho ba ste/_de gnyis ni bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba 'thob pa'i snga ltas so/_/bcings pa bkrol ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang /_srog gcod pa spangs 
[\[236a.3\]]pas sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs pa dang /_sku che zhing drang ba ste/_de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so/_/dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /_bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par ma byas pas/_zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang /_yan 
[\[236a.4\]]lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa ste/_de ni mi nyams pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so/_/rig pa dang bzo'i gnas rim gror byas shing /_gzhan byin pa dang /_bdag gis blangs pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/_de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas 
[\[236a.5\]]so/_/bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'gong par gtong zhing /_med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/_de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so/_/'grogs pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_gnyen bam phye ba dang /_bye bar gyur 
[\[236a.6\]]pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /_gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/_gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/_de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so/_/stan dang gos dang khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang /_gnas bzang 
[\[236a.7\]]po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin du 'jam pa ste/_de gnyis ni gdan dang /_na bza' dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga ltas so/_/'du 'dzi spangs pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]pha ma dang /_phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang /_btsun par byas pa dang /_bcol ba rnal ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang /_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/_de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so/_/
[\[236b.2\]]mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la/_snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa 'thun par 'dzin pas/_seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /_phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/_de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so/_/nad pa rnams la rtsi dang rim gro dang sman pa dang /_
[\[236b.3\]]nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang /_rim gro byas pas phrag so shin du rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog ste/_de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/_/skyed mos tshal dang /_'khor dang /_btung ba dang rdzing bu dang /_rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang /_kha zas dang 
[\[236b.4\]]phreng ba'i gnas dang /_stegs dang /_gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing /_bdag gis gzhan la byin pas/_shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/_de ni mnga' chen po mnga' 
[\[236b.5\]]ba'i snga ltas so/_/yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang /_nyams su bde bar smras pas/_ljags shin du yangs shing srab pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/_de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/_/gsung 
[\[236b.6\]]yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /_rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /_mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang /_zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang /_gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /_ma 'khrugs shing gsal 
[\[236b.7\]]ba'o/_/yun ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing /_dus su smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/_de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/_/rim gror bya ba dang /_brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/_tshems shin 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]du dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/_de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so/_/yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra bas/_tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/_de ni 'khor dbyer mi 
[\[237a.2\]]phyed pa'i snga ltas so/_/pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang /_rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/_de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/_/rab 
[\[237a.3\]]'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben 
[\[237a.4\]]pa ste/_sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[237a.5\]]ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/_sen mo mtho ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/_sor mo zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du tshogs pa ste/_sor mo rgyas pa 
[\[237a.6\]]yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/_sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang /_sku'i phrin las dang /_'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/_rtsa 
[\[237a.7\]]mi mngon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste/_rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/_long bu mi mngon pa yin/_sangs 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/_zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/_seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i 
[\[237b.2\]]glang po ste/_glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/_ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/_khyu 
[\[237b.3\]]mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/_g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/_mdzes par bzhud pa yin/_
[\[237b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/_mi yo bar bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/_sku shin tu legs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[237b.5\]]ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin du sbyangs pa ste/_sku shin du sbyangs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/_sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang /_
[\[237b.6\]]gsung dang /_thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin du gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin du 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang 
[\[237b.7\]]bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku shin du rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin du rdzogs pa ste/_dpe byad shin du rdzogs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/_sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku legs par mnyam pa yin/_
[\[238a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/_sku shin du gzhon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku zhum pa med pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[238a.3\]]ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/_sku shin du rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/_sku shin du mkhregs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten 
[\[238a.4\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/_yan lag dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin du dag pa ste/_snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs 
[\[238a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_phyal zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin du sbyangs pa ste/_phyal shin du 'phyang ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[238a.6\]]rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/_phyal ma zhom pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/_phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin du thugs su chud pa ste/_lte 
[\[238a.7\]]ba zab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/_kun nas mdzes pa yin/_
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin du gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/_kun spyod pa shin du gtsang ba yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/_sku la sme ba med pa yin/_sangs 
[\[238b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar rab tu yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/_phyag shing bal ltar shin du 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/_phyag gi ri 
[\[238b.3\]]mo snum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin du zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[238b.4\]]ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/_zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bkye ba ste/_zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[238b.5\]]ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/_ljags shin du 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/_ljags shin du srab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod
