[\[238b.6\]]chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/_ljags shin du dmar ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang /_'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/_glang po'i nga ro dang /_'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa 
[\[238b.7\]]yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang /_nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun du sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/_
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]tshems mche ba shin du zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/_tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin du dkar ba ste/_tshems mche 
[\[239a.2\]]ba shin du dkar ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/_mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/_tshems mche ba rim 
[\[239a.3\]]gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/_las legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/_shangs shin du gtsang 
[\[239a.4\]]ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/_spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin du rnam par dag pa ste/_spyan rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[239a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin du bsags pa ste/_rdzi ma stug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang /_na chung mchog gi mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug 
[\[239a.6\]]pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/_spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/_smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[239a.7\]]rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/_smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]snum gyis/_sems can snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/_smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/_snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[239b.2\]]'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/_snyan mnyam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/_snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[239b.3\]]rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/_zhal dpral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin du 'dul ba ste/_zhal dpral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[239b.4\]]'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin du rdzogs pa ste/_dbu shin du rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/_dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong 
[\[239b.5\]]ba dang bsgoms pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste dbu skra stug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/_dbu skra 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag 
[\[239b.6\]]tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/_dbu skra ma 'dzings pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/_dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me 
[\[239b.7\]]tog gis skye bo 'thun par bsgrubs pa ste/_dbu skra dri zhim pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang /_bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin/_rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang bstan pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[240a.2\]]chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo 
[\[240a.3\]]mtshar dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug gis 
[\[240a.4\]]sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[240a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams 
[\[240a.6\]]cad ma 'dus pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_
[\[240a.7\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[240b.2\]]dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gi don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[240b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[240b.4\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'doms shing 'di skad ston to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod tshur sheg_/yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig 
[\[240b.5\]]la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig_/yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig_/
[\[240b.6\]]yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig_/ces chos ston 
[\[240b.7\]]to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/_
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/_de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas par bya ba la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 
[\[241a.2\]]'di lta ste/_dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang /_yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/_chos la mkhas pa dang /_yi ge la mkhas pas/_yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos 
[\[241a.3\]]ston kyang /_rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/_gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong 
[\[241a.4\]]ma yin pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/_sems can yang shin du mi 
[\[241a.5\]]dmigs/_chos kyang mi dmigs/_chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[241a.6\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod 
[\[241a.7\]]pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mi 
[\[241b.2\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/_sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/_de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/_sems 
[\[241b.3\]]can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas/_gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can 
[\[241b.4\]]mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas/_mi chen po'i mtshan 
[\[241b.5\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis so/_/gzugs ma mchis so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par 
[\[241b.6\]]shes pa ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so/_/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis 
[\[241b.7\]]so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/
[\[242a.2\]]phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o/_/phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/
[\[242a.3\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang shed can dang 
[\[242a.4\]]shed bdag dang byed pa po dang byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/yang 
[\[242a.5\]]dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[242a.6\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[242a.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sangs 
[\[242b.2\]]rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/_phyin 
[\[242b.3\]]ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/_ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to/_/des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/_chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed/_gnyis su mi byed do/_/
[\[242b.4\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston par byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/_sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor/_la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[242b.5\]]du phyin pa dang /_la la bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor/_la la bsam gtan bzhi dang /_la la 
[\[242b.6\]]tshad med pa bzhi dang /_la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/_la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor/_la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_la la mthar gyis 
[\[242b.7\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_la la stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/_la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/_la la de 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_la la byams pa chen po dang /_la la snying rje chen po dang /_la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[243a.2\]]la sbyor/_la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/_la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_la la dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_la la rang byang chub la sbyor/_la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[243a.3\]]kyi bar la sbyor na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[243a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/_ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god 
[\[243a.5\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_gzugs 
[\[243a.6\]]kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma 
[\[243a.7\]]bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin du rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni shin du rnam par dag pa'o/_/
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin du rnam par dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so/_/
[\[243b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 
[\[243b.3\]]mi gnas pa'i tshul dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas 
[\[243b.4\]]par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/_dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so/_/rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so/_/gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad 
[\[243b.5\]]dmigs su med de/_gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la yang mi gnas so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed 
[\[243b.6\]]de/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_
[\[243b.7\]]nyan thos rnams dang /_'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /_nyan thos de 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dag gis kyang chos nyid de'i rjes su rtogs te/_chos nyid de'i rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston te/_de yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' 
[\[244a.2\]]ba med do/_/de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[244a.3\]]ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la yang 'da' ba ma mchis/_de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis na/_ci lags/_'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[244a.4\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rnam pa 
[\[244a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/
[\[244a.6\]]gzugs kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang 
[\[244a.7\]]gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gzugs kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[244b.2\]]shes pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang 
[\[244b.3\]]dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/_'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing /_nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten/_dkar po'i 
[\[244b.4\]]chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi/_dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba/_mi gnag cing dkar pa'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing dkar ba ni rgyun du zhugs 
[\[244b.5\]]pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[244b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/_'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan gyi don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/_brjod 
[\[244b.7\]]du med pa tha snyad med pa ste/_'di ltar ming bden pa dang /_gzugs bden pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ste/_'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/_'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/_don dam pa'i bden pa ma lags na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo de thams 
[\[245a.2\]]cad kyang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[245a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/_don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/_gal te shes na ni de dag kyang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[245a.4\]]bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/_rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la/_lam yang med/_lam rnam par dgod pa yang med/_lam bsgom 
[\[245a.5\]]pa yang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta ga las 'ong /_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod/_lam bsgom pa yang yod pas na/_de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod 
[\[245a.6\]]pa yod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/_'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 
[\[245a.7\]]'thob pa 'am/_'bras bu thob par bya ba med do/_/rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/_lam gyis 'bras bu thob par bya ba yang med do/_/lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa byed de/_'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam 
[\[245b.2\]]par dgod par mi byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/_
[\[245b.3\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems bsrabs pas/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/'og ma'i cha can gyis kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bla ma'i cha can gyis kun du 
[\[245b.4\]]sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/gang ci yang rung ste/_kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[245b.5\]]pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/_gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun du 
[\[245b.6\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/_'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis 
[\[245b.7\]]pa'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/_de'i tshe 'dus byas shes sam/_'dus ma byas shes chos gang la yang ris su gcod 
[\[246a.2\]]pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_nang stong 
[\[246a.3\]]pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bzung ste/_sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos mi ston to/_/de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol du 
[\[246a.4\]]phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan dang po'am/_bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/_bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/_bsam gtan 
[\[246a.5\]]bzhi pa 'am/_byams pa 'am snying rje 'am dga' ba 'am btang snyoms sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[246a.6\]]par 'jug pa 'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams 
[\[246a.7\]]sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_lam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[246b.2\]]rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/_chos gang la 
[\[246b.3\]]yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de mngon par zhen pa med pas gang la yang chags pa med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtang yang /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams 
[\[246b.4\]]su myong ba med de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[246b.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang 'dus byas 
[\[246b.6\]]dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[246b.7\]]chos rnams sgom mo/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_chos thams cad la spyod pa/_chos gang la yang gnas pa 'am/_chags pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin du khong du chud do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par sgrub pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/_drug 
[\[247a.2\]]cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu 
[\[247a.3\]]rtogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/phyi nang gi chos rnams 
[\[247a.4\]]la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes 
[\[247a.5\]]dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[247a.6\]]sum cu rtsa bdun la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[247a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[247b.2\]]la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa 
[\[247b.3\]]yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug cu dgu pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang /_kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 
[\[247b.4\]]'gyur la/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mi gda' na lam bsgom du ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur 
[\[247b.5\]]ba 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la rten 
[\[247b.6\]]te/_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247b.7\]]sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[248a.2\]]ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par 
[\[248a.3\]]shes pa ma mchis/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[248a.4\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_lha 'am/_mi dag las yongs 
[\[248a.5\]]su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams 
[\[248a.6\]]gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so/_/mthong ngo rtogs so/_/sprul pa lta bur shes so mthong ngo rtogs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[248a.7\]]'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/_rtogs la/_sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/_rtogs pa lags na/_gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[248b.2\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa lags/_de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_
[\[248b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis/_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub 
[\[248b.4\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/_rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod do/_/sems can rnams yongs 
[\[248b.5\]]su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/_sgra brnyan lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_mig yor lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu/_sprul pa 
[\[248b.6\]]lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams gyen du skyod par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[248b.7\]]sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du skyod do/_/gsol pa bcom 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/_mtshan ma ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_ming zhes bya ba 'am/_mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi ming gis sgro btags so/_/'di lta ste ming 
[\[249a.2\]]zhes bya ba 'am/_mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/_gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/_tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/_'du byed ces bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_bud med ces bya ba 'am/_skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_khye'u zhes 
[\[249a.3\]]bya ba 'am/_bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/_sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas pa zhes bya ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/_lha zhes bya ba 'am/_mi zhes bya ba 'am/_'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/_'dus ma 
[\[249a.4\]]byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/_yang dag par 
[\[249a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/_rab 'byor ming thams cad ni ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/_de dag la byang chub sems 
[\[249a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas/_ming thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/_yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig_/
[\[249a.7\]]chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes bskul ba byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/_gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /_gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/rab 
[\[249b.2\]]'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/_phra ba 'am bzang ba 'am ngan pa 'am/_rgyang ring ba 'am/_thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun du rtog pas bzung ba ste/_'di 
[\[249b.3\]]ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/_gzugs med pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/_mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma 
[\[249b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing /_mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/_ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan 
[\[249b.5\]]ma'o/_/'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan 
[\[249b.6\]]ma las rnam par bkrol zhing /_mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do/_/gsol pa/_gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas te/_ming dang mtshan mar bas la/_btags pa tsam du bas te/_yongs su btags pa las byung ba 
[\[249b.7\]]lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/_gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing /_dge 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/_dngos po'i 
[\[250a.2\]]mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_khyad par 'thob par yang mi 'gyur te/_gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar dngos 
[\[250a.3\]]po'i mtshan ma yang med/_dngos po yang med pas na/_rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[250a.4\]]par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med 
[\[250a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[250a.6\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[250a.7\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[250b.2\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[250b.3\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/_rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyis khyon 
[\[250b.4\]]cig mtshan ma yod na yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos mtshan ma med pa/_dran pa med pa/_yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/_sems can 
[\[250b.5\]]rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro/_rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/_dran pa med pa yid la bya ba med pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[250b.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing /_dran pa ma mchis te/_yid la 
[\[250b.7\]]bgyi ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so/_/'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/_/'di dag 
[\[251a.2\]]ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la nyan thos 
[\[251a.3\]]kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_mtshan 
[\[251a.4\]]ma med pa yang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 
[\[251a.5\]]rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/rang byang chub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/gsol pa/_
[\[251a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma 
[\[251a.7\]]med pa 'di la bslab pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/_'di lta ste/_pha rol du phyin pa drug dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam 
[\[251b.2\]]gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[251b.3\]]shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[251b.4\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la bslab par bya 
[\[251b.5\]]ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/_'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/_/mtshan ma dang bral ba ni 
[\[251b.6\]]mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/_skye mched bcu gnyis la 
[\[251b.7\]]slob pa yin/_khams [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/_pha rol du phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/_nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/_dran 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa 
[\[252a.2\]]yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[252a.3\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 
[\[252a.4\]]dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gis 
[\[252a.5\]]tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[252a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rab tu shes te/_gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang /_gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so/_/de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa 
[\[252a.7\]]yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_lbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin du gsong ldong dang /_shin du gse tshags dang /_shin du snying po med par rab tu shes te/_de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]pa yin zhe na/_gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song ba der shes pa ste/_de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 
[\[252b.2\]]'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/_mi 'gag_/'ong ba med/_'gro ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_
[\[252b.3\]]'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_chu'i chu bur gsog 
[\[252b.4\]]tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang 
[\[252b.5\]]mi 'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/_mi 'gag_/'ong ba 
[\[252b.6\]]med/_'gro ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing /_de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na tshor ba'i de 
[\[252b.7\]]bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_smig rgyu la chu shin du mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du 'gro ba med pas/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa 
[\[253a.2\]]shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag_/'ong ba med/_'gro ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_
[\[253a.3\]]de phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_chu shing gi shun pa so sor phye na/_snying po shin du mi dmigs 
[\[253a.4\]]pa de ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas 
[\[253a.5\]]kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/_mi 'gag_/'ong ba med/_'gro ba med/_kun nas 
[\[253a.6\]]nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa 
[\[253a.7\]]shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[253b.2\]]shes pa yin zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag pa/_'ong ba med/_'gro ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de'i 
[\[253b.3\]]phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong /_phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/_de ltar 
[\[253b.4\]]na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[253b.5\]]kyang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[253b.6\]]khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te/_de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[253b.7\]]du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang /_chad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na/_rten cing 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/_kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang /_'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i 
[\[254a.2\]]bden pa shes pa yin te/_ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal shes pa yin/_bden pa shes pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/_gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/_gnyis 
[\[254a.3\]]su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 
[\[254a.4\]]sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/_de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin 
[\[254a.5\]]nyid shes pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos 
[\[254a.6\]]de dag de ltar 'tshal na/_des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs par mi 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni/_rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[254a.7\]]chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/_/gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so/_/de ltar ma dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar brtags pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[254b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur/_bcom 
[\[254b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/_/gsol pa/_/
[\[254b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung ste/_dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de 
[\[254b.5\]]bzhin du gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'di lta ste/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho 
[\[254b.6\]]ba med pa'i chos dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa 
[\[254b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te/_chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin 
[\[255a.2\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[255a.3\]]ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'phags 
[\[255a.4\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[255a.5\]]med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen 
[\[255a.6\]]po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la 
[\[255a.7\]]bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bar bgyi ba dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_
[\[255b.2\]]tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang dge rgyas dang che ba dang chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du 
[\[255b.3\]]bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du 
[\[255b.4\]]shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa dang bdun pa dang brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang /_
[\[255b.5\]]sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag 
[\[255b.6\]]par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing /_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[255b.7\]]rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzugs la bslab par bgyi/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]bslab par bgyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_nang 
[\[256a.2\]]stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la bslab par bgyi/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_
[\[256a.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[256a.4\]]rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[256a.5\]]pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[256a.6\]]bar la bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/_mi spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings la ni 
[\[256a.7\]]rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/_gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten 
[\[256b.2\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/pha rol 
[\[256b.3\]]du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid 
[\[256b.4\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_
[\[256b.5\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams las 
[\[256b.6\]]gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags te/_gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa 
[\[256b.7\]]chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma 
[\[257a.2\]]lags/_rang byang chub las gud na chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[257a.3\]]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji 
[\[257a.4\]]skad du smras pa de de bzhin no/_/gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes 
[\[257a.5\]]pa'o/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa 
[\[257a.6\]]bdun nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[257a.7\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[257b.2\]]pa rnams so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/_/
[\[257b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi 
[\[257b.4\]]dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/_chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[257b.5\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su shes nas/_chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/_'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o/_/'di ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_/rnam par shes pa zhes 
[\[257b.6\]]bya'o/_/'di dag ni skye mched dang /_khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[257b.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams 
[\[258a.2\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar zhes bya'o zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/_
[\[258a.3\]]sgyu ma byed pa'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te/_gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_ba lang gi gzugs sam/_rnga mo dang /_lug gi gzugs sam/_
[\[258a.4\]]skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs sam/_skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_kun dga'i ra ba mdangs dga' ba 'am/_rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba 'am/_nags tshal mdangs dga' 
[\[258a.5\]]ba dag sprul cing /_de dag tu stan dang /_'khor gyi stan dang /_gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang byug pa dang /_kha zas dang /_spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/_glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byas 
[\[258a.6\]]sam/_sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba 'am/_tshul khrims bsrung ba 'am/_bzod pa bsgrub pa 'am/_brtson 'grus brtsam pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'am/_shes rab bsgom pa 'am/_rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas te/_
[\[258a.7\]]rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/_ri rab bstan tam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang snang ba dang chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang chung dge dang /_
[\[258b.2\]]tshad med dge ba dang dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang /_shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha 
[\[258b.3\]]rnams bstan tam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams bstan tam/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig 
[\[258b.4\]]phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan tam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du 
[\[258b.5\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam 
[\[258b.6\]]gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang /_sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa bcu pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[258b.7\]]mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag yongs 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]su gtong ba dang /_spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su 
[\[259a.2\]]bsgrub pa dang /_snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dag bstan tam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa bstan na/_de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma mi 'dis legs par 
[\[259a.3\]]bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i re mdzes dag byed/_de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing /_gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_glang po'i gzugs dang /_rta'i gzugs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du 
[\[259a.4\]]ston pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to/_/'di lta ste skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan pa/_dpyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/_'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/_mi 'di de ltar med pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 
[\[259a.5\]]'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/_sems can 'di dag ni dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi 
[\[259a.6\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du mi dmigs/_sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs te/_bdag kyang 
[\[259a.7\]]sbyin pa gtong ba yin/_gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/_gzhan 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]yang tshul khrims srung ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bzod pa sgom pa yin gzhan yang 
[\[259b.2\]]bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bzod pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/_gzhan yang brtson 'grus la 
[\[259b.3\]]yang dag par skul ba yin/_brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[259b.4\]]yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin/_ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang shes rab sgom pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[259b.5\]]yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/_shes rab kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag 
[\[259b.6\]]nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bdun cu pa/_bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/_gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can 
[\[259b.7\]]gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 
[\[260a.2\]]'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/_gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bslab 
[\[260a.3\]]pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin sems can gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bsam 
[\[260a.4\]]gtan dang po'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_
[\[260a.5\]]bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi 
[\[260a.6\]]legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par skul ba yin/_btang snyoms kyi legs pa 
[\[260a.7\]]rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs 
[\[260b.2\]]brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sgom pa yin/_
[\[260b.3\]]gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang dag par skul ba yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 
[\[260b.4\]]'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par 
[\[260b.5\]]skul ba yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so 
[\[260b.6\]]so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/_sangs rgyas
