[\[283a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ste/_de la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni bslab pa yang mi dmigs na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lta ci smos/_byang 
[\[283a.4\]]chub lta yang ci smos/_byang chub kyi chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_nyan thos pa'i chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_
[\[283a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid med do/_/de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_so so'i skye bo'i chos ni gang /_rgyun du zhugs pa ni gang zhig yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 
[\[283a.6\]]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni gang zhig yod/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig yod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang zhig yod/_gal te gang zag de dag 
[\[283a.7\]]dmigs su med na/_chos gang gis so so'i skye bo 'am rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya bar brjod pa'i chos de dag 'byung bar yang ga la 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa la/_'di ni so so'i skye bo zhes bgyi ba dang /_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[283b.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du 'byung ba ci'i slad du dmigs par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci gzugs kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen 
[\[283b.3\]]par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/_yod par gyur tam/_yod par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 
[\[283b.4\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/_yod par gyur tam/_yod par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags 
[\[283b.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/_yod par gyur tam/_yod par 'gyur 
[\[283b.6\]]ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa la/_phyin ci log gi dbang gis 
[\[283b.7\]]sems can rnams rnam par rtog ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas/_chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]chub tu yang dag par 'jog go_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thabs mkhas pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[284a.2\]]byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang yang gang 
[\[284a.3\]]la thogs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po 'am/_gang la thogs par gyur nas zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/_zhum par gyur nas sgyid lug par 'gyur ba 'am/_sgyid lug par gyur nas tshi chad par 'gyur ba 'am/_tshi chad par gyur nas/_le lor 'gyur 
[\[284a.4\]]ba'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can rnams rmongs pas phung po zhes bya ba 'am/_skye mched ces bya ba 'am/_khams shes bya ba 'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[284a.5\]]ba'i chos shes bya bar mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o/_/srog med pa'o/_/srog dang bral ba'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rang bzhin gyis stong ba'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ba'o/_/de lta 
[\[284a.6\]]bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong nas/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po 
[\[284a.7\]]lta bu'i lus byin gyis brlabs nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sems can gang ser sna can du gyur pa de dag la sbyin pa'i gtam byed do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams la tshul khrims kyi gtam byed do/_/gnod sems can rnams la bzod 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]pa'i gtam byed do/_/le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus kyi gtam byed do/_/sems g.yeng ba rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi gtam byed do/_/shes rab 'chal ba rnams la shes rab kyi gtam byed do/_/gang gi tshe sems can de dag sbyin pa la bkod 
[\[284b.2\]]par gyur pa dang /_tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab la bkod par gyur pa de'i tshe/_de las gong du sems can de dag la 'phags pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[284b.3\]]thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[284b.4\]]nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar sems can ma mchis shing yang dag par ma mchis pa 
[\[284b.5\]]rnams sbyin pa la sbyor/_tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la sbyor zhing de las gong du 'phags pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[284b.6\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam bgyid na/_ji ltar dmigs pa ma mchis par 
[\[284b.7\]]'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa la/_dmigs pa gang yang med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_kun rdzob kyi brdas tha snyad du spyod pa ma gtogs par sems can gang yang mi dmigs te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta 
[\[285a.2\]]ste/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa gnyis la gnas nas/_sems can rnams la chos ston kyang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu bden pa gnyis la sems can du dmigs pa med de/_sems can du gdags pa yang med 
[\[285a.3\]]do/_/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston pa des sems can de dag tshe 'di nyid la bdag tu mi dmigs na/_gang thob par bya ba 
[\[285a.4\]]dang /_gang gis thob par bya ba lta ci smos te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[285a.5\]]'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang yang gcig pa 'am/_tha dad par yang mi dmigs/_'di lta bu'i go cha 'tshal ba dang /_go cha de 'tshal bas 'dod pa'i khams na yang mi gda'/_gzugs mchis pa'i khams na 
[\[285a.6\]]yang mi gda'/_gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams na yang mi gda'/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams na yang mi gda' la/_sems can rnams khams gsum nas 'grel cing sems can du'ang mi dmigs/_sems 
[\[285a.7\]]can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs pa ni spro ba chen po dang ldan pa ste/_sems can du gdags pa ma mchis pas/_sems can bcings pa dang grol ba ma mchis/_sems can bcings pa dang grol ba ma mchis pas/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]par byang ba ma mchis/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pas/_lam gyi rgyud rnams/_tha dad par mi dmigs/_lam gyi rgyud rnams tha dad pa ma mchis pa la las dang nyon mongs pa ma mchis te/_las dang nyon mongs pa 
[\[285b.2\]]ma mchis na/_rnam par smin pa gang gis bdag gam/_sems can 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa de lta bu yang ga las mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin 
[\[285b.3\]]te/_tshig ji skad du brjod pa bzhin te/_gal te sngon sems can zhig byung bar gyur la/_phyis 'byung ba med par gyur tam/_'on te de ni de bzhin du sngon yod pa la phyis med par gyur tam/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba sngon yod la phyis med par 'gyur/_
[\[285b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'das pa de lta bur 'gyur na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor 
[\[285b.5\]]ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_
[\[285b.6\]]de la bdag kyang med/_sems can yang med/_srog kyang med/_'gro ba yang med/_gso ba yang med/_skyes bu yang med/_gang zag yang med/_shed can kyang med/_shed bdag kyang med/_byed pa po yang med/_tshor ba po yang med/_
[\[285b.7\]]shes pa po yang med/_mthong ba po yang med na de la gzugs lta ga la yod/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lta ga la yod/_rten cing 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams lta yang ga la yod de/_chos de dag med na 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba gang nas/_sems can rnams dgrol bar bya ba de lta bu dag lta yang ga la yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las de lta bu'i chos ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de dag thos nas sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/_phyin ci log gis 
[\[286a.3\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par sems can nam chos gang yang dmigs pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i go cha chen po gyon te/_go cha de bgos pas bla na med pa 
[\[286a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste/_bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar bya ba ma yin gyi/_gdon mi za bar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[286a.5\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_sems can rnams kyi don chos bzhin du byas te/_don bya ba des sems can rnams phyin ci log las yongs su dgrol bar 
[\[286a.6\]]bya'o snyam mo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/_sprul pa'i skyes bu zhig gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sprul te/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba shin du mang 
[\[286a.7\]]bas tshim par byas te/_de ltar tshim par byas nas/_bdag gis ni bsod nams mang po spel to/_/bdag gis ni bsod nams mang po spel to zhes/_ched du brjod pa ched du brjod na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_de la la la zhig 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]ston te tshim par byas pa 'am/_la las bsod nams 'phel bar byas pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[286b.2\]]chen po yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam 
[\[286b.3\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med 
[\[286b.4\]]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po 
[\[286b.5\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_
[\[286b.6\]]sems can la la zhig dmigs par byas shing /_gdul bar bya ba de lta bu'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bdun cu gnyis pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[286b.7\]]rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi lam gang la spyod de/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po 
[\[287a.2\]]bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[287a.3\]]phyin pa la spyod/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod phyi stong pa nyid la spyod phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga 
[\[287a.4\]]dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam 
[\[287a.5\]]par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod/_de bzhin 
[\[287a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[287a.7\]]kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_sbyin pa byin nas 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_rigs kyi bu dag sbyin pa la gzung bas 
[\[287b.2\]]ma 'dzin cig_/sbyin pa la gzung bas 'dzin cing lus gang mngon par grub pas sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par 'grub pa re/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di la don dam par na/_sbyin pa yang med/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang 
[\[287b.3\]]med/_sbyin pa'i bdag po yang med/_len pa yang med de/_chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni len pa med do/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gzung du med pa'o zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_
[\[287b.4\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin pa mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i bdag po mi dmigs so/_/len pa mi dmigs so/_/de ni mi 
[\[287b.5\]]dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs pas/_sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 
[\[287b.6\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub la sbyor ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[287b.7\]]tshe/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod de/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin zhing /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/
[\[288a.2\]]bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'thob bo/_/de de dag na yang sems can 
[\[288a.3\]]de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su sdud de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang don spyad pa dang /_don 'thun pas yongs su sdud do/_/de de ltar sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can de dag kyang rim gyis tshul khrims la 
[\[288a.4\]]rab tu 'god do/_/bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab la rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[288a.5\]]pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 
[\[288a.6\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs 
[\[288a.7\]]kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug par byed do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rang byang 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]chub thob par byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul lo/_/kye skyes bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/_phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i 
[\[288b.2\]]sems can rnams kyis khong du mi chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa med kyis/_phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la 'khor ba las bdag cag 
[\[288b.3\]]kyang thar bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang thar bar gyis shig_/de ltar khyed kyang don chen por gyis shig_/gzhan yang don chen po la sbyor cig ces yang dag par skul bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[288b.4\]]pos sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang /_nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod 
[\[288b.5\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo ba gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can rnams kyi 
[\[288b.6\]]don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes de 'di skad ces zer te/_su ci 'dod pa de khyed byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi 'o/_nga ni nang gi gzugs la'ang don du gnyer ba med na/_gzhan la lta ci smos te/_
[\[288b.7\]]gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi_/bdag gi don du ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes te/_de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]don byed kyang /_sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu mi dmigs te/_gzhan du na 'du shes dang /_ming dang tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/_rnam par spyod pa de yang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du med par shes so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[289a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod par bya ste/_spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba med par bya na/_phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems 
[\[289a.3\]]can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba dag lta smos su yang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_yo byad de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/tshul 
[\[289a.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_phyi stong 
[\[289a.5\]]pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni yo byad do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub 
[\[289a.6\]]kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[289a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang so so 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/de dag ni yo byad de/_yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus shing /_rim gyis nyan 
[\[289b.2\]]thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[289b.3\]]gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/_sems can rnams yongs su bsdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams tshul khrims 
[\[289b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di skad ces brjod do/_/rigs 
[\[289b.5\]]kyi bu dag tshur sheg tshul khrims srungs shig_/ngas khyed zas dang skom dang gos dang mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang nor dang 'bru dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel 
[\[289b.6\]]dang byi ru dang /_gser dang dngul dang mi'i yo byad kyi rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par bya'o/_/khyed kyang phongs pas tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod grang na/_khyed yo byad thams cad dang /_rin po che bdun gyi bar gyis 
[\[289b.7\]]phongs pa med par byas/_des khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la mnos la/_rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]mthar phyin par gyis shig_/ces nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul lo/_tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do/_/sems 
[\[290a.2\]]can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyor zhing /_tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/_rim 
[\[290a.3\]]gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/
[\[290a.4\]]rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[290a.5\]]phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can gang khro ba dang /_gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/_de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_khyed gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur 
[\[290a.6\]]pa de dang de nga las long shig_/ngas khyed zas dang skom dang mi'i rkyen gyi yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phong ba med par byas/_khro ba dang gnod sems med par gyis shig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[290a.7\]]pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po med pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang med do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/_dngos po 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gang gis phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon pa dang /_gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar 'thabs shing 'khon te gnod sems su gyur nas/_dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /_phan tshun gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i 
[\[290b.2\]]dngos po de la/_dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/_de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtogs pas 'khrugs na/_sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten 
[\[290b.3\]]dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang /_tsha zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/_skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po med pa'i chos kyi don du las gang 
[\[290b.4\]]yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba yang thob par mi 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas byung ba dang /_phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su yang med pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/mir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no/_/
[\[290b.5\]]dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las thar ba ni dkon no/_/de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don med par ma bya shig_/mi khom par gyur cing gsor mi rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa 
[\[290b.6\]]sgrub bo/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[290b.7\]]chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[291a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/_'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de/_de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro 
[\[291a.3\]]zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_
[\[291a.4\]]gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag ngas khyed la nye bar bsgrub par byas/_brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing /_lus sam 
[\[291a.5\]]sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas 
[\[291a.6\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/_/rang byang chub 'thob bo/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[291a.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs par rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang brtson 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs par rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing /_brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis 
[\[291b.2\]]theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/
[\[291b.3\]]rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[291b.4\]]sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par mi gzhog ces brjod de/_de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[291b.5\]]chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/_byang chub 
[\[291b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub ste/_de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/
[\[291b.7\]]bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[292a.2\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_
[\[292a.3\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_de la la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang 
[\[292a.4\]]chub kyi lam las yongs su mi nyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji 
[\[292a.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[292a.6\]]tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab mi sgom zhes brjod de/_de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[292a.7\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig tshul khrims srung shig_/bzod pa sgom shig brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]par zhog shig_/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_'gro ba 'am gso ba 'am skyes bu 'am/_gang zag gam shed can nam shed bdag gam/_byed 
[\[292b.2\]]pa po 'am tshor ba po 'am shes pa po 'am/_mthong ba po 'am gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_skye mched dam/_khams sam/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[292b.3\]]rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa 'am/_bsam gtan nam/_tshad med pa 'am/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa 'am/_mthar 
[\[292b.4\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/_stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma med pa 'am/_smon pa med pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin nam/_gzungs kyi sgo 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sam/_mi 'jigs pa 'am/_
[\[292b.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang 
[\[292b.6\]]byang chub bam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/_chos gang yang yod dam/_yongs su rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[292b.7\]]chos gang la dmigs pa mngon par mkhyen par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos gang yang mi dmigs te/_de la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/_'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi rigs su gtogs pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni mi'o/_/
[\[293a.2\]]'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[293a.3\]]dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[293a.4\]]rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[293a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[293a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs te/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de bsgom par 'khor ba las yongs su 
[\[293a.7\]]thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing sems can mgon med pa/_sdug bsngal ba kha zas dang /_gos kyis 'phongs pa dag mthong na 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag tshur sheg nga las zas dang skom dang 
[\[293b.2\]]gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/_rin po che bdun gyi bar du long la/_sems can rnams la phan thogs shig_/
[\[293b.3\]]ces 'dems shing rjes su ston to/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/_phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas te/_
[\[293b.4\]]de dag sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma zhig ma god pa/_ma 'dres pa/_skyon med pa/_ma nyams pa/_rang dbang yod pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_shin tu rdzogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyur 'gyur ba la gnas shing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_
[\[293b.5\]]stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[293b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[293b.7\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa blo chung ba dag 
[\[294a.2\]]mthong na/_'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/_rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis zas dang skom dang gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_
[\[294a.3\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/_
[\[294a.4\]]phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas rmongs pa med cing shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la 
[\[294a.5\]]gnas/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[294a.6\]]med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying 
[\[294a.7\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]shing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa'i rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su thar ba nas 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su thar ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu 
[\[294b.2\]]lnga pa las/_le'u drug cu lnga'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bus go bgo bar bya na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[294b.3\]]po'i byang chub kyi lam ji lta bu zhig yod snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs su chud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor pha 
[\[294b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa drug ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor stong pa nyid thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[294b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong 
[\[294b.6\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[294b.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba dang /_gang la ma bslabs pas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[295a.2\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yod dam/_rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang med de/_chos thams cad la ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[295a.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad stong pa lags na_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad 
[\[295a.4\]]la ji ltar bslab par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed do zhes bgyi ba 'am/_'di dag go zhes bgyi ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/
[\[295a.5\]]zag pa med pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/so so'i skye bo'i chos ni 'di dag go_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_
[\[295a.6\]]dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/zhes bgyi ba ni spros pa ma mchis pa 'phro bar bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[295a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni stong pa'o/_/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi/_stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]bslabs shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang 
[\[295b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis gzhan yang gang 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyed do/_/zhes bya ba 'am 'di 
[\[295b.3\]]dag go zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/zag pa med pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/'dus 
[\[295b.4\]]ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/so so'i skye bo'i chos ni 'di dag go_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/
[\[295b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go zhes bya bar chos rnam par dbye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/_rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag gis de ltar chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar shes sam/_gal te shes 
[\[295b.6\]]na ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/_rab 'byor sems can 'di dag chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar mi shes pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[295b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos rnam par dgod pa byas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod pas/_thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_mngon par 'du bya ba ma gtogs par 'di la chos gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med do/_/zhes bya bar yongs 
[\[296a.2\]]su brtag par bya'o/_/de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la de ltar rtogs pas/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[296a.3\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[296a.4\]]'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_
[\[296a.5\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ram/_chos gang la yang mngon par chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[296a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyis stong ste/_stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na/_gang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba lta ci 
[\[296a.7\]]smos te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par chos thams cad kyis rnam par spyod do/_/de bslab pa 'di la gnas shing sems can 'di dag ci la spyod ces sems can gyi 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]spyod pa la lta ste/_de 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa la spyod de/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa las dgrol bar bya na dka' ba byed do zhes nas de'i tshe thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi 
[\[296b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_'di skad du ston to/_/kye sems can dag tshur sheg sbyin pa byin cig_/des khyod longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur gyis longs spyod des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du tshul 
[\[296b.3\]]khrims la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/tshul khrims srungs shig tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du bzod pa la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/bzod 
[\[296b.4\]]pa sgoms shig_/bzod pa des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du brtson 'grus la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/brtson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/
[\[296b.5\]]de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig_/ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin 
[\[296b.6\]]du shes rab la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/shes rab sgoms shig_/shes rab des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du stong pa nyid thams cad la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur 
[\[296b.7\]]sheg_/stong pa nyid sgoms shig_/stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/byang chub kyi 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]phyogs kyi chos rnams sgoms shig_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[297a.2\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[297a.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgoms shig_/gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[297a.4\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[297a.5\]]'dres pa rnams sgoms shig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/rgyun du 
[\[297a.6\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgoms shig_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[297a.7\]]dang /_rang byang chub la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/rang byang chub sgoms shig_/rang byang chub des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgoms shig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/zhes de ltar sems can rnams la 
[\[297b.2\]]'dems pa dang /_rjes su ston pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod kyang gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo 
[\[297b.3\]]nyid kyi phyir gang gis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod kyang gang la yang mi gnas te/_de gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[297b.4\]]tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[297b.5\]]spyod kyang de la mi gnas so/_/de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin 
[\[297b.6\]]gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa dang /_snying rje 
[\[297b.7\]]dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[298a.2\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang 
[\[298a.3\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob kyang de la mi gnas so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 
[\[298a.4\]]dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob kyang de la mi gnas so/_/de rang byang chub 'thob kyang de la mi gnas so/_/gsol pa/_de ci'i slad du mi gnas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir mi gnas te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ngo bo 
[\[298a.5\]]nyid dang ngo bo nyid med pa ste/_de gnyis kyi phyir gang la gnas pa 'am/_gang gis gnas pa 'am/_gang gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu de dag la med do/_/de tsam gyis dga' bar yang mi 'dzin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'di snyam 
[\[298a.6\]]du bdag gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi bya ba ma yin te/_de dag la gnas 
[\[298a.7\]]par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du thob par mi bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas pa mi bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par/_sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni sa dang po nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[298b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par/_sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa bcu pa'i bar nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par/_
[\[298b.3\]]sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par zhugs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par/_sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do snyam ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[298b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po ni sems g.yeng ba med par lus sam/_ngag gam/_yid kyis las gang spyod kyang rung ste/_byang chub kyi sems kyis mi spyod pa med de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas nas/_
[\[298b.5\]]yid g.yeng ba med par yang byang chub kyi lam sgrub bo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_byang chub kyi lam ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 
[\[298b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/_de ji lta bu zhes byas na/_gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa de dag la ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[298b.7\]]'o na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin du gnas pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi gnas nyid ni/_de bzhin du gnas so/_/de la yang gang chos kyi gnas nyid de lta bu mi shes pa de 
[\[299a.2\]]dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam bskyed de/_lam des sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_skyes par gyur pa'i lam gyis byang chub 
[\[299a.3\]]thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ma skyes pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma 
[\[299a.4\]]yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes kyang skyes la ma skyes kyang ma skyes pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes pa 
[\[299a.5\]]yang ma lags/_ma skyes pa yang ma lags pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub ji ltar thob par 'gyur/_bcom 
[\[299a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ni lam gyis 'thob pa yang ma yin/_lam ma yin pas 'thob pa yang ma yin te/_byang chub nyid kyang lam mo/_/lam nyid kyang byang chub bo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang 
[\[299a.7\]]chub nyid kyang lam la/_lam nyid kyang byang chub lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub snga nas thob par 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi chen po'i mtshan sum 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis brjod do zhes 
[\[299b.2\]]kyang ci'i slad du bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas shig byang chub thob par byed pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/sangs rgyas ni byang chub thob par mi 
[\[299b.3\]]mdzad de/_sangs rgyas nyid kyang byang chub bo/_/byang chub nyid kyang sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub snga nas thob par 'gyur ro 
[\[299b.4\]]zhes smras pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol du phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/_stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs 
[\[299b.5\]]par byas/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[299b.6\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[299b.7\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]'tshang rgya ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa/_chos thams cad dbang sgyur ba zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[300a.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[300a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag dang gzhan gyi lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/_de yongs su dag par byas pas 
[\[300a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bdun cu gsum pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus kyi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_ngag gi 
[\[300a.5\]]gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_yid kyi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus kyi las mi dge ba srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spyod pa ni/_byang chub 
[\[300a.6\]]sems dpa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len to/_/ngag gi las mi dge ba [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /_tshig kyal pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnas ngan len to/_/yid kyi las mi dge ba chags sems dang /_gnod 
[\[300a.7\]]sems dang /_log par lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ser sna'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang /_'khrug pa'i sems dang 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]le lo'i sems dang /_g.yeng ba'i sems dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems dang /_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa ni byang 
[\[300b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs 
[\[300b.3\]]lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[300b.4\]]par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[300b.5\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len 
[\[300b.6\]]to/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rang byang 
[\[300b.7\]]chub mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sgra dang /_dri 
[\[301a.2\]]dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam 
[\[301a.3\]]par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus 
[\[301a.4\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[301a.5\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan 
[\[301a.6\]]len to/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/ma rig pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[301a.7\]]shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/bud med kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/skyes pa'i 'du 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/dge ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi dge ba'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pa'i 'du 
[\[301b.2\]]shes dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'du shes dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du shes dang /_zag pa med pa'i 'du shes dang /_'dus byas kyi 'du shes dang /_'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub 
[\[301b.3\]]sems dpa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gnas ngan len de thams cad rnam par spangs shing 
[\[301b.4\]]bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong /_gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul te/_de zas 'dod pa la ni zas yongs su gtong ngo /_/skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos yongs su gtong /_mi'i rkyen dang yo byad gang ci yang rung 
[\[301b.5\]]ba'i bar du 'dod pa la ni de dag yongs su gtong ste/_gzhan yang mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ba la yang dag par skul zhing rab tu 'god de/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang sems can thams 
[\[301b.6\]]cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag kyang bzod pa sgom mo/_/gzhan yang 
[\[301b.7\]]bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go_/gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]kyang shes rab sgom mo/_/gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go_/'dul lo/_/rab tu 'god do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[302a.2\]]yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing /_dkon mchog gsum la 'bul ba byed kyang de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs 
[\[302a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi drung du lha rdzas kyi rol 
[\[302a.4\]]mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba byed kyang /_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lha rdzas kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[302a.5\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha rdzas kyi spos kyis yongs su bkang zhing /_sangs rgyas rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dag la 'bul ba byed kyang /_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha 
[\[302a.6\]]rdzas kyi spos kyi ngad ldang bar gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos la 'bul 
[\[302a.7\]]ba byed cing /_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/_mnabs stsal ro brgya 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]dang ldan pa mngon par grub par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la lha rdzas kyi byug pa yongs su 
[\[302b.2\]]'bul ba byed kyang de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad lha rdzas kyi reg pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya bar 
[\[302b.3\]]sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/_yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[302b.4\]]dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_sems can thams cad la dbul zhing yongs su gtang bar bya'o snyam du sems te/_de de ltar sems pa'i tshe 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[302b.5\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyang yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg yongs su grub par gyur 
[\[302b.6\]]cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag go_/
[\[302b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan dang po la dgod do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la dgod do/_/
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang byams pa la dgod do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la mnyam par gzhag go_/
[\[303a.2\]]sems can thams cad kyang btang snyoms la dgod do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la dgod do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis 
[\[303a.3\]]kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la dgod do/_/ma la bdag 
[\[303a.4\]]nyid kyis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dgod do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs 
[\[303a.5\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[303a.6\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la dgod do/_/snyam ste de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[303a.7\]]bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang mi 'bral zhing /_tshad med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dag dang mi 'bral bar shog shig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor de de 
[\[303b.2\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed de/_de nam bsams pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[303b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa yin te/_de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes 
[\[303b.4\]]pa yin/_sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 
[\[303b.5\]]'grub ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed de/_ci nas kyang ngan song gsum du gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_
[\[303b.6\]]'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_bud med dang /_skyes par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_theg pa gnyis su gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[303b.7\]]bdag med par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_bdag dang bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang bar gdags pa'i ming yang 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]mi srid pa dang /_phyin ci log tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_'bras bur gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid cing gzhan du na sems can de dag 'dod pa bzhin du shing rlung gis btab pa 'am/_phyi nang gi dngos po 
[\[304a.2\]]dag las 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_mi skye mi 'gog pa'i sgra dang /_chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang /_chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa'i sgra 'byung ba 
[\[304a.3\]]dang /_chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo /_/gang stong pa de la ni 
[\[304a.4\]]mtshan ma med do/_/gang la mtshan ma med pa de la ni smon pa med do zhes bya bar chos bstan pa'i sgra nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro yang rung /_'dug kyang rung sdod kyang rung nyal yang rung ste/_rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sangs 
[\[304a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo /_/de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la 
[\[304a.6\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad legs par brjod par 'gyur te/_sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de thams cad kyang bla na med 
[\[304a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des chos bstan na/_sems can gang yang 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni chos ma yin zhes bya bar the tshom za bar 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos ma yin pa gang yang med do chos thams cad kyang chos so/_/de la sems can gang mi dge ba'i rtsa bas non pa dang sangs rgyas sam/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[304b.2\]]nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_bdag tu lta bar bying ba nas lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du bying ba rtag pa 'am/_chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa log par 'dzin pas yang dag par 
[\[304b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par 'du shes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa de dag ni chos ma yin pa la 
[\[304b.4\]]yang chos so zhes zer/_chos yin pa la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer te/_de dag chos la spong bar 'gyur te/_de ltar chos spangs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas/_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dang /_sems can 
[\[304b.5\]]dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_de lta bu dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta 
[\[304b.6\]]ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par 'grol te/_de ltar rnam par dkrol nas nges pa'i phung por rab tu 'god de/_der bkod pa'i rnams phyin chad ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[304b.7\]]po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/_de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/_zag pa med pa'i chos 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]sam/_'dus byas kyi chos sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu 
[\[305a.2\]]lnga pa las/_le'u drug cu drug go/_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges zhes bgyi 'am/_ma nges zhes 
[\[305a.3\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/_ma nges pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_nyan thos kyi phung po 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi phung po 
[\[305a.4\]]'am/_phung po gang du nges pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[305a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes bgyi 'am/_'on tam phyir mi ldog pa nges shes bgyi 'am/_'on 
[\[305a.6\]]te srid pa tha ma pa nges shes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa ni nges pa'o/_/srid pa gcig gis thogs pa ni nges pa'o/_/
[\[305a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_rab 'byor nges pa'i byang chub 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du mi skye'o/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_brgyad pa 'am rgyun du zhugs pa 'am lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 
[\[305b.2\]]'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa 
[\[305b.3\]]gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i don du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 
[\[305b.4\]]'gyur ba'i gnas med do/_/lha tshe ring por skye ba'i gnas med do/_/gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas med do/_/glen pa dang lkugs par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i gnas med do/_/mtha' 'khob kyi kla klo dang mi srun 
[\[305b.5\]]cing 'khor bzhir rgyur med pa'i yul du skye ba'i gnas med do/_/log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas med do/_/gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas 
[\[305b.6\]]med do/_/bya ba ma yin pa'i lta bar ltung ba'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pas yang 
[\[305b.7\]]dag par zhugs pa ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i 
[\[306a\]]
