[\[306a.1\]]gnas su mi skye ba lags na/_gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi rgyud du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/_de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[306a.2\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi/_lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing sems can rnams kyi don du 
[\[306a.3\]]yongs su 'dzin kyang /_rab 'byor de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing de la la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang bla na med pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing sems 
[\[306a.4\]]can de dag la gnod par mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag dgra bcom pa 'am rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/_rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi 
[\[306a.5\]]phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_byol song gi skye gnas su skye yang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas mi gos par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[306a.6\]]ldan 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs 
[\[306a.7\]]su rdzogs par mi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang med de/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba med do/_/dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[306b.2\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu med de/_de ni gnas ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[306b.3\]]par bya ba la bslab par bya ste de la bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[306b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'ang ngan song ngam/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags 
[\[306b.5\]]pa zag pa med pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags shing zag pa mi mnga' ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[306b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam med/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchis so/_/bcom 
[\[306b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor des de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]pa byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[307a.2\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[307a.3\]]dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na/_sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing las des gzhan gyi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[307a.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams 
[\[307a.5\]]yongs su smin par byed do/_/de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du yang mi 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang nyams su mi myong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma las glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i 
[\[307a.6\]]gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam/_gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na/_de dag la glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs sam/_srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur 
[\[307a.7\]]ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[307b.2\]]chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa dang /_de ltar ldan zhing lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs shin du mkhas pa ste/_de ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[307b.3\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing /_de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang las de lta bus mi gos par spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha 
[\[307b.4\]]rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can rnams kyi 
[\[307b.5\]]don byed kyang /_des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang /_gang gis reg par bya ba dang /_gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum 
[\[307b.6\]]po de dag thams cad mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la reg par mi byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la yang reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/stong pa 
[\[307b.7\]]nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la mi gnas kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'ba' shig la gnas 
[\[308a.2\]]shing rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[308a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khongs su chud pa 'am/_khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi 
[\[308a.4\]]ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ste chos thams 
[\[308a.5\]]cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems 
[\[308a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[308a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas te/_mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang /_
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon 
[\[308b.2\]]par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[308b.3\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed 
[\[308b.4\]]cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo /_/gzhan du na ming dang brdar gdags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/_gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/gal te 'jig 
[\[308b.5\]]rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi gtong la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong ste/_gdags pa'i rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa zhig yin na ni/_nyi tshe ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de 'ang stong 
[\[308b.6\]]pa nyi tshe ma yin no/_/de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/_de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/_mngon 
[\[308b.7\]]par shes pa de dag la gnas shing lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang /_'chi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/_mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni mngon par shes 
[\[309a.2\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin par 'dus te/_mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/de tshol ba'i tshe lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong /_gzhan yang dge ba'i 
[\[309a.3\]]chos thams cad la sbyor te/_dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing ro myong bar byed par mngon par 
[\[309a.4\]]zhen par 'gyur ba med de/_stong pa nyid ni ro myong bar byed pa med do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/_lha'i mig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa 
[\[309a.5\]]nyid du mthong ste/_de chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo/_/las mngon par bsgrubs pa des/_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do/_/de ltar mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[309a.6\]]tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/_mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes par bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do/_/de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 
[\[309a.7\]]'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_byang 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam 
[\[309b.2\]]par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_/
[\[309b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed 
[\[309b.4\]]de de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyod kyis sbyin 
[\[309b.5\]]pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa 
[\[309b.6\]]de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/_sems can 
[\[309b.7\]]dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig 
[\[310a.2\]]gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_
[\[310a.3\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis de bas na khyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems ni 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di 
[\[310a.4\]]skad du chos ston to/_/kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin 
[\[310a.5\]]rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyod kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur 
[\[310a.6\]]ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song 
[\[310a.7\]]gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag 
[\[310b.2\]]gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i 
[\[310b.3\]]sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro/_/
[\[310b.4\]]gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[310b.5\]]lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed cag chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa 
[\[310b.6\]]med do/_/zhes chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i mig rnam 
[\[310b.7\]]par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/_lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang /_shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa 'am/_
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[311a.2\]]'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_
[\[311a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems 
[\[311a.4\]]dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_
[\[311a.5\]]phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan 
[\[311a.6\]]song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya 
[\[311a.7\]]bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji 
[\[311b.2\]]snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/_
[\[311b.3\]]sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta 
[\[311b.4\]]re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems 
[\[311b.5\]]can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' 
[\[311b.6\]]tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems 
[\[311b.7\]]g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos 
[\[312a.2\]]ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_
[\[312a.3\]]byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji 
[\[312a.4\]]snyed pa de dag ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa 
[\[312a.5\]]de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo 
[\[312a.6\]]nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[312a.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas par sems can rnams la 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]chos bstan par mi nus te/_lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzung bar mi nus so/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na bya 'dab ma med pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[312b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma rten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod 
[\[312b.3\]]pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do/_/des lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[312b.4\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang 
[\[312b.5\]]mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston te/_des lha'i mig gis lho 
[\[312b.6\]]dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas 
[\[312b.7\]]kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang shes 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/_lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra yang thos te/_de shar phyogs 
[\[313a.2\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du 
[\[313a.3\]]sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/_tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/
[\[313a.4\]]de lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas 
[\[313a.5\]]nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/_tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang shes 
[\[313a.6\]]rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des/_sems can rnams kyi 
[\[313a.7\]]sems shes par byas shing /_de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/_tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am 'byung ba'i gtam gyi 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]bar du chos ston to/_/de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba 
[\[313b.2\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par byung ngo /_/zhes bya bar yang shes te/_sems can sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/_tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang 
[\[313b.3\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 
[\[313b.4\]]song zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/_bsnyen bkur byas nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_bsam 
[\[313b.5\]]gtan dang shes rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de zag pa med pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de zag pa med pa mngon du 
[\[313b.6\]]bya ba'i shes pa shin du rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/_tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi gtam 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/_'byung ba'i 
[\[313b.7\]]gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_de mngon par shes pa shin du 'dris pa de dag 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]gis lus ci dang ji lta bu yongs su bzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[314a.2\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgos pa thams cad byed kyang bde ba 'am sdug bsngal des gos par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi 
[\[314a.3\]]pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston kyang bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba des 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[314a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar bya ste/_ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par 
[\[314a.5\]]'gyur ba de ltar rtse bar bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[314a.6\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lam gyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[314a.7\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[314b.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bdun cu bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[314b.3\]]stsal pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o/_/'di la yongs su btang bar bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[314b.4\]]gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge 
[\[314b.5\]]ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod kyang /_de la mi rtog cing shes rab 
[\[314b.6\]]sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo/_bdag gis shes rab sgom mo/_/'di'i don du shes rab sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las 
[\[314b.7\]]sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[315a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 
[\[315a.3\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod kyang /_de la mi rtog cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe/_
[\[315a.4\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog 
[\[315a.5\]]pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med 
[\[315a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste lam des 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad med pa rnams ded de/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur pa dang rgal 
[\[315a.7\]]ba dang /_rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/_lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]skor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u drug cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 
[\[315b.2\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos 
[\[315b.3\]]de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[315b.4\]]thob nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[315b.5\]]rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang de bzhin 
[\[315b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_zhugs pa yang gzhan la/_'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/_de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang 
[\[315b.7\]]zag ma yin zhes mi bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro/_/rab 
[\[316a.2\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di 
[\[316a.3\]]ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni mi'o 'di ni rigs kyi sa'o/_/'di ni brgyad pa'o 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang 
[\[316a.4\]]sangs rgyas so 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar khyad par dang rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag 
[\[316a.5\]]dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmigs su ma mchis/_las ji ltar dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de 
[\[316a.6\]]de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/_chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams 
[\[316a.7\]]cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyod pa 'am/_legs par spyad pa 'am/_mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/_de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du lhung ngo /_/legs par spyad pa'i las kyis lha dang mir 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]skye'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams su skye'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[316b.2\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad/_nang stong pa nyid la spyad/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad/_dran pa 
[\[316b.3\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/_
[\[316b.4\]]'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[316b.5\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[316b.6\]]rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyad te/_nyams pa med pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan 
[\[316b.7\]]pa la mnyam par gzhag cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud ma zos shing 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar mi ltung ba de ltar don byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud 
[\[317a.2\]]lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am/_dkar po 'am/_gnag pa 'am/_
[\[317a.3\]]dkar ba 'am/_mi gnag mi dkar ba dmigs lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmigs na/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas 
[\[317a.4\]]sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/_lha dang mir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar 
[\[317a.5\]]gdags pa mdzad/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci sems can 
[\[317a.6\]]'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/_gsol pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo 
[\[317a.7\]]zhes bya bar shes na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/_sems can rnams kyang 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]ngan song gsum dang /_'khor ba'i rgyud rnams nas mi 'grol te/_rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes la mi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas/_de'i phyir byang 
[\[317b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par thos nas sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/_
[\[317b.3\]]chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/_de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par btags shing /_sems can med pa la sems can 
[\[317b.4\]]du 'du shes/_gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/_skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes/_khams 
[\[317b.5\]]rnams med pa la khams su 'du shes/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams med pa la/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'du shes/_'jig rten pa'i chos med pa la/_'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[317b.6\]]chos med pa la/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos med pa la/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/_zag pa med pa'i chos med pa la/_zag pa med pa'i chos su 'du shes/_'dus 
[\[317b.7\]]byas kyi chos med pa la/_'dus byas kyi chos su 'du shes/_'dus ma byas kyi chos med pa la/_'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas/_yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gis/_phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus 
[\[318a.2\]]par byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs 
[\[318a.3\]]su 'grel to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[318a.4\]]par sangs rgyas te/_rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[318a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'grol ba'i lam sems can rnams la ston to/_/'chad 
[\[318a.6\]]do/_/'jog go_/'god do/_/'grel to/_/rnam par 'grel to/_/gsal bar byed do/_/yang dag par rjod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang ji snyed pa gang gis dkon mchog gsum 
[\[318a.7\]]rnam par dgod pa de thams cad yongs su 'dus te/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung bas/_sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]su 'grol lo/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te sdug bsngal gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas yongs 
[\[318b.2\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_
[\[318b.3\]]lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_
[\[318b.4\]]sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/_/kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_sdug bsngal 'gog 
[\[318b.5\]]pas kyang ma yin no/_/lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_lam gyis kyang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs te/_
[\[318b.6\]]sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/_sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/_/kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/_kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal 'gog 
[\[318b.7\]]pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/_sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/_/lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/_lam gyis kyang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]bsngal yang ma mchis/_sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/_kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_'gog pa yang ma mchis/_'gog pa 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_
[\[319a.2\]]lam yang ma mchis/_lam 'tshal ba yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[319a.3\]]ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de 
[\[319a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_de bzhin gnas pa'i dbyings chos kyi dbyings mi nyam mi 'grib par 'dug pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bden 
[\[319a.5\]]pa khong du chud par ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na/_bden pa 
[\[319a.6\]]rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/_ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te/_khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[319a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang dmigs su med pa de ltar mthong ste/_chos thams 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]cad mi dmigs pas bden par rtogs pa 'am/_bden par ma rtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/_des de ltar mthong bas skyon med par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 
[\[319b.2\]]'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur nas spyi bor ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor ltung ba med do/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi 
[\[319b.3\]]sa de la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo/_/de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed de/_'phags 
[\[319b.4\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do/_/de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/'gog 
[\[319b.5\]]pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/lam sgom yang lam la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong 
[\[319b.6\]]bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_stong pa nyid gang lags/_bcom 
[\[319b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/_rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis/_chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/_ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shes byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid/_chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par mi mthong ngo /_/dngos po med pa ni byang chub ste/_de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba 
[\[320a.2\]]dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pas ma byas/_de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/_gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/_gzhan du na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams 
[\[320a.3\]]kyis mi shes mi mthong bas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_
[\[320a.4\]]le'u drug cu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/_de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang 
[\[320a.5\]]ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/_de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/_gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub 
[\[320a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/_chos de dag la 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di dag ni lha'o/_/'di dag ni 
[\[320a.7\]]mi'o/_/las 'dis ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_
[\[320b.2\]]dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar 'gyur 
[\[320b.3\]]ro/_/las 'dis ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan 
[\[320b.4\]]cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[320b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba 'am/_rnam par dgod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni/_bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/_bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi 
[\[320b.6\]]ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' 
[\[320b.7\]]dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_
[\[321a.2\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_lan 
[\[321a.3\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[321a.4\]]pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_thob par gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 
[\[321a.5\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa la ni las kyang med bya ba 'ang med/_'bras bu'ang med na/_'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i 
[\[321a.6\]]chos la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mi shes te/_phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/_sems can 
[\[321a.7\]]dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_mi'am rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_
[\[321b.2\]]dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam 
[\[321b.3\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/_dngos po med pa la ni las sam bya ba 'am/_'bras bu med de/_dngos po med pa 
[\[321b.4\]]gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor de la 'di skad du dngos po med pa la ni bya ba gang yang med de/_bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro 
[\[321b.5\]]ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs 
[\[321b.6\]]pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_
[\[321b.7\]]'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[322a.2\]]dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_de thob nas sems can rnams 
[\[322a.3\]]'khor ba las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang med do zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lam dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_lan cig 
[\[322a.4\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[322a.5\]]ldan 'das lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rab byang chub ni 
[\[322a.6\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dngos po med pa'i chos shig dngos po med pa'i 
[\[322a.7\]]chos thob par byed snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na dngos po med pa gang yin pa dang /_lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[322b.2\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa/_mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_bdag 
[\[322b.3\]]med pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gyur pa/_mi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'grel to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_
[\[322b.4\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la dngos por zhen nas/_mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhi/_ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/_de ste ma mchis na ni/_mngon par 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/_
[\[322b.5\]]sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba nas ci ste mi 'gro la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phyin ci log ma gtogs par gang la gnas te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung 
[\[322b.6\]]ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang med do/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na ci nas kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs pa dang /_mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpes bshad do/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam du mthong ba la rmi lam du mthong 
[\[322b.7\]]ba de gang la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam nyid kyang ma mchis na/_rmi lam mthong ba de/_gang la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]su spyod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten pa 'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag 
[\[323a.2\]]pa med pa 'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la rmi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa 
[\[323a.3\]]ma mchis pa 'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci rmi lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[323a.4\]]'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam 
[\[323a.5\]]bsgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/_brjod pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[323a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la gang las mngon par 'du byed cing /_mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_
[\[323a.7\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_mi dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan du na byis pa rnams la slu ba ma gtogs par dngos por ma 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]mchis pa ste/_gzugs brnyan nyid kyang ma mchis na/_gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing mngon par 'du bgyis pas/_sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_mi 
[\[323b.2\]]dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug las lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar 
[\[323b.3\]]yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/_lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur 
[\[323b.4\]]la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nags stug po dang /_ri dang /_gcong rong dang /_lung 
[\[323b.5\]]pa nas sgra brnyan byung na/_sgra brnyan de la mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_lha dang mir 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po 
[\[323b.6\]]yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/_de la gang sug las mngon par 'du bgyid cing /_mngon par 'du bgyis na sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/_byol song 
[\[323b.7\]]gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_lha dang mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad 
[\[324a.2\]]med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas 
[\[324a.3\]]skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[324a.4\]]de ji snyam du sems/_sgra brnyan gyi lam gang la bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom 
[\[324a.5\]]ldan 'das sgra brnyan nyid kyang shin du ma mchis pa lags na/_lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[324a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_smig rgyu la chu med par chu'i 'du shes su gyur pa dang /_klung med par chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /_grong khyer med par grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /_skyed mos tshal 
[\[324a.7\]]med par skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes su gyur pa de la/_'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_
[\[324b.2\]]snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi 
[\[324b.3\]]gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes 
[\[324b.4\]]med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das smig sgyu la 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /_mig gis log par mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang /_grong khyer dang /_bskyed mos tshal shin 
[\[324b.5\]]du ma mchis na/_sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_
[\[324b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang 
[\[324b.7\]]dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes 
[\[325a.2\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas 
[\[325a.3\]]nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log gi 'du shes de nyid kyang dngos po ma 
[\[325a.4\]]mchis pa lags na/_lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[325a.5\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma sna tshogs/_glang po'i tshogs sam/_rta'i tshogs sam/_glang gi tshogs sam/_dpung bu chung gi tshogs sam/_bud med kyi gzugs sam/_skyes pa'i 
[\[325a.6\]]gzugs mngon par sprul na/_sgyu ma de dag la gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[325a.7\]]ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung 
[\[325b.2\]]ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes 
[\[325b.3\]]med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_sgyu ma de gang la gnas te/_sug las de gang mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis 
[\[325b.4\]]pas/_sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_
[\[325b.5\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun 
[\[325b.6\]]snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom 
[\[325b.7\]]snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ni/_
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma gang lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 
[\[326a.2\]]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos la nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang 
[\[326a.3\]]bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa mdzad na/_sprul pa de la las gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_
[\[326a.4\]]byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[326a.5\]]dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_
[\[326a.6\]]dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam 
[\[326a.7\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]sprul pa de la dngos po ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam 
[\[326b.2\]]bsgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de la gang la la zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar yang 'gyur 
[\[326b.3\]]ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med pa de bzhin du kun 
[\[326b.4\]]nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/_yang dag par mthong ba ni kun nas 
[\[326b.5\]]nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med do/_/ji ltar yang dag par mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med do/_/shes rab kyi pha 
[\[326b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u drug cu dgu pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[326b.7\]]par 'gyur ba 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du yang dag pa mthong ba la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/_de ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/_
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/_dngos po ma mchis 
[\[327a.2\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi 
[\[327a.3\]]mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngas rnam par byang bar gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin 
[\[327a.4\]]nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[327a.5\]]pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_dbyings 'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byor rnam par byang ba ste/_de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi de ni brjod du med cing smos 
[\[327a.6\]]su med pa ste/_sgra dang tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu sgra brnyan lta bu mig yor lta bu/_smyig rgyu lta bu sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na/_ji 
[\[327a.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu ste/_dngos po ma mchis pa/_rdzas 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]ma mchis pa la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[327b.2\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid 
[\[327b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba 
[\[327b.4\]]bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam 
[\[327b.5\]]gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[327b.6\]]med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang 
[\[327b.7\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par byas te/_dbyangs gcig 
[\[328a.2\]]gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[328a.3\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[328a.4\]]ldan 'das gal te chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab 
[\[328a.5\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam ni yang dag pa ma lags/_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa ni yang dag pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ma lags 
[\[328a.6\]]pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[328a.7\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/_stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[328b.2\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje 
[\[328b.3\]]chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyad pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_
[\[328b.4\]]de de bzhin no/_/yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[328b.5\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[328b.6\]]bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon 
[\[328b.7\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyad pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin 
[\[329a.2\]]pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshul 
[\[329a.3\]]khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[329a.4\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_'phags pa'i 
[\[329a.5\]]bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[329a.6\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[329a.7\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]de ni ma lags so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bdun cu lnga pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sbyin pa'i 
[\[329b.2\]]pha rol du phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam
