[\[329b.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[329b.4\]]par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[329b.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na 
[\[329b.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[329b.7\]]thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen 
[\[330a.2\]]po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa/_mngon 
[\[330a.3\]]par 'dus byas pa ste/_'dus byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang chos de dag ni thams cad kyang lam sgrub pa dang /_lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 
[\[330a.4\]]'gyur ba ste/_'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/de dag gi mi skye ba dang /_mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'ang de yin te/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung 
[\[330a.5\]]ste/_dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[330a.6\]]phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_
[\[330a.7\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[330b.2\]]'dres pa rnams sam/_dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[330b.3\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par 
[\[330b.4\]]spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam 
[\[330b.5\]]gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[330b.6\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_
[\[330b.7\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar mi nus pas/_de'i phyir de lta 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu 
[\[331a.2\]]dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[331a.3\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang 
[\[331a.4\]]dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa 
[\[331a.5\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[331a.6\]]'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[331a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rmi lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur rab tu shes so/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang rmi lam la spyod do zhes bya 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]bar shes so/_/sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam 
[\[331b.2\]]lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/_de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_
[\[331b.3\]]sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/_de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzung du med do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[331b.4\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang gzung du med do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/_/dngos po 
[\[331b.5\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang gzung du med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[331b.6\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzung du med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[331b.7\]]par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gzung du med par/_byas shing bla na 
[\[332a.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni gzung du med cing dngos po med pa ste/_rmi lam lta bu sgra brnyan lta bu/_mig yor lta bu smig rgyu lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta 
[\[332a.3\]]bu ste/_sems can rnams kyis chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ma rtogs par bzung du med pa'i chos kyis bzung du med pa'i chos gang yang thob par mi nus pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[332a.4\]]don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims gang ci srung ba dang /_
[\[332a.5\]]bzod pa gang ci sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom ste/_bdag gi don du ma yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[332a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/_de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can gang sems can med pa la sems can 
[\[332a.7\]]gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_srog med pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_gso ba med pa la gso ba'i 'du shes 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]su gnas pa dang /_skyes bu med pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_gang zag med pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_shed can med pa la shed can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_shed bdag med pa la shed 
[\[332b.2\]]bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_byed pa po med pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa po med pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_slong ba po med pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa 
[\[332b.3\]]dang /_slong du 'jug pa po med pa la slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_tshor ba po med pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_tshor du 'jug pa po med pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_
[\[332b.4\]]shes pa po med pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_mthong ba po med pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci log las rnam par 'grol te/_phyin ci log las rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings 
[\[332b.5\]]su 'god do/_/de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su mi rgyu ste/_bdag gi 'du shes sam/_sems can gyi 'du shes sam/_srog gi 'du shes sam/_'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/_gso ba'i 'du shes sam/_skyes bu'i 
[\[332b.6\]]'du shes sam/_gang zag gi 'du shes sam/_shed can gyi 'du shes sam/_shed bdag gi 'du shes sam/_byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/_byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/_slong ba po'i 'du shes sam/_slong du 'jug 
[\[332b.7\]]pa po'i 'du shes sam/_tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/_tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/_shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/_mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su mi rgyu ste/_de g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang /_'bar ba 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]dang spros pa 'di dag btang nas/_spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[333a.2\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag nyid kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med la/_sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'god de/_de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[333a.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/_ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[333a.4\]]stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/_de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang 
[\[333a.5\]]mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa ste/_gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa 'am/_mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do/_/
[\[333a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na/_gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnyis 
[\[333a.7\]]kyis kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de/_gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de/_gang la gnyis kyang med la mi gnyis pa'ang med pa ni thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa zhes 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di ni thob pa'o/_/'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/_chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de/_spros pa med pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos 
[\[333b.2\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba yang gang zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa dang yongs 
[\[333b.3\]]su brjod pa med pa 'di ni chos mnyam pa nyid de/_chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de/_chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las 
[\[333b.4\]]rnam par 'das pa'o/_/chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa 'am/_'phags pa 'am/_chos gang gis kyang shes par mi rung zhing yul ma yin pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul 
[\[333b.5\]]yang ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin pa te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa 'am/_
[\[333b.6\]]rang byang chub bam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams 
[\[333b.7\]]cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]gzhan zhig yin na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na/_rab 'byor so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid 
[\[334a.2\]]gang yin pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[334a.3\]]kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do/_/de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam 
[\[334a.4\]]pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[334a.5\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba med de/_rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/_/gsol 
[\[334a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la/_'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[334a.7\]]chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na/_des so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

[\[334b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par med do/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 
[\[334b.5\]]rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[334b.6\]]la khyad par ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /_dkon mchog gsum de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/_
[\[334b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/_chos mnyam pa nyid 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]kyang gzhan zhig snyam 'am/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/_chos dkon mchog 
[\[335a.2\]]kyang gzhan te/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/_chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_
[\[335a.3\]]dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/_chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa 'ang ma lags mi ldan pa 'ang ma lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/_thogs pa ma mchis pa mtshan 
[\[335a.4\]]nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o/_/de ltar na chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom

[\[335a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[335a.7\]]du sems/_de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro/_/chos rnams rnam par dgod par ma mdzad na/_sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]nam/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi yod par mngon nam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[335b.2\]]byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che 
[\[335b.3\]]ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams yod par mngon nam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med 
[\[335b.4\]]min skye mched kyi/_lha yod par mngon nam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[335b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/_nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/_

[\[335b.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[336a.2\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/_sangs rgyas dkon 
[\[336a.3\]]mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi

[\[336a.5\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta bas 
[\[336a.6\]]na/_de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du so 
[\[336a.7\]]so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/_de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_/chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de 
[\[336b.2\]]de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[336b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_
[\[336b.4\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni so so skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa 
[\[336b.5\]]nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 
[\[336b.6\]]'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[336b.7\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de/_de de las rnam par mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]na/_de dag gi chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[337a.2\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/_de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags 
[\[337a.3\]]pa nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[337a.4\]]rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/_bcom ldan 
[\[337a.5\]]'das mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags 
[\[337a.6\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[337a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]tu phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams 
[\[337b.2\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[337b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon 
[\[337b.4\]]par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying 
[\[337b.5\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams te/_bcom ldan 
[\[337b.6\]]'das chos de dag thams cad ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba/_gcig las gcig 'das pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[337b.7\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_gti mug gi 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[338a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[338a.3\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[338a.4\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_
[\[338a.5\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[338a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_mi chen po'i 
[\[338a.7\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/_chos rnam par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/_
[\[338b.2\]]chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod 
[\[338b.3\]]pa'i tshe/_sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/_ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/_mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar mngon par 
[\[338b.4\]]shes pas rnam par rtse zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[338b.5\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_de dag la rnam par rtse bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/_
[\[338b.6\]]de dag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang 'di 
[\[338b.7\]]skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi/_chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/_de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[339a.2\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/_mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[339a.3\]]du sems/_gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_
[\[339a.4\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[339a.5\]]'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dngos po 
[\[339a.6\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa/_de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam 
[\[339a.7\]]gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so 
[\[339b.2\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lan 
[\[339b.3\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_
[\[339b.4\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa 
[\[339b.5\]]nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[339b.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_nang 
[\[339b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[340a.2\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom 
[\[340a.3\]]pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid dam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin 
[\[340a.4\]]gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya 
[\[340a.5\]]ste/_chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la yang so so'i skye bo med/_so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med/_de la yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yang med/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na yang de med/_de la yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[340a.6\]]ba las gud na 'ang de med/_de la brgyad pa yang med/_brgyad pa las gud na yang de med/_de la yang rgyun tu zhugs pa med/_rgyun tu zhugs pa las gud na yang de med/_de la yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba med/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na 'ang de med/_de la yang phyir mi 
[\[340a.7\]]'ong ba med/_phyir mi 'ong ba las gud na 'ang de med/_de la'ang dgra bcom pa med/_dgra bcom pa las gud na 'ang de med/_de la'ang rang sangs rgyas med/_rang sangs rgyas las gud na 'ang de med/_de la yang byang chub sems dpa' med/_byang chub sems dpa' las gud na 'ang 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]de med/_de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa med/_de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na 'ang de med par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/_'dus ma bgyis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin/_
[\[340b.2\]]'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/_'dus byas las gud na 'ang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med do/_/'dus ma byas las gud na 'ang 'dus byas dmigs su med de/_rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka 
[\[340b.3\]]yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di lta ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi don dam par ma yin te/_
[\[340b.4\]]don dam pa la/_lus kyi 'du byed dam/_ngag gi 'du byed dam/_yid kyi 'du byed med de/_lus kyi 'du byed dam/_ngag gi 'du byed dam/_yid kyi 'du byed las gud na yang don dam par dmigs su med do/_'on kyang 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 
[\[340b.5\]]mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong 
[\[340b.6\]]phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bdun cu pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de'i slad du chos gang la yang gang 
[\[340b.7\]]yang ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis na/_de ltar chos thams cad ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis shing /_ci yang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/_sbyin pa dang 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]tshig snyan pa dang don bgyi ba dang don 'thun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/_stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gang 
[\[341a.2\]]la yang ci yang byed pa med ci yang mi byed pa yang med de gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/_de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa 
[\[341a.3\]]nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed can gyi 'du shes dang /_shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes 
[\[341a.4\]]dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /_gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_gzugs kyi 'du 
[\[341a.5\]]shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 
[\[341a.6\]]'grel ba dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /_'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed 
[\[341a.7\]]cing /_'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa yin yang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/_bcom 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/_rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/_de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/sprul pa 
[\[341b.2\]]de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/_stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /_sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka dang yang ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags te/_de gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid kyis stong 
[\[341b.3\]]na/_de ci'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab pa mdzad/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_sprul pa gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[341b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/_gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul 
[\[341b.5\]]pa lags kyang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_
[\[341b.6\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_
[\[341b.7\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_de dag gi 'bras bu 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]gang gis gang zag rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes gang zag rnam par dgod 
[\[342a.2\]]pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/_de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o/_/la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/_/la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul 
[\[342a.3\]]pa'o/_la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba/_rgyun tu

[\[342a.7\]]kyis 'di skad du/_stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_gnyis su yang mi dmigs te/_chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do zhes bka' stsal pa/_ltar na bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

[\[342b.3\]]na/_ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci sngon dngos po yod par 'gyur la/_phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam/_rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yod pa yang med/_dngos po med pa yang med/_

[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]kyi chos kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad dang /_mtshan nyid thams cad du ma mchis pa lags sam/_de skad gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/byams pa nga ni gzugs rnam pa thams cad dang /_

[\[346b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs ji lta bur mchis bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ji lta bur mchis/_
[\[346b.4\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa gzugs ni 'jig rten gyi brda dang /_tha snyad du yod kyi don dam par yod pa ma yin no/_/byams pa tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[346b.5\]]dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi brda dang /_tha snyad du yod kyi don dam par yod pa ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di 
[\[346b.6\]]skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_dbyings 'di ni don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ste don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings lags na/_bcom ldan 
[\[346b.7\]]'das 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ji ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba'i ming bla thabs su gdags/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang lags pa de la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]bar du ji ltar ming bla thabs su gdags/_de bas na don dam par ma mchis so/_/de ste don dam par ma mchis na/_de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po brjod du ma mchis par 'gyur/_de bas na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings shes 
[\[347a.2\]]bgyi ba mi rigs so/_/de skad gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_de bas na byams pa khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar nus pa lan thob shig_/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/_nam khyod 
[\[347a.3\]]brjod du med pa'i dbyings la shes rab spyod pa de'i tshe/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gang la ming bla thabs su gdags 
[\[347a.4\]]par bya ba de dag khyod kyis yod par dmigs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gzhung 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de brjod 
[\[347a.5\]]du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bya ba'i bar du ming bla thabs su gdags pa 
[\[347a.6\]]de dag las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/byams pa de ste 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin par gyur na ni/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa 'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[347a.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa de ste 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan zhig yin na ni brjod du med pa'i dbyings gang la/_brjod du med pa'i dbyings rab tu chud par bya ba de'i mtshan ma yang dmigs 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]su med par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa gzhung 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin/_gang la gzugs shes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[347b.2\]]par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bya ba'i bar du ming bla thabs su gdags pa de dag las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di 
[\[347b.3\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang nye bar 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa na/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[347b.4\]]dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi ba'i bar du ming bla thabs su gdags pa gang lags pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci lags/_mchis pa las dmigs su ma mchis sam 
[\[347b.5\]]'on te ma mchis pa lags/_de skad gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rang dbang du yod pa nyid dam/_med pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang yang med 
[\[347b.6\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa khyod gang gi tshe/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pas gzung ba ma yin nam/_gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang nye bar 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi 
[\[347b.7\]]spyod pa la gnas shing /_rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe na yang /_rnam par mi rtog pas zin par ma gyur tam/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/byams pa de lta na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ces bya bar ming bla thabs su gdags pa gang yin pa de dag rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad pa ma yin nam/_de rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad na yang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings 
[\[348a.2\]]la gnas shing /_rnam par rtog pa bstsal pa na/_yod par dmigs pa gang la gzugs shes bya ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du yod par dmigs pa de gang yin/_de skad ces 
[\[348a.3\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos rab tu 'byed mkhas pa la gnas pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba 
[\[348a.4\]]rnam pa dus gdags pa 'tshal bar bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba rnam pa dus gdags par 'tshal bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[348a.5\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos rab tu 'byed mkhas pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gsum gyis gzugs rab tu dbye ba gdags pa rjes su shes par 
[\[348a.6\]]bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba gdags pa rjes su shes par bya ste/_'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs/_'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs 
[\[348a.7\]]'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/_/'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba/_'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba/_'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o/_/'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i 'du shes/_'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes/_'di ni 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]chos nyid kyi 'du shes so/_/'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i 'du byed/_'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed/_'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed do/_/'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa/_'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa/_
[\[348b.2\]]'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba nas/_'di ltar 'di dag ni yongs su brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos/_'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de skad bka' 
[\[348b.3\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang lags rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang lags/_chos nyid kyi gzugs gang lags/_
[\[348b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/_rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang 
[\[348b.5\]]lags/_chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gzugs so zhes ming dang 'du shes dang tha snyad du bya ba la brten nas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su brtags pa gang yin pa 'di ni yongs su 
[\[348b.6\]]brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ming dang /_'du shes dang /_gdags pa dang tha snyad du bya ba la brten nas 
[\[348b.7\]]tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su brtags pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni/_yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du 'di dag ni yongs su brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la rnam par rtog pa'i/_chos nyid tsam du gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas/_mngon par smra ba gang la 
[\[349a.2\]]'di ni ming dang /_'du shes dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad kyi gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/'di ni 
[\[349a.3\]]rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed/_rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa nas/_rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin 
[\[349a.4\]]gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos nyid dang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi dbyings 'di dag ni gnas pa nyid de/_brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa des/_rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de rtag cing rtag pa'i dus brtan zhing brtan pa'i dus su ngo bo nyid med cing 
[\[349a.5\]]chos bdag med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i 
[\[349a.6\]]bar du'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs 'di gsum las gzugs gang rdzas ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/_gang rdzas mchis pa lags/_gang 
[\[349a.7\]]rdzas mchis pa yang ma lags/_rdzas ma mchis pa yang ma lags la/_don dam pas rab tu phye ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das tshor ba 'di gsum dang /_'du shes 'di gsum dang /_'du byed 'di gsum dang /_rnam par shes pa 'di gsum nas/_sangs 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos 'di gsum gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos gang rdzas ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/_gang rdzas mchis par blta bar bgyi/_gang rdzas ma mchis pa yang ma lags/_rdzas mchis pa yang ma lags par blta bar bgyi zhing don dam pas rab tu phye ba 
[\[349b.2\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rdzas med par blta'o/_/rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang 
[\[349b.3\]]yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas yod pa'i phyir rdzas yod par lta'i rang dbang du 'jug pa ni ma yin no/_/chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de ni rdzas med pa yang ma yin rdzas yod pa yang ma yin te/_don dam pas rab tu phye ba yin par blta'o/_/yongs su brtags pa'i 
[\[349b.4\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa nas/_yongs su brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar du 'di dag ni rdzas med par blta'o/_/rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[349b.5\]]rnam par shes pa nas rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar du rnam par rtog pa rdzas yod pa'i phyir rdzas yod par blta'i/_rang dbang du 'jug pa ni ma yin no/_/byams pa chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[349b.6\]]rnam par shes pa gang yin pa nas/_chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar du de dag ni rdzas med pa yang ma yin rdzas yod pa yang ma yin te don dam pas rab tu phye ba yin par blta'o/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams 
[\[349b.7\]]pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba gnyis su ma mchis par brtsis 'di ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du de dag 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]gnyis su ma mchis par brtsis te/_de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba mdzad/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la 
[\[350a.2\]]dgongs nas 'di ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di gnyis su ma mchis par brtsis/_'di ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis par 
[\[350a.3\]]brtsis te bstan/_de skad gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de ji snyam du sems/_yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs la rdzas med pa de gzugs sam/_'on te gzugs ma yin/_
[\[350a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/gang yang de la ming dang /_'du shes dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam gyi gzugs shes bya ba de ci gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs des 
[\[350a.5\]]kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyang ma yin/_gzugs med pa yang ma yin/_gzugs kyang ma yin/_gzugs med pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas 'di 
[\[350a.6\]]la dgongs nas 'di ltar gzugs shes bya ba 'di gnyis su med par brtsi bar gsungs so/_/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rdzas yod pa de la brten nas/_ming dang 'du shes dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad du 'gyur 
[\[350a.7\]]ba gang yin pa de ci gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa 
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]gang yin pa de ci gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de gzugs kyang ma yin/_gzugs med pa yang ma yin no/_/
[\[350b.2\]]gzugs kyang ma yin/_gzugs med pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas de la dgongs nas 'di ltar gzugs shes bya ba 'di gnyis su med par brtsi bar gsungs so/_/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/_chos nyid kyi gzugs 
[\[350b.3\]]gzugs bdag med par rab tu phye ba de ci gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/chos nyid kyi gzugs de'i gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang ci gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/
[\[350b.4\]]byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/_gzugs med pa yang ma yin no/_/gang gzugs kyang ma yin gzugs med pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas de la dgongs 
[\[350b.5\]]nas 'di ltar gzugs de gnyis su med par brtsi bar gsungs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang 
[\[350b.6\]]chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar gzugs gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[350b.7\]]rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du de ltar gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pas mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas ji ltar mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa dang /_ji ltar mtshan nyid spang ba dang /_ji ltar mtshan nyid 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]mngon du bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar mtshan nyid bsgom pa blta bar bgyi/_de skad gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub 
[\[351a.2\]]sems dpa' mtha' gnyis spangs nas/_de ltar dbu ma'i lam la rab tu zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/_yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[351a.3\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gang yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/_yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/_/gang gzugs spong ba yang ma yin mi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/_/de 
[\[351a.4\]]bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gang spong ba yang ma yin/_mi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/_/gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin mngon 
[\[351a.5\]]sum du mi byed pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o/_/gang gzugs spong ba'i lam sgom pa yang ma yin/_mi sgom pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_
[\[351a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du sbyar ro/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yongs su 
[\[351a.7\]]shes pa dang /_spong ba dang /_mngon du byed pa dang /_bsgom par ldan pa de'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/_de skad gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo/_/rab tu zab bo/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 
[\[351b.2\]]'das pa de ltar zab cing rab tu zab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni gang mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin te/_de bas na de zab 
[\[351b.3\]]cing rab tu zab ces bya'o/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa de mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma 
[\[351b.4\]]lags/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams te/_'khor ba yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir mya ngan las ma 'das pa'o/_/bdag gi don las brtsams te/_mya ngan las 
[\[351b.5\]]'das pa yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las brtsams 
[\[351b.6\]]te/_'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/_'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas des ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa btang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/_mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi 
[\[351b.7\]]gtong na/_des ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_'khor ba la 'khor bar rnam par mi rtog_/mya ngan las 'das 
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]pa la yang mya ngan las 'das par rnam par mi rtog ste/_de de ltar rnam par mi rtog na 'di ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis mtshungs mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor bar rnam par mi rtog na 
[\[352a.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin du 'khor bar mi skyo'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la mya ngan las 'das par rnam par mi rtog na/_'khor ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba 
[\[352a.3\]]yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha 
[\[352a.4\]]rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas pas ji ltar 'khor ba ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa yang ma lags so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ste ma blangs na ji ltar 
[\[352a.5\]]btang ba ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa nga ni de ltar 'khor ba blang ba 'am/_mi blang bar mi smra'i/_byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i ye shes 
[\[352a.6\]]kyis sems dbang du gyur pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du thabs mkhas pas 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bar nga smra'o/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[352a.7\]]dmigs su med pa la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bar nga smra'o/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog pa la mtshan nyid 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]thams cad ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar dang /_gzugs 
[\[352b.2\]]kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i bar du chos de dag dang stong pa nyid de dag sgom pa dang /_dngos po gnyis su med pa dang /_rab tu spros pa med pa 'di ni byams pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thams cad du blta'o/_/
[\[352b.3\]]de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_nyan thos thams cad phyogs gcig pa 'am/_shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags/_bcom 
[\[352b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa 'jig rten pa 'di dag ni khams sna tshogs pa khams du ma pa ste/_khams sna tshogs khams du ma pa'i 'jig rten pa de dag la sems can gyi rigs dang /_rang 
[\[352b.5\]]bzhin rab tu mang po yod de/_byams pa sems can gyi rus dang /_rigs dang po nas bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing bzang po'i khyad par nyid thob pa de lta bu yang yod do/_/sems can gyi rus dang rigs gang dang po nas khyad par ngan pa 'dod cing ngan pa nyid 'thob ste/_
[\[352b.6\]]de nyid kyis mgu bar 'gyur ba de lta bu yang yod do/_/rus dang rigs gang thog ma nas ngan pa'i bye brag 'dod cing ngan pa nyid 'thob ste/_ngan pa thob nas de tsam gyis mgu bar mi 'gyur zhing /_de nas phyis gong du bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing bzang po 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[352b.7\]]ba de lta bu dag kyang yod do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang sems can gyi rus dang rigs gsum po de dgra bcom pa thob nas/_bla na ma mchis pa 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i skye ba yang ma mchis par lung bstan te/_skye ba ma mchis na ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de'i skye ba las 
[\[353a.2\]]dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin par ni nga mi 'dogs kyi/_de'i skye ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur bar gdags so/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[353a.3\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa rgya che ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa mthu che ba gang la dang po nyid du bzang po'i khyad par 'tshal zhing bzang po'i khyad par nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[353a.4\]]rnams kyi bsam pa rgya che ba de dag gang lags/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang /_mi 'dzin pa'i bde ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[353a.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ltar 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir te/_'di ni de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mthu chen po yin par blta'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces 
[\[353a.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 
[\[353a.7\]]thob par 'tshal bas/_bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la rab tu phye ba'i le'u ste/_bdun cu gnyis pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bdun cu bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshol 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu pho 'am/_
[\[353b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo des rtag par rab tu ngu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_ji ltar btsal zhing de ltar sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na/_tshangs par spyod pa de ltar btsal bar 
[\[353b.3\]]bya'o/_/de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ji ltar btsal/_de skad 
[\[353b.4\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad bka' stsal to/_rab 'byor rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshol ba na/_lus mi 'phangs pa dang /_srog la mi lta 
[\[353b.5\]]ba dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang /_grags pa la mi gnas pas btsal to/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshol ba na/_dgon pa na 'dug pa'i tshe bar snang las 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang /_de nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos 
[\[353b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ci nas kyang lus ngal ba'i yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /_rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /_zas kyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /_skom gyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /_mtshan mo'i yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /_nyin par gyi 
[\[353b.7\]]yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /_grang ba'i yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /_tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skye ba de ltar song shig/_phyi rol dang nang gang la'ang sems ma 'jog shig_/rigs kyi bu g.yon du lta zhing ma 'gro shig/_g.yas su ma lta zhig/_nub phyogs dang 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]byang phyogs dang /_bla dang 'og dang mtshams rnams su lta zhing ma 'gro shig_/rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang 'jig tshogs la mi g.yo ba dang /_gzugs la mi g.yo ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[354a.2\]]shes pa la mi g.yo ba de ltar song shig/_gang des g.yos pa de ni 'gal bar gnas so/_/gang las 'gal bar gnas she na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos las 'gal bar gnas so/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las 'gal bar gnas pa de 'khor ba na spyod 
[\[354a.3\]]do/_/gang 'khor ba na spyod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi rnyed do zhes zer ba'i sgra thos par gyur to/_/sgra des de skad smras pa dang /_rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de'i lan 'di skad smras so/_/de ltar bya'o/_/
[\[354a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi snang ba byed par 'dod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad smras pa dang /_sgra des rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[354a.5\]]rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu legs so/_/legs so/_/de nas yang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la khyod kyis mos pa bskyed de/_
[\[354a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bya'o/_/mtshan ma spangs pa dang /_dngos po spangs pa dang /_sems can du lta ba khyod kyis spang bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po rnams spang bar bya'o/_/gang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[354a.7\]]med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_ma 'gags pa'i chos 'chad pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsnyen par bya/_bsten par bya/_bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]bu khyod kyis de ltar byas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du gyur pa 'am/_chos smra ba'i dge slong las ring po mi thogs par thos par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyan pa de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed 
[\[354b.2\]]par bya'o/_/khyod kyis drin du gzo ba dang /_byas pa dran par bya'o/_/'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_'di las bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos so/_/gang thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las myur du slar mi 
[\[354b.3\]]ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_mi khom pa rnams spangs par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[354b.4\]]dal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/zhes rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phan yon 'di dag yongs su brtag cing chos smra ba'i dge slong la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'i/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong la bsnyen 
[\[354b.5\]]par mi bya'o/_/khyod kyis chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos la gus pas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/_/khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang shes par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[354b.6\]]la gzugs dang /_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang /_bsten pa dang /_spyad pa'i phyir khyer te 'ong ba dag kyang yod do/_/de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas/_thabs mkhas pas sor bsnyen bsten yongs su spyod do/_/de la yang rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[354b.7\]]kyis chos smra ba la sems ma dad pa mi bskyed pa 'di ltar sems bskyed do/_/bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de rab tu mi shes kyi/_'di ni thabs mkhas pas rab tu shes so/_/'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i 
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]phyir chos 'di rnams so sor bsnyen bsten spyod par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa 'am sgrib pa med do/_/de'i tshe yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor 
[\[355a.2\]]brtag par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul yang gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/chos thams cad ni 
[\[355a.3\]]sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gang zag med pa ste/_sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu brag cha lta bu gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor rtog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na/_ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi 
[\[355a.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las gzhan dag kyang shes par bya ba ni rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la gshe zhing mi lta na/_de la yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis slar kyal 
[\[355a.5\]]bar mi bya'i/_gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos la gus pa dang /_sems mi skyo bas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/_/de nas rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de las gdams pa 'di lta bu thos nas/_
[\[355a.6\]]shar phyogs kyi phyogs ga la ba der song ngo /_/song nas ring po ma lon par yang de la 'di snyam du gyur to/_/bdag gis sgra de las bdag ji srid du 'gro dgos shes ma dris so snyam nas/_de sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/_ngu zhing 'bod pa dang /_mya ngan byed smre 
[\[355a.7\]]sngags 'don cing 'di snyam du sems so/_/sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam/_gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga 'am drug gam nyin zhag bdun 'das par byas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma thos kyi bar du lus ngal ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed/_
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi yid la byed pa mi skyed/_bza' ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed/_btung ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed/_mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/_nyin par gyi yid la byed pa mi skyed/_grang ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyed do snyam du sems so/_/
[\[355b.2\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig bu gcig pa zhig dus las 'das te sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te/_de bu'i mya ngan gyis bu'i mya ngan las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba de bzhin du rab 'byor rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems 
[\[355b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de'i tshe/_nam zhig bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de nas rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar phongs shing 
[\[355b.4\]]'dug pa'i mdun du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas/_rigs kyi bu khyod de skad smra ba legs so/_/legs so zhes/_legs pa byin te/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_sngon byang chub 
[\[355b.5\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ji ltar da ltar khyed tshol ba de bzhin du btsal to/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus de nyid dang /_spro ba de nyid dang /_don du gnyer ba de nyid dang /_mos pa de nyid kyis rgyun chags par shar phyogs su 
[\[355b.6\]]song shig dang /_'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/_spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_ra ba bdun rim gyis bskor ba/_'obs bdun rim gyis bskor ba/_shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba/_chur dpag tshad bcu 
[\[355b.7\]]gnyis/_zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis/_'byor cing dar ba/_bde zhing skyid pa/_nyams dga' ba/_mi mang pos gang ba/_srang gi tshong khang ri mo la bris pa lta bu mnyam pa lnga brgya yod pa/_khyogs dang bzhon pa mi dog par 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug gi rtsig pa yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rtsig pa de dag gi rib ma yang 'dzam bu na da'i gser las byas pa/_tshad dang ldan zhing 'phang mtho ba/_rib ma de dag re re las kyang rin po che 
[\[356a.2\]]sna bdun gyi shing /_'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams skyes te/_'bras bu de dag thams cad las kyang rin po che las byas pa'i srad bus sbrel ba'i shing gzhan dag dang ldan pa sha stag go_/grong khyer de thams cad kyang gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas g.yogs te/_
[\[356a.3\]]gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba de dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba dag 'byung ste/_dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rnga rol mo mkhan mkhas pa rnams/_tshogs pas brdungs pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la/_chags par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[356a.4\]]sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du/_dril bu'i dra ba de dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba 'byung ngo /_/sems can de dag kyang sgra de dag gis rtse zhing dga' ba dang yongs su spyod par byed do/_/grong khyer spos can de'i kho ra khor yug gi 'obs 
[\[356a.5\]]kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rgyun du 'bab ste/_ha cang yang mi grang ha cang yang mi dro ba'i chu de la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru/_sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba/_de dag tu sems can de dag 
[\[356a.6\]]zhugs nas/_rtse zhing dga' ba dang /_yongs su spyod pa byed do/_/chu de dag thams cad kyang ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang ku mu da dang /_pun dA ri kas khebs pa/_gzhan yang me tog rigs che zhing bsung zhim pa dag gis yongs su khebs te/_stong gsum 
[\[356a.7\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_me tog gi rigs gang dang gang yod pa de dag thams cad spos can gyi grong khyer na med pa gcig kyang med do/_/grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug na/_skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/_de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun 
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]las byas pa/_bzang zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag go_/skyed mos tshal de re re na yang rgyang grags gcig pa'i mtsho lnga brgya yod de/_mtsho de dag thams cad na yang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang ku mu da dang /_pun dA ri ka mdzes shing blta na 
[\[356b.2\]]sdug pa rnams kyis khebs par 'khod do/_/ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun dA ri ka de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam sha stag ste/_mthing ka la kha dog mthing khar 'dug pa/_mthing kha 'dra zhing mthing khar snang ba/_
[\[356b.3\]]ser po la kha dog ser po/_ser po 'dra zhing ser por snang ba/_dmar po la kha dog dmar po/_dmar po 'dra zhing dmar por snang ba/_dkar po la kha dog dkar po/_/dkar po 'dra zhing dkar por snang ba sha stag go_/mtsho de dag thams cad na bya ngang mo dang /_
