[\[356b.4\]]ka ran da ba dang /_khrung khrung dang /_sa ra sa dang /_ngur pa'i sgras khyab par sgrogs so/_/skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi bya ba med pa/_yongs su gzung ba med pa/_sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba ste/_
[\[356b.5\]]'di ltar yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_chos zab mo la rab tu mos pa'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/rigs kyi bu spos can gyi grong khyer gyi lam srang gi mdo'i dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[356b.6\]]kyis 'phags pa'i khyim kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa/_rin po che bdun las byas pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_blta na sdug pa/_ra ba bdun dang /_shing ta la'i 'phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba'o/_/khyim de na 
[\[356b.7\]]khyim gyi longs spyod du skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/_rtag par rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /_mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba dang /_mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /_me tog mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal lo/_/skyed mos tshal de 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]dag re re na yang mtshe'u brgyad brgyad yod de/_bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /_bzang mo'i mchog ces bya ba dang /_dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang /_bde ba zhes bya ba dang /_bde ba can zhes bya ba dang /_nges 
[\[357a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba ste/_mtshe'u de rnams kyi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/_ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas/_ngos gsum pa ni bai DUr+ya las byas/_ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/_nang gi gzhi ni kar ke ta na las byas shing 
[\[357a.3\]]gzhi gser gyi bye ma bkram pa'o/_/mtshe'u de re re la yang 'bab stegs khri 'phang can brgyad brgyad yod de/_'bab stegs kyi ngos kun rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan cing /_'bab stegs kyi bar thams cad nas 'dzam bu na da'i gser gyi chu shing dag 
[\[357a.4\]]skyes so/_/mtshe'u de dag thams cad na me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun dA ri ka sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /_bya ngang mo dang /_sa ra sa dang /_ngur pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/mtshe'u de dag gi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing 
[\[357a.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs skye'o/_/me tog gi shing de dag rlung gis btab pa'i me tog rnams kyang mtshe'u nang du lhags so/_/mtshe'u de dag thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi bsung can la kha dog dang dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de na byang chub 
[\[357a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rtse ba'i sa yod de/_de 'khor dang bcas pa/_bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas/_de na rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/grong 
[\[357a.7\]]khyer de na gnas pa'i sems can skyes pa 'am/_bud med gang yin pa de dag kyang rtag par rab tu dga' zhing skyed mos tshal dang /_mtshe'u rnams su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor bas rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de yang /_'khor dang bcas par lhan cig rtse zhing dga' ba yongs su spyad nas/_de'i 'og tu dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad do/_/grong khyer spos can de na 'khod pa'i sems can gang 
[\[357b.2\]]yin pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi lam mdo'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi khri 'dzugs te/_rkang pa gser las byas pa 'am/_dngul las byas pa 'am/_bai DUr+ya las byas pa 'am/_shel las byas 
[\[357b.3\]]pa'i steng /_shing bal gyi stan nam/_'go li ka'i stan nam/_khong tshang can gyi stan nam/_ka shi ka'i gos bting ba/_'phang du rgyang grags phyed tsam yod pa/_steng gi bar snang las kyang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i bla re bres pas/_phyogs de kho ra 
[\[357b.4\]]khor yug tu yang /_me tog kha dog rnam pa lngas 'thor/_mngon par 'thor/_rab tu mngon par 'thor ro/_/bdug spos bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de bdug par byed do/_/de 'di ltar chos la gus pas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[357b.5\]]dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang la 'dug nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa la/_bsung can na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la de lta bu'i chos la gus pa'i tshul 
[\[357b.6\]]gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa ni srog chags brgya phrag mang po/_srog chags stong phrag mang po/_/srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po rnams lhags par gyur te/_mi dang lha rnams gang nyan pa de dag las kha cig ni klog slob/_kha cig ni kha 
[\[357b.7\]]ton slob/_kha cig ni yongs su chud par byed/_kha cig ni 'dzin/_kha cig ni 'chang /_kha cig ni zlos/_kha cig ni 'dri/_kha cig ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'gro'o/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang ltung ba'i chos can ma yin la/_
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go_/rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du song shig dang /_de las khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[358a.2\]]thos par 'gyur ro/_/de ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skul ma 'debs pa/_gzeng bstod pa rab tu spro bar byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[358a.3\]]du phyin pa da ltar khyod tshol ba bzhin du btsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du ngal bso ba'i yid la byed pa ma skyed par song shig dang /_ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[358a.4\]]chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'di thos nas/_dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga'/_mos shing yid bde bar gyur pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/_mi zhig dug dang bcas pa'i zug rngus zug na/_nam zhig bdag gis zug rngu 'byin pa'i 
[\[358a.5\]]sman pa gang /_bdag gi zug rngu 'di 'byin cing /_gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa na ma rnyed par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba yang /_gang bdag 
[\[358a.6\]]la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston cing chos gang bdag gis thos nas/_dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa spongs par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed do/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[358a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/_chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rgyu dang /_tshe rabs snga ma la goms pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]ma mngon du gyur pa ni 'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos 
[\[358b.2\]]thams cad la tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi 'gyur bar mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[358b.3\]]'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi shes pa 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_me tog mngon par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[358b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar rab tu snang ba mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can 
[\[358b.5\]]thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra dang tshig dang 'bru sna tshogs mngon par 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ma mnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[358b.6\]]'dzin dang /_rang bzhin gyis tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[358b.7\]]chos thams cad rnam par mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi sgrib pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzugs kyi rgyal po nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings las byung 
[\[359a.2\]]ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul dang rnam par bral ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[359a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_pad mo'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos 
[\[359a.4\]]thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams 
[\[359a.5\]]cad kyi 'byor ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_le lo thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos zab mo'i 'od byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[359a.6\]]dang /_bdud kyi 'khor 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_khams gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/_
[\[359a.7\]]de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas par gyur nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa rnams mthong ngo /_/
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang /_de la legs pa sbyin zhing dbugs phyung nas 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal te/_ting nge 'dzin 'di dag rab tu thob pa ni gang 
[\[359b.2\]]de ltar khyod kyis thob pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin de dag rab tu thob nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par gyur to/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur te/_nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid la bltas na/_snyoms par 
[\[359b.3\]]'jug pa 'am/_ldang ba 'am/_gang byang chub tu spyod pa 'am/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang ma mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la yang sems 
[\[359b.4\]]pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu nged kyis sems pa med pa la gnas pas/_lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'di lta bu dag rab tu thob/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[359b.5\]]kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /_bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[359b.6\]]rnams kyis kyang tshad bzung ba 'am/_mtha' bstan par mi nus na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lta smos kyang mi dgos pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag rab tu thob bo/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang chos 'di dag nyid 
[\[359b.7\]]la gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya'o/_/lhag par don du gnyer ba dang /_mos par bya ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang /_mos par byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dkon no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang gus pa rab tu skyed cing dga' bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[360a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/_de bzhin 
[\[360a.3\]]gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas yun ring po nas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[360a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /_thabs mkhas pa la yang bslabs te/_de ni rigs kyi bu khyod la phan 'dogs pa yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/
[\[360a.5\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i byas pa gzungs su bzung ngo /_/gal te rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de/_bskal pa gcig gam/_bskal pa gnyis sam/_bskal pa brgya 'am/_
[\[360a.6\]]bskal pa stong ngam/_de bas kyang lhag par ras kyi thod bzhin du mgo la khyer ram/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byin nam/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa ji snyed 
[\[360a.7\]]yod pa de dag thams cad byin yang de tsam gyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mkhas pa 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]thos par gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po thob pa'i le'u ste/_
[\[360b.2\]]bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar 
[\[360b.3\]]gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de rnams las langs par gyur to/_/langs nas kyang de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ga nas byon/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam sems par gyur to/_/des de bzhin 
[\[360b.4\]]gshegs pa de dag ma mthong ba dang /_mi dga' zhing gdung ba chen por gyur te 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de gzungs rab tu thob la/_lnga mngon 
[\[360b.5\]]par shes pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa ste/_bdag la phan 'dogs pa/_bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_yun ring por des bdag gi don byas pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[360b.6\]]gar bzhud ces bya ba'i don de bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du nye bar song ste/_dri bar bya'o snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag 
[\[360b.7\]]par rab tu ngu ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_rje sa dang /_gus pa bskyed nas sngar 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gis sti stang ji lta bu zhig gis 'phags 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la bsnyen par bya/_bdag kyang dbul bas bdag la gos sam/_rin po che 'am/_gser ram/_mu tig gam/_bai DUr+ya 'am/_dung ngam/_shel lam/_
[\[361a.2\]]byu ru 'am/_dngul lam/_me tog gam/_bdug pa 'am/_spos sam/_phreng ba dang /_byug pa 'am/_gdugs gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la sti stang du bya bar 'os pa de lta bu cung 
[\[361a.3\]]zad kyang med/_bdag de bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du 'gro bar yang mi rigs la/_bdag dga' zhing mgu bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[361a.4\]]dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de lta bur bla ma la gus shing rim gro bya ba'i don yid la byed pas/_mthar gyis song song na/_grong khyer gcig cig tu phyin te/_der tshong dus kyi dbus su phyin pa dang /_'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gi lus 'di 
[\[361a.5\]]btsongs te/_de'i rin gyis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa bya'o/_/yun ring mo zhig tu bdag gi lus stong tsam zhig par gyur/_dengs par gyur/_btsongs rmeg med par gyur te dpag tu 
[\[361a.6\]]med pa'i 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor ba na/_dpag tu med pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur te/_de yang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhi'i phyir gyi/_chos 'di lta bu'i phyir ram/_
[\[361a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu dag la mchod pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_tshong dus kyi dbus su mi su nyo mi su nyo zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste bos so/_/de nas bdud sdig to 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]can 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[361b.2\]]dpa' chen pos ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du rdzogs par 'gyur/_thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu thob par 'gyur/_bdud dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyis mi tshugs 
[\[361b.3\]]par 'gyur/_yon tan thams cad kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/_des kyang sems can mang po'i don byed par 'gyur de dag kyang bdag gi spyod yul las 'das par 'gyur 
[\[361b.4\]]la/_sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gis spyod yul las 'das nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis/_de'i phyir bdag gis de'i bar chad bya'o snyam du bsams so/_/de nas bdud sdig 
[\[361b.5\]]can gyis bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de rnams la ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas mi su nyo mi su nyo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pa de mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur zil gyis mnan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[361b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa dang /_phyogs gcig tu song ste ngus nas 'di snyam du e ma'o bdag gi lus nyo ba yang med de/_rnyed pa rab tu ma rnyed do snyam du sems so/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'di snyam du byang chub 
[\[361b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di chos 'dod pa'i phyir/_yang dag pa'i bsam pas bdag gi lus yongs su gtong ngam/_'on te ma yin pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po bram ze'i 
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]khye'u zhig tu mngon par sprul nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs 
[\[362a.2\]]kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir yid mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed la ngu zhing 'dug/_rab tu ngu bas bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u bdag ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/_bdag gi lus btsongs te chos la mchod par 'dod na/_bdag nyo ba ma rnyed de 
[\[362a.3\]]de la bdag 'di snyam du gang bdag gi lus btsongs nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa bya zhing 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la yang /_bkur stir bya ba de lta bu'i lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed pa de/_
[\[362a.4\]]e ma'o bdag bsod nams re chung snyam du sems so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag la mi ni mi dgos kyi/_bdag mchod sbyin zhig 
[\[362a.5\]]byed pas/_der mi'i snying dang /_khrag dang rus pa dang /_rkang dgos na de nyor sbyin nam/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[362a.6\]]khye'u 'di la bdag gi lus dang /_snying dang khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang nyo ba rnyed pa ni/_bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog rab tu rnyed/_bdag gis lus kyang don yod par gyur to snyam du sems te/_de dga' mgu rab tu dga' ba'i sems 
[\[362a.7\]]su gyur nas/_khye'u de la 'di skad smras so/_/khye'u khyod lus 'di gang gi phyir dgos pa de sbyin no/_/des de la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod la rin ci zhig sbyin/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]khye'u de la 'di skad smras so/_/khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de byin cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te dpung pa g.yas pa phug nas khrag phyung ngo /_/brla g.yas pa yang 
[\[362b.2\]]bcad nas sha med par byas de/_rtsig pa zhig gi drung du rus pa gcog tu song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang thog na 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/_brla'i sha med par byas nas/_rtsig pa'i drung du 
[\[362b.3\]]rus pa gcog tu song ba mthong ba dang /_de 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir bdag gis bdag la gnod par byed/_de bdag gis rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[362b.4\]]chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba gang na ba der song ste/_der phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar bdag la bdag gnod par byed/_khrag dang rus pa dang 
[\[362b.5\]]rkang de dag gis kyang ci zhig bya/_rtag par rab tu ngu bas bu mo de la 'di skad smras so/_/'di dag khye'u de la btsongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod cing /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 
[\[362b.6\]]'phags pa la yang rim gror bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la tshongs dpon gyi bu mo des 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi snying dang /_khrag dang rus pa dang rkang btsongs te/_'phags pa 
[\[362b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror byas na yon tan ci zhig yod/_des bu mo de la 'di skad smras so/_/bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la nged kyis bslabs na/_sems can thams cad rjes su 'brang 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po 
[\[363a.2\]]brgyad cu dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_'od zer mtha' yas pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[363a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnam 
[\[363a.4\]]par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[363a.5\]]tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang sems can thams cad la bgor yod pa/_bla na med pa'i chos rin po che rab tu thob par 'gyur ba/_de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa/_bdag la ston te de la 
[\[363a.6\]]bdag slob bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la tshong dpon gyi bu mo des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yongs su bsgrags pa'i chos rgya chen po de dag ni ngo mtshar che ste/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[363a.7\]]chos de lta bu re re'i phyir yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus kyang yongs su btang bar 'os na/_gcig lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba 'di dag yongs su bsgrags so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ci dgos pa gser ram/_dngul lam/_bai DUr+ya 'am/_nor bu rin po che 'am/_mu tig gam/_me tog gam/_bdug pa 'am/_spos sam/_
[\[363b.2\]]phreng ba 'am/_byug pa 'am/_phye ma 'am/_gos sam/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la rim gror bya bar 'gyur ba de dag bdag gis 
[\[363b.3\]]pha ma las bslangs te sbyin gyis/_bdag la bdag 'di lta bu'i gnod pa ma byed cig_/bdag kyang chos de rnams 'dod de/_bdag kyang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der khyod dang 
[\[363b.4\]]lhan cig tu 'gro'o/_/bdag kyang 'di ltar chos de lta bu de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u yi lus mi snang bar byas nas/_bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems 
[\[363b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta bur yi dam la brtan pa legs so/_/legs so/_/rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[363b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_chos don du gnyer ba'i tshul 'di lta bus/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs mkhas pas btsal cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yongs su dris nas/_
[\[363b.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag la ni snying dang /_khrag dang rus pa dang rkang mi dgos kyi/_khyod la nyams sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/_rigs kyi bu khyod la mchog 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]ji tsam zhig sbyin par bya ba'i mchog slongs shig_/rtag par rab tu ngu bas brgya byin la smras pa/_brgya byin bdag la bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos byin cig/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yul 'di ni bdag 
[\[364a.2\]]gi spyod yul ma yin gyi/_yul 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/de bas na mchog gzhan zhig slongs shig_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/_lha'i dbang po 'o na khyod thugs khral chung ngu 
[\[364a.3\]]gyis la bzhugs shig/_bdag gis lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_bdag rang bden pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[364a.4\]]tu lung bstan cing /_bdag la sgyu med pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yod par bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus snga ma bzhin du gyur cig_/de nas skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_
[\[364a.5\]]yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i lus snga ma bzhin du gnas par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med 
[\[364a.6\]]par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la de las gzhan lan 'debs ma nus nas/_gnas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[364a.7\]]rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag gi khyim gang na ba der bzhud kyis tshur spyon/_bdag gi pha ma las nor bslangs te/_khyod chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mchod pa dang /_'phags pa byang chub 
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la rim gror bya ba'i nor de khyod la sbyin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang lhan cig tu de'i khyim gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de 
[\[364b.2\]]nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du song nas/_pha ma la 'di skad smras so/_/yab yum bdag la nor mang po stsal du gsol/_/gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che dang /_nor bu dang /_gos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_
[\[364b.3\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams dang sil snyan gyi bye brag rnam pa mang po rnams bdag la stsal du gsol/_khyed kyis bdag la 'khor du stsal pa'i bu mo lnga 
[\[364b.4\]]brgya po 'di rnams dang /_lhan cig tu bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mchod cing /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[364b.5\]]kyis 'phags pa la rim gro bgyid du mchi bar ci gnang /_des bdag cag la chos bshad na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu mo de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu mo de la 'di skad smras so/_/bu mo 
[\[364b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba zhes bya ba de su zhig_/da lta ga la 'dug_/bu mos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de 'o skol gyi chab sgo'i drung na mchis te/_rigs kyi bu de yang lhag pa'i bsam pas/_bla na 
[\[364b.7\]]ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu zhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs las thar bar 'tshal ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos 'tshal bas/_bdag gi lus btsongs te dam 
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]pa'i chos kyi tshul shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro bgyi bar 'tshal na/_de'i lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed nas/_de sdug bsngal bar gyur 
[\[365a.2\]]yid mi dga' sems khongs su chud/_yi chad nas ngu zhing 'dug pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi lus su sprul nas/_de la nyams sad pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' ba dang /_sems khongs su chud 
[\[365a.3\]]de yi chad nas/_ci'i phyir ngu zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /_des de la bdag ni bdag gi lus 'tshong na/_de nyo ba yang med do zhes smras so/_/brgya byin khye'u'i lus su bsgyur bas smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag gi lus 'tshong /_rtag 
[\[365a.4\]]par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa dang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de yang 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir te/_de la bdag 
[\[365a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rag lus so/_/khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur ba'i brgya byin gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag la mi ni mi dgos kyi/_bdag mchod sbyin zhig byed pas/_der bdag la mi'i snying dang /_khrag dang rus pa dang rkang dag dgos 
[\[365a.6\]]so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu de sems ma zhum par gyur nas/_de yang sbyin no zhes smras te/_de mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te/_bdag gi dpung pa phug ste khrag phyung brla yang sha med par byas nas/_rtsig pa zhig gi drung du rus pa gcog tu song ste/_
[\[365a.7\]]rus pa dang rkang sbyin no snyam pa las/_de khrag zag cing 'dug pa bdag gis khang thog nas mthong ba dang /_de la bdag 'di snyam du mi 'di ci byed pa zhig/_'di ltar bdag la bdag gnod par byed snyam nas/_de'i drung du bdag mchis te 'di skad 
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]smras so/_rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag la bdag khrag 'byin/_de nas rigs kyi bu des bdag la 'di skad smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang rus pa dang rkang sbyin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag ni dbul bas nor gzhan cung zad kyang 
[\[365b.2\]]med do/_/de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so/_/nor des khyod la ci zhig bya/_des bdag la 'di skad smras so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod cing chos 'dod pa'i phyir/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[365b.3\]]kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya'o/_/de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de las yon tan gyi rigs dang /_yon tan gyi bye brag ci zhig 'byung /_des bdag la 'di skad smras so/_/de ni bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang sangs 
[\[365b.4\]]rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dpag tu med pa mi 'phrogs pa de lta bu'i chos rnams de las thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bdag gis thob pa dang /_dga' zhing mgu ba chen po skyes shing /_
[\[365b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos pa dang bdag 'di snyam du gyur to/_/gang 'di lta bu dag byed nus pa ni/_rigs kyi bu 'di dka' ba spyod pa ste ngo mtshar che'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gis lus yongs su 
[\[365b.6\]]gtong na/_bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos 'di mchod par mi bya 'di lta bu dag gi gnas su ci'i phyir smon lam mi gdab/_bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po rab tu mang du yod do snyam nas/_bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[365b.7\]]rigs kyi bu khyod bdag la gnod pa 'di lta bu ma byed cig/_bdag gis nor mang po pha ma las bslangs te sbyin no/_/des khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]rim gro byos shig/_bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ste/_bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bya'o/_/bdag kyang 
[\[366a.2\]]'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du gang khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de bas na yab yum nor mang po phal cher bdag la stsal te/_bdag rigs 
[\[366a.3\]]kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa bgyid du mchi bar ci gnang //_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu 
[\[366a.4\]]lnga pa/_bam po bdun cu brgyad pa/_de nas bu mo de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu mo de la 'di skad smras so/_/bu mo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu de'i gtam byas pa ni rab tu dka'o/_/'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa sems can thams cad 
[\[366a.5\]]bde bar byed pa'i chos gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de 'di lta bu'i dka' ba nyams su len pa'i chos de dag kyang shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de bas na bu mo khyod nged kyis gnang ngo /_/nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[366a.6\]]dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de blta ba dang /_mchod pa byed du 'dong gis skabs byin cig/_de nas bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa dang /_bkur stir byed du 'dong 'dod pa'i pha ma gnyis 
[\[366a.7\]]la 'di skad smras so/_/bdag ni su la yang dge ba'i bar chad mi bgyid do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang de'i pha ma la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pas shing rta lnga brgya brgyan/_bu mo lnga brgya po de yang brgyan nas/_me tog sna tshogs rnams thogs/_gos rnam pa sna 
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]tshogs dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams thogs/_gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog rnams thogs/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_gser dang 
[\[366b.2\]]nor bu dang mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang shel dang byi ru rnams thogs/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba mang po thogs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang lhan cig tu shing rta gcig 
[\[366b.3\]]la zhon/_bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta lnga brgya la zhon pas yongs su bskor/_mdun du byas nas 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi phyogs gang na ba der logs su dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 
[\[366b.4\]]mthar gyis song song na/_rgyang ring po zhig nas spos can gyi grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba/_rta babs bdun dang ldan pa/_'obs bdun dang /_
[\[366b.5\]]shing rta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba/_chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/_zheng du yang dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/_phyug cing dar ba/_bde zhing skyid pa/_mi mang pos rgyas pa/_tshong 'dus kyi srang ri mo la bris pa lta bu lnga brgya 
[\[366b.6\]]dang ldan pa/_bzhon pa lhan cig tu gshibs te 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa de lta bu mthong ngo /_/lam gyi mdo'i dbus na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan gyi steng na/_'khor brgya stong du mas yongs 
[\[366b.7\]]su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/des mthong ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa ni dper na/_bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhugs pa'i dge slong sems rtse gcig tu bzhag pa de lta bu'i bde ba thob par gyur to/_/
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag shing rta la zhon bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i drung du 'gro ba mi rigs so snyam du bsams nas/_de shing rta las babs so/_/
[\[367a.2\]]tshong dpon gyi bu mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta de dag las babs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de tshong dpon gyi bu mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor/_mdun du 
[\[367a.3\]]byas nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyan rnams thogs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas shes rab kyi 
[\[367a.4\]]pha rol du phyin pa'i khang pa rtseg ma rin po che sna bdun las byas pa zhig byas te/_tsan dan dmar pos brgyan pa/_mu tig gi dra ba bres pa/_rtseg khang gi gru bzhir me mar gyis snang ba bya ba'i phyir/_nor bu rin po che 'od gsal ba rnams bkod do/_/
[\[367a.5\]]dngul gyi pog phor bzhi yang bar snang las 'phyang du bcug ste/_de na a ka ru nag po gtsang ma'i bdug pa rnams 'thul ba ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa'i phyir ro/_/rtseg khang de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri bzhag ste/_
[\[367a.6\]]de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag go_/de'i nang na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya mthing ka zhun mas bris pa bzhugs so/_/rtseg khang de yang me tog dang dar sna tshogs kyi phreng ba rnams kyis spyangs pas rab tu brgyan 
[\[367a.7\]]to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa rtseg ma de dpag tu med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo /_/lha stong phrag du ma rnams kyang mthong /_
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i dngul gyi phye mas khang pa rtseg ma de dag la kun du mthor/_mngon par 'thor/_rab tu mngon par 'thor ba dang /_lha'i 
[\[367b.2\]]sil snyan dag sgrog pa thos nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/lha'i dbang po khyod ci'i phyir lha stong phrag du ma dang /_lhan cig tu rin po che'i khang pa rtseg ma 'di 
[\[367b.3\]]la/_me tog man dA ra ba dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pas 'thor/_mngon par 'thor/_lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang bar snang las lha rnams ci'i phyir sgrogs/_de skad smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_byang chub 
[\[367b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod mi shes sam/_'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces pa'i yum/_skyed par 
[\[367b.5\]]mdzad pa bskrun pa/_gtso mo yin te gang la bslabs na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 
[\[367b.6\]]'gyur ba'o/_/de skad smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[367b.7\]]kyi gces pa'i yum skyed par mdzad pa skrun pa'i gtso mo de gang na bzhugs/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_'o na lta khang pa rtseg ma'i nang na/_gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya mthing ka zhun mas bris pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]kyis 'phags pas/_rgya bdun gyis btab ste bzhag pas/_de bdag cag gis khyed la bstan du mi rung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs 
[\[368a.2\]]pa/_bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshogs pas/_me tog dang phreng ba dang /_gos dang rin po che dang bdug pa dang /_spos dang byug pa dang /_phye ma dang chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gser dang /_dngul 
[\[368a.3\]]gyi me tog bdag cag gis khyer te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/_de dag las kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go_/de nas byang 
[\[368a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shes rab 
[\[368a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngar mchod pa byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo /_/song nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_
[\[368a.6\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang /_gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_gser dang dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir kun tu gtor/_mngon par gtor/_rab tu mngon 
[\[368a.7\]]par gtor to/_/de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i steng du me tog gi rtseg khang du gnas par gyur to/_/gser dang dngul gyi me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa de dag kyang nam mkha' la gzhal yas khang du gnas 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]par gyur to/_/chos gos dang /_gos rin po che de dag kyang bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de 
[\[368b.2\]]dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /_de ltar 
[\[368b.3\]]mthu che ba dang /_de ltar gzi brjid che ba ngo mtshar che'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang /_de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dag rnam par sprul na/_nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur na/_
[\[368b.4\]]lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la dga' ba dang /_gus pa skyes nas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[368b.5\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/_bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang chos gang byang chub sems 
[\[368b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas thob pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkur bsti byed pa de ltar bdag cag kyang 
[\[368b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkur bsti byed par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston pa de ltar bdag cag kyang 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston par gyur cig_/'phags pa byang chub 
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces de lta bu'i 
[\[369a.2\]]smon lam dag kyang btab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa byas/_byang chub sems 
[\[369a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la yang bkur bsti byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_rje sa dang bcas rim gro dang bcas/_thal mo sbyar nas 
[\[369a.4\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag shes rab kyi pha 
[\[369a.5\]]rol du phyin pa tshol ba na/_dgon pa zhig nas sgra thos pa/_rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang /_de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas bdag gis sgra de thos pa dang /_shar phyogs gang na ba de logs su 
[\[369a.6\]]song song ba las/_bdag 'di snyam du bdag gis sgra de la bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro dgos pa dang /_su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos shing thob par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam du bsams so/_/de ltar bdag yid mi dga' ba dang mya ngan chen 
[\[369a.7\]]por gyur cing /_sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag bdun lon te/_bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro dgos/_su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan du yod ces sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa'i mya ngan las gzhan 
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]pa kha zas bza' ba'i sems kyang ma skyes so/_/de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas/_des bdag la 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/_spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod 
[\[369b.2\]]de/_der song shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa de khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus bka' stsal pa bzhin du shar phyogs 
[\[369b.3\]]gang na ba de logs su song song ba las rgyang gis/_'phags pa chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu yang dper na/_bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge slong gi bde ba de lta bu thob par gyur to/_/bdag dga' zhing bde 
[\[369b.4\]]ba des khyab par gyur nas/_sa phyogs de nyid nas ma g.yos par khyod shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa thos so/_/de thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya phrag du ma skyes par gyur to/_/bdag de na 'dug pa'i tshe yang phyogs bcu nas de bzhin 
[\[369b.5\]]gshegs pa rnams bdag la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad cing rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba yin pas legs so/_/legs so/_/nged kyis kyang de dag la gnas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs 
[\[369b.6\]]su rdzogs par byas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin du legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/_de bzhin 
[\[369b.7\]]gshegs pa de dag gar gshegs snyam mo/_/de nas yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la bslabs pa yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston to snyam mo/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin 
[\[370a.2\]]gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'dri yis/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga las byon pa dang /_gar bzhud pa ci nas kyang bdag cag gis shes par 'gyur ba 
[\[370a.3\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bdag la ston cig_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u ste/_bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de skad smras pa dang /_
[\[370a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang nas kyang ma byon/_gang du 
[\[370a.5\]]yang mi bzhud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mi g.yo ba'o/_/de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu skye ba med pa de ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med de/_skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/
[\[370a.6\]]rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med de/_stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/
[\[370a.7\]]rigs kyi bu ji lta ba nyid la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/_ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/_'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/_'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i dbyings la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/_nam mkha'i dbyings gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[370b.2\]]'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos 'di rnams las gzhan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/_
[\[370b.3\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la ni rnam pa gnyis su med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ni gcig ste/_gnyis ma yin gsum ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni med pa'i phyir bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di 
[\[370b.4\]]lta ste dper na/_mi zhig dpyid zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]nyi ma'i gung la dpyid kyi nyi ma tsha bas gdungs pa na/_smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong ba dang /_de de dang de dag tu rgyug cing 'dir khrus bya'o/_/'dir chu btung ngo snyam du sems na/_rigs kyi bu de ji 
[\[370b.5\]]snyam du sems/_chu de gang nas 'ongs/_shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po 'am/_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshor 'gro 'am/_gang du 'gro/_rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu smig rgyu ba la 
[\[370b.6\]]chu yod pa ma yin na/_de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba lta ga la yod/_rigs kyi bu dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa'i mi de ni/_smig rgyu ba chu med pa la chur 'du shes skyed pas byis pa'i rigs/_shes rab rtul po'i rigs te/_de na chu'i ngo bo 
[\[370b.7\]]ni yod pa ma yin no/_/chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang su yang rung ba 'ga' zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam sgrar mngon par zhen nas/_de dag 
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang /_bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rigs/_shes rab rtul po'i rigs so/_/zhes brjod par bya ste/_dper na mi zhig chu med pa la/_chur 'du shes 
[\[371a.2\]]skyed pa bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas/_gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos nyid la ni 'gro ba 'am/_'ong ba med de/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[371a.3\]]rnams la yang byon pa 'am/_bzhud pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/_rta'i tshogs sam/_shing rta'i tshogs sam/_rkang tang gi tshogs la/_'ong ba 'am/_'gro 
[\[371a.4\]]ba med de/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang byon pa 'am/_bzhud pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu dper na mi zhig gi rmi lam du/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam 
[\[371a.5\]]bzhi 'am/_lnga 'am/_bcu 'am/_nyi shu 'am/_sum cu 'am/_bzhi bcu 'am/_lnga bcu 'am/_brgya 'am/_stong ngam/_brgya phrag stong ngam/_de bas kyang mang ba mthong nas sad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[371a.6\]]pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gar bzhud rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rmi lam gyi chos ni gang yang yongs su 
[\[371a.7\]]grub pa med de/_rmi lam ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/_rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung 
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa legs par mi shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshogs sam/_gzugs kyi tshogs su mngon par zhen pas/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[371b.2\]]byon pa dang /_bzhud par rtog ste/_'di ltar chos nyid rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa 'am/_bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo ste/_de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor 
[\[371b.3\]]bar dong /_'dong /_'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thag ring /_de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang thag ring ngo /_/rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam 
[\[371b.4\]]lta bu'o zhes bshad pa legs par shes pa de dag ni/_chos gang yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro bar mi rtog go_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to/_/
[\[371b.5\]]de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob ma ste/_grong khyer gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za'o/_/de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen 
[\[371b.6\]]po'i rin po che rnams ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_mtshams rnams dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/_'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge 
[\[371b.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus rgya mtsho chen por rin po che rnams 'byung ste/_de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin gyi/_rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa/_rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ngo /_/rin po che de dag med par 'gyur ba na yang phyogs bcu gang du 
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]yang mi 'pho ste dong ba med mod kyi/_'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las/_rin po che de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams med par gyur pa las rin po che de rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin 
[\[372a.2\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon/_gang du yang mi bzhud do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin gyi sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su 
[\[372a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rag lus pa rgyu las kun du byung ba sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang ste/_phyogs bcu gang na yang yod pa ni ma yin gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las sku yongs 
[\[372a.4\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen de rnams med pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_pi wang gi sgra 'byung ba'i tshe/_gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro gang du yang 'pho ba med 
[\[372a.5\]]la/_rten cing yang 'byung ba rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_pi wang gi khog pa dang /_pags pa dang /_yu ba dang /_rgyud dang blang ba dang sbreng shing dang mi'i rtsol ba la rten nas pi wang gi sgra 'byung ste/_sgra de yang 
[\[372a.6\]]khog pa las kyang ma byung /_pags pa dang /_yu ba dang /_rgyud rnams dang /_sbreng shing las kyang ma byung /_blang ba dang /_mi'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyi/_'on kyang thams cad 'dus shing ldan pa las sgra 'byung ngo /_/'gag pa na yang 
[\[372a.7\]]sgra de gang du yang mi 'gro/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang /_rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/rgyu gcig las ma byung /_rkyen gcig 
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]las ma byung /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba ma yin no/_/rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshogs pa las byung ba de gang nas kyang ma byon/_rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med na yang gang du yang mi bzhud do/_/
[\[372b.2\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon pa dang /_bzhud pa blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi/_chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_
[\[372b.3\]]chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med par rab tu shes na/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la yang nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[372b.4\]]gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /_bzhud pa med pa ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu 
[\[372b.5\]]g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang 'khrugs/_nyams par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rtsi shing dang /_
[\[372b.6\]]sman dang /_nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/_/dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams kyang byung bar gyur/_
[\[372b.7\]]steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bab par gyur/_rnga'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang steng gi bar snang las grags par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang /_byang chub sems 
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la/_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_phye ma gzhan dag gis kyang gtor/_mngon par gtor/_rab 
[\[373a.2\]]tu mngon par gtor nas/_tshig 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yon tan gyis deng bdag cag rnams kyis kyang /_don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba/_'jig tshogs la gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[373a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyis ma yin pa bshad pa thos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so/_/sa 
[\[373a.4\]]chen po 'di g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin/_rkyen gang yin/_chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa med pa dang /_bzhud pa med pa bshad pa 'di khyod kyis dris/_ngas bshad pa na/_
[\[373a.5\]]srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur/_bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/_srog chags stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/_rdul med cing dri ma med par gyur 
[\[373a.6\]]nas/_chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/_bdag gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[373a.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /_bzhud pa med pa'i chos bshad pa 'di yongs su dris pa las/_sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas pa ni/_bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni de nyid kyis chog gi_/da phyin chad ni bdag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i the tshom mi 'byung /_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 
[\[373b.2\]]'gyur ba la dogs pa med do snyam nas de dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas/_shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la gnas te/_'di snyam du 
[\[373b.3\]]bdag 'di ltar bar snang la 'dug pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la cis mchod snyam du bsams pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[373b.4\]]chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas de sems la yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes te/_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag de la byin nas 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod me tog 'di dag gis 'phags 
[\[373b.5\]]pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byos shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng sems can stong phrag mang po rnams kyi don byas par gyur pa'i phyir/_rigs kyi bu khyod la nged kyis phan gdags 
[\[373b.6\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar spro bar byas pa de lta bur/_gang sems can thams cad kyi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de lta bu dag rab tu dkon no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[373b.7\]]pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog man dA ra ba dag blangs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]la bdag gi lus kyis kyang bkab nas tshig 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod la deng phan chad g.yog bya ba'i phyir bdag gi lus kyang 'bul lo zhes nas/_de bar snang las babs te bdag phul nas/_byang 
[\[374a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[374a.3\]]rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag cag kyang 'di ltar lus 'bul lo/_/bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig_/phyin chad kyang khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byed 
[\[374a.4\]]par gyur cig_/khyod dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/bu mo khyod snying nas nga'i bsam pa dang 
[\[374a.5\]]'thun par byed cing /_snying nas nga la lus 'bul na ni nga yang khyed len to/_/bu mo de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag khyod la snying nas bsam pa dang 'thun par byed cing /_khyod ci dgos pa bya ba'i phyir snying nas lus 'bul lo/_/de 
[\[374a.6\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo de la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bu mo lnga brgya rnams rgyan thams cad kyis klubs/_shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan nas/_thams cad byang chub 
[\[374a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la phul te/_rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnams dang /_shing rta lnga brgya po 'di rnams yongs su spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbul lo/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]gyis rigs kyi bu de la rigs kyi bu legs so/_/legs so zhes nas/_legs pa byin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/gtong ba'i sems 
[\[374b.2\]]de lta bu dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa byas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas 
[\[374b.3\]]pa nyan nus par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang /_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_gtong ba de lta bu la gnas nas/_bla na med pa 
[\[374b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun du bsgrubs/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa yang yongs su dris so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/_byang chub sems 
[\[374b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams dang /_shing rta lnga brgya blangs so/_/blangs nas kyang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i 
[\[374b.6\]]rigs kyi bu de nyid la slar byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa stan las langs nas bdag gi khyim du song ngo /_/nyi ma yang nub par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[374b.7\]]rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/_/bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/_'dug pa 'am/_nyal ba ni legs pa ma yin la/_bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa bdag gi 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]khyim nas chos 'chad pa'i phyir ma byung gi bar du 'greng ba 'am/_'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis bsdad do snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun du 
[\[375a.2\]]snyoms par zhugs pa gcig la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa las byung ba stong phrag grangs med tshad med pa las gnas par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[375a.3\]]po rtag par rab tu ngu ba yang lo bdun du 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skyed/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_ro la chags pa mi skyed kyi/_gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[375a.4\]]kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi bu de gang la 'dug nas chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan bting bar bya na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di langs pa ji tsam na mthong snyam pa dang /_sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems 
[\[375a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'chad pa'i sa phyogs de yang phyag dar byas shing chag chag gis btab la/_me tog sna tshogs kyis kun du gtor to snyam pa las bsam pa 
[\[375a.6\]]gzhan med do/_/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob cing /_spyod lam gnyis po de nyid kyis sdod cing 'khod do/_/bya ba thams cad 
[\[375a.7\]]kyang de dang rjes su 'thun par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ste/_langs nas kyang grong khyer gyi dbus su chos 'chad do/_/zhes zer ba'i sgra nam mkha' las 
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas thos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas sgra de thos nas/_dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba 
[\[375b.2\]]skyes par gyur nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po rnams dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de byi dor byas nas/_chos kyi stan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yang bting ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bu mo lnga brgya po 
[\[375b.3\]]thams cad kyis bdag cag gi bla gos lus las phud de stan gang la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'dug ste/_chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan der bla gos lnga brgya stan du bting ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[375b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/_sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i phyir kho ra khor yug tu chu btsal na/_sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i chu bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par 
[\[375b.5\]]rab tu ngu ba chu ma rnyed nas/_sems la sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi dga' ba dang /_sems gzhan du gyur te/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med par gyur cing /_mchod pa de yang ngan par 'gyur ba de lta bur bya ba'i phyir/_chu de med pa byas pas 
[\[375b.6\]]chu ma rnyed par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/_/'o na bdag gi lus phug ste/_sa phyogs 'di khrag gis chag chag gdab bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/_

[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]lus med par gyur kyang bla'o/_/bdag gi lus stong phrag du ma 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /_'dod pa'i gzhi dang /_'dod pa'i mtshan mar 'khor ba na yang dang yang du 'khor ba'i tshe/_chud zos kyi gnas 'di lta bu dag tu ni ma 
[\[376a.2\]]song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te bdag gi lus kun phug nas/_sa phyogs de kun bdag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo/_/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po

[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_khyod chos 'dod pa dang /_chos tshol ba bla na med pa de

[\[376b.4\]]phyogs 'di yang chag chag btab cing phyag dar byas zin na/_sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog gis gtor ba dang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos 'chad pa la gtor ba'i me tog bdag gis ga las rnyed snyam pa 
[\[376b.5\]]dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/_/rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man dA ra ba 'di rnams khyer la/_'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di khyod kyis me tog gis gtor 
[\[376b.6\]]cig/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan la 'dug cing /_chos 'chad pa la yang gtor cig ces nas/_des lha'i me tog man dA ra ba khal bzhi brgya de la byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab
