[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]pa lo bdun lon pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/_chos kyi stan gang na 'dug pa der song nas/_stan bting ba la 'dug ste/_'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor/_mdun du byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[377a.2\]]pa 'chad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog gis mchod pa byas so/_/
[\[377a.3\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa mthong nas dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa yid la byed pa rtse gcig tu gyur pa de 
[\[377a.4\]]lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam 
[\[377a.5\]]pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad rnam par dben pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par dben no/_/chos thams cad mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi g.yo ba nyid do/_/chos thams cad sems pa med pa'i phyir/_
[\[377a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sems pa med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad mnan pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnan pa med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/_/
[\[377a.7\]]chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/_/rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/_/ri rab lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[377b.2\]]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/_/nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid do/_/gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' 
[\[377b.3\]]yas pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/_/sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[377b.4\]]pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/_/nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' 
[\[377b.5\]]yas pa nyid do/_/rdo rje lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'jig pa med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad dmigs 
[\[377b.6\]]su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[377b.7\]]rol du phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]du 'dug pa las/_de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nges par byed do/_/chos thams cad rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos 
[\[378a.2\]]thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[378a.3\]]chos thams cad mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[378a.4\]]'dzin dang /_rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ri rab rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzugs mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshor ba 
[\[378a.5\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sa'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa zhes 
[\[378a.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa 
[\[378a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang 
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]rnam pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bshad pa na rab tu thob par 'gyur te/_de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag drug cu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas rab tu thob par gyur to/_/shes rab 
[\[378b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_chos kyis 'phags pa'i le'u ste/_bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 
[\[378b.3\]]brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_mtshams rnams dang /_bla 'og dang /_phyogs bcu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[378b.4\]]khams na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshul 'di nyid dang /_ming 'di nyid dang /_tshig 'di nyid dang /_yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab 
[\[378b.5\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa mthong ba ni/_dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nga byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshul 'di nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang /_
[\[378b.6\]]tshig 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'chad cing 'dug pa lta bu'o/_/de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang nams kyang sangs rgyas dang mi 
[\[378b.7\]]'bral bar gyur to/_/tshe rabs thams cad du gang dang gang du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skyes nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum du chos nyan to/_/chung ngu na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas 
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo/_/de mi khom pa thams cad spangs shing dal 'byor dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces 
[\[379a.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o/_/de bas na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[379a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[379a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/_chongs shig/_lhogs shig/_kun chub par gyis shig/_gzhan la yang rgyas par ston cig/_kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[379a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_bsgrags par bya/_bstan par bya/_bshad par bya/_kha ton du bya/_rab tu bsgom par bya ste/_de bzhin 
[\[379a.6\]]gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis chung ngu na/_glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal bar bris te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_kho ra khor 
[\[379a.7\]]yug tu yang mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa du mas mchod cing /_rim gror bya/_bla mar bya/_bsti stang du bya/_mchod par bya/_brjed par bya/_gus par bya ste/_'di ni ngas rjes su gdams pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 
[\[379b.2\]]ston pa lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/de skad gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/_khyod kyis yongs 
[\[379b.3\]]su spyad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las yid du 'ong zhing /_yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang /_byams pa'i dag gi las yid du 'ong zhing yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las yid du 'ong zhing yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin 
[\[379b.4\]]pas yongs su spyad do/_/de bas na kun dga' bo nga da ltar lus 'di la gnas shing 'tsho skyong ba na/_gang khyod kyis byams pa dang dga' ba dang /_bla mar byas pa de/_da 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gyis shig_/kun dga' 
[\[379b.5\]]bo khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du gtad cing rjes su gtad kyis/_khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di med par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig_/kun dga' bo ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du de 
[\[379b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa yang bzhugs par rig par bya/_de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad par rig par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub 
[\[379b.7\]]par byed pa dang /_sgrogs pa dang /_ston pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_rim gror byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_bsti stang du byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa dang /_rjed par byed pa dang /_gus par byed cing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pas mchod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong 
[\[380a.2\]]ba dang mi 'bral ba/_chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bar 'khod par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs dgyes pas de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[380a.3\]]'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal chen po'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa re ba ta 
[\[380a.4\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rA hu la dang /_'khor rnam bzhi dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_
[\[380a.5\]]yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste/_bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas 
[\[380a.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//nyi khri 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen myang sgom chos 'bar gyi thugs dam gser khri la phyi mo byas nas zhus dag lan gnyis dang /_nyi khri yer pa ma'i steng nas 
[\[380a.7\]]zhus dag legs par bgyis bdog pas/_slan chad bri ba rnams kyang 'di kho na bzhin bri bar bya'o/_/zhes ma phyi 'jang par las byung zhing /_slob dpon seng ge bzang pos zhus dag mdzad pa'i nyi khri dang dpe la lar chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o zhes pa yan las mi 'dug_/'di'i phyi mo sogs dpe la lar de'i 
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]steng du/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la rab tu phye ba'i le'u/_byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po thob pa'i le'u/_rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u/_chos 'phags kyi le'u/_yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug 'dug pa sngon gyi lo rgyus dang gsan yig khungs ma rnams dang mthun 'on 
[\[380b.2\]]kyang le'u phyi ma lnga po 'di 'gyur khyad lta bu'i don la khyad med kyang tshig cung zad mi 'dra ba'i dpe gsum tsam mthong /_lar dpe 'di nyid kyi dbu zhabs thams cad du gzhan dang tshig zur mi 'dra ba dang tshig sna ring thung ci rigs pa 'dug_/khyad par gleng gzhi'i skabs tshig sna 'ga' zhig 'bum dang mthun par snang ngo //_//
[\[380b.3\]]@#/_/oM swa sti/_/lha dbang dbang po sogs kyis gus bsten pa'i/_/mi mchog mchog gi rnam 'dren sku gsum bdag_/rnam grol grol ba'i lam dang tshogs kyi mchog_/ma lus lus can mgon rnams phyag gi yul/_/stong dang snying rje dbyer med lha lam ngos/_/phrin las chu 'dzin 'thug po 'khrigs pa las/_/
[\[380b.4\]]phan dang bde ba'i bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa'i/_/sras bcas rgyal bas slar yang dge legs sa stsol/_/srid zhi'i rmad byung yon tan 'byung gnas mchog_/mchog gyur legs gsungs dgos 'dod dbang gi rgyal/_/rgyal mtshan tog ltar mngon par mtho ba'i rten/_/rten mchog sangs rgyas bstan pa'i dpal du spel/_/
[\[380b.5\]]gang gang dman mchog gdul bya'i bye brag gis/_/mang mang theg pa'i rim pa mtha' yas kyang /_/nges nges sde snod gsum du 'du ba las/_/zab zab bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i bka'/_/dri za'i yul bzhugs bye ba phrag brgya pa/_/mchod sbyin brgya pa'i gnas bzhugs 'bum phrag brgya/_/gdengs can grong 
[\[380b.6\]]bzhugs stong phrag brgya pa la/_/rgyas pa'i rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i rnam gzhag mdzad/_/nyi khri khri brgyad stong pa shes rab khri/_/'bring gi rgyas 'bring bsdus pa zhes su grags/_/brgyad stong pa dang sdud pa tshigs bcad la/_/bsdus dang shin tu bsdus zhes mkhas mang bzhed/_/yang na 'bum dang nyi khri brgyad stong 
[\[380b.7\]]pa/_/rgyas 'bring bsdus par yongs su grags pa las/_/rgyas pa ris med 'gro ba'i mchod sdong du/_/'dzad med dbang gi rgyal po'i char phabs nas/_/slar yang bstan 'gro'i dge legs spel ba'i ched/_/stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i rin chen dbyig_/zad mi shes pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgo/_/
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]grangs med gcig char 'byed pa'i ngo mtshar dpyid/_/yangs pa'i sde chen dge bcu'i 'tsho ba la/_/longs su spyod pa'i skal bzang stsol ba'i rje/_/ris med bstan pa yongs kyi sri zhu mkhan/_/tshe ring dbang po'i khengs pa 'phrog byed des/_/dpal ldan sa skya'i ring lugs 
[\[381a.2\]]gdugs dkar gyis/_/yongs su khyab pa'i lugs gnyis mdun sa che/_/phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi grwa/_/lhun grub steng gi pho brang chen po ru/_/dge byed chu stag shel dkar dngas pa'i ngos/_/snron zla'i gzhon nu'i bzhin ras 'char ba'i tshe/_/rko byed rtser son bcu phrag nyer lnga yis/_/
[\[381a.3\]]legs tshogs rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pas bsgrubs/_/dge des mi dbang sku tshe chab srid bstan/_/yangs pa'i rgyal khams rdzogs ldan bde bas 'tsho/_/'brel thob gyis mtshon mar gyur 'gro ba rnams/_/rnam grol sku bzhi'i go 'phang thob phyir bsngo/_/zhes sde dge sa skyong 
[\[381a.4\]]mi'i dbang po bstan pa tshe ring gi zhal snga nas sangs rgyas phal po che dang 'di nyid stabs gcig tu par du bsgrubs pa gnang skabs/_go re len dge slong bkra shis dbang phyug gis par gyi las gra tshugs pa'i gnas shar kha rdzong gsar pho brang du bris pa dza yan+tu//_//ye d+har+m+mA he tu pra b+ha wA 
[\[381a.5\]]he tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya wa data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI mahA shram NaH/_//_//_//
